Description:
Stylish living, spectacular views
Enviable views, luxurious contemporary living, unrivalled convenience & fantastic lifestyle amenities right on the city fringe what more could you want? Whether youre a young professional or a savvy investor this stylish riverside apartment complete with leafy views of the Yarra by day & glistening city views by night ticks all the boxes & more. Bathed in natural light & featuring a generous open plan living & dining space with floor-to-ceiling windows commanding panoramic views, served by a state of the art stone topped kitchen with a suite of Smeg appliances & a private entertainers balcony. While a main bedroom with extensive built-in robes & luxe ensuite, second bedroom also with built-in robes, a stylish central bathroom & Euro laundry complete the accommodation. Other features include secure basement parking with storage cage, video intercom entry, split system heating/air conditioning & an indoor lap pool, fully equipped gymnasium & outdoor dining oasis with gas fireplace & barbecue facilities for residents to enjoy. Ideally located in the heart of Abbotsford surrounded by beautiful green spaces, bike & walking trails, close to transport, Victoria Gardens shopping centre & the culinary delights of Victoria Street & Bridge Road.
Insights: First listed on 20 July, this unit has been on Domain for 28 days.It was last sold in 2016 and 94 other 2 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
A charming Victorian relishes its new role
Perfectly placed in a family friendly pocket of Abbotsford, this delightful domain provides all the classic appeal of a Hawthorn brick Victorian terrace with a chic modern twist. Showcasing soaring high ceilings, leafy outdoor entertaining and abundant natural light, enjoy outstanding cosmopolitan living with sleek contemporary finishes and a versatile floorplan. Instantly inviting from the lush front garden and charming Victorian façade, open plan living at the rear is complemented by timber floors and skylight, illuminating the stylish Bosch kitchen which opens out to a verdant deck perfect for alfresco dining and entertaining. Both generous downstairs bedrooms incorporate robes and original fireplaces, accompanied by a large versatile third bedroom upstairs with plantation shutters. A pristine bathroom with rain shower and marble vanity includes a European laundry. Positioned close to Yarra River walking trails, Collingwood train station, Johnston Street shops and Gahan Reserve.
Insights: 71 Yarra Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2012 and 27 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
BEST VALUE IN ABBOTSFORD PRICED TO SELL
Perfect for first home buyers, investors and down-sizers this super convenient, modern, low maintenance apartment is a must to inspect!
The bright open plan living/dining is complemented by sleek kitchen area featuring stone bench tops, glass splashback, stainless steel appliances, gas cook top, dishwasher and great storage space.
Relax after a days work (or while working from home!) with your own balcony.
Main bedroom features full length mirror built in robes and the sleek modern bathroom includes Euro style laundry facilities.
Features also include:
- Secure intercom entry and lift access
- Secure basement car space and a storage cage
- Heating & cooling
Also enjoy the resort-style living facilities including:
- outdoor heated swimming pool with spa
- lounge area
- gym
- roof top terrace with barbecue facilities
- cinema
- on-site concierge service
Make the most of the location with direct access to the Yarra River bike and walking trails, trams practically at your doorstep, walking distance to cafes, and opposite the Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre for all of your shopping needs.

Description:
THE ULTIMATE PROJECT BUT NOT HABITABLE NOW
**REGISTRATION FOR AUCTION CLOSES STRICTLY AT 4:30PM**
This Hawthorn brick Victorian stands in a pretty of row of terraces.
In need of total renovation, this is not for the faint hearted but the rewards could be incredible!
- 5 principle rooms
- Rear lane for possible car access
- Land 5m x 25.5m approx.
- Neighbourhood Residential with a Heritage Overlay
- NOTE FOR SAFETY REASONS NO ACCESS TO FIRST FLOOR OR REAR YARD
- PROPERTY MUST GO TO AUCTION
- Strictly 10% deposit and 60 day settlement
PLEASE NOTE: there is cracking throughout, the roof is leaking in numerous places, flooring is not existent and falling away. There are broken sewerage pipes and potential sewage leakage, rising damp, ceilings are at risk of collapse, mould, no access to rear yard due to growth over doorways. The kitchen and bathroom are non-operational and the bathroom is boarded up.
Due to the large number of enquiries we are receiving, only those with phone numbers will be answered.
We have included an online tour. We encourage you to please view this prior to arranging a time to come through.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.
The information about this property has been supplied to us by the property owner, while we have no cause to doubt its accuracy, we provide no guarantee. We cannot attest to the functionality of any fixtures, fittings or inclusions to the property. Land and apartment dimensions and floor/site plans are supplied by third parties. Typing mistakes, omissions, transposing can occur, we provide to assist but make no representation. Buyers must carry out their own due diligence.

Description:
Stylish space and breathtaking city views on the banks of the Yarra
Delivering a spectacular panorama of the city skyline, this two-bedroom, two-bathroom, sub-penthouse apartment offers tranquil, indoor-outdoor living amid a vibrant, inner-city position. Perfectly balancing recreation and convenience, the home abuts the verdant walking trails of the Yarra River, while just paces from city-bound trams, Victoria Gardens shopping centre, and the culinary delights of Victoria Street and Bridge Road.
Enjoying a true sense of open space rarely found in city-fringe living, the home captures leafy views over the Yarra River by day, and a glittery skyscraper horizon by night. A spacious open plan layout offers room to live and dine, stretching through a wall of floor-to-ceiling windows onto a full-width terrace for unrivalled indoor-outdoor entertaining. At its heart, a chic kitchen caters with ease, providing a full array of Smeg appliances and abundant cabinetry, topped with lustrous stone benchtops.
Both bedrooms are generously sized including extensive built-in robes to each, and a sparkling ensuite to the master bedroom. Completed by a stylish guest bathroom, European laundry, and oodles of storage, the home assures comfort and security with fob-swipe and video intercom entry, split system air-conditioning, two basement carparks, and a storage cage.
Promoting an idyllic river-front lifestyle, a residents courtyard inspires tranquil alfresco dining beside the riverbank, including barbecue facilities and a cosy gas fireplace, while a heated pool and gymnasium encourages home exercise.
Inspection by Appointment

Description:
GENEROUS FAMILY HOME PARKS AND RIVER PRECINCT
**INSPECT STRICTLY BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. PLEASE CONTACT AGENT FOR TIME**
Freestanding brick home in blue chip location.
Comfortable order throughout whilst offering endless scope to improve or re-develop with one or two dream homes (STCA)
- 3 bedrooms
- Large modern kitchen/meals with dishwasher
- Generous living with gas heater
- Private deep north facing yard with shed
- Separate laundry and WC
- 2 car OSP (Carport for 1)
- Land 12m x 33.5m approx
- NO HERITAGE OVERLAY
- NEIGHBOURHOOD RESIDENTIAL ZONE
Superb quiet location favoured by those in the know. Moments from the Convent, parkland, Victoria Park, transport and all the delights Abbotsford has to offer.
CONDITIONS OF ENTRY NOTE: The property's residents are concerned about the impact of the Corona Virus with people coming through the property. They have requested no children under 18 are permitted, shoes are removed, gloves (supplied) are worn or sanitiser applied to hands before entering, and nothing is touched during inspections. Obviously if you have are even slightly sick or have come back from overseas in the past 2 weeks we ask you to refrain from coming. Thank you for your understanding.
IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.
The information about this property has been supplied to us by the property owner, while we have no cause to doubt its accuracy, we provide no guarantee. We cannot attest to the functionality of any fixtures, fittings or inclusions to the property. Land and apartment dimensions and floor/site plans are supplied by third parties. Description:
A riverside lifestyle just 10 minutes from the CBD is ready to be explored!
DUE TO COVID-19 RESTRICTIONS: We will only be conducting private inspections. We are very flexible to set up a time. Please simply text or email your preferred viewing date/time and we will endeavour to meet your requirements.
Enter a stunning foyer and come home to an immaculate top floor, 2 bedroom apartment with light filled open plan kitchen, dining and living spilling on to an entertainer's balcony, with breathtaking views over Victoria Park and the CBD, enchanted by the magical city night lights.
A well thought out floor plan with high quality fixtures and finishes including, floor to ceiling glass balcony sliding doors, beautiful kitchen stone tops, Miele appliances, generous storage, feature shelving and hideaway office space.
Two large bedrooms discreet from the living spaces, both with an abundance of natural light and views to Victoria Park. The master bedroom with WIRs and en-suite, and the other bedroom with BIR, serviced by a central bathroom with Euro laundry.
With all the extras reverse cycle ducted air-conditioning, video intercom, secure parking and storage cage, there is nothing to think about! Just move in or lease!
Enjoy an eclectic lifestyle, kick a footy at Victoria Park, walk or bike the Yarra trails, and relax at Dight falls. Connect, eat and shop locally, at Abbotsford Convents farmers, food, clothes, art and craft markets. Only a short walk are Johnston and Victoria Street shopping, cafes and nightlife, with easy access to trams and city trains.
Internal area
76m²

Description:
Premier location, north facing light
Benefitting from a prominent northerly aspect, this stylish contemporary town residence provides sophisticated living in the lifestyle hub of Abbotsford. Sleek finishes, abundant natural light and spacious proportions highlight the elegance and grace of this breathtaking home, perfectly positioned to take advantage of all the area's amenities. Open plan living showcases timber floors and extends out to two separate balconies, providing versatile alfresco dining and entertaining. The gourmet kitchen is appointed with stone benchtops and an array of Miele appliances, including gas cooktop, oven and dishwasher. Three spacious bedrooms are equipped with built in robes including an ensuite main, accompanied by a flexible fourth bedroom or study with robes. A bright bathroom with shower, laundry, separate powder and secure double garage complete the home. Situated within walking distance of Abbotsford Convent, Collingwood Children's farm, Collingwood train station, leading Melbourne cafe Three Bags Full and Yarra River walking trails.

Description:
Garden-View Living & City-Edge Life
**Please note photos are of another similar apartment in the complex**
*** REGISTRATION REQUIRED TO BOOK INSPECTION | CONTACT AGENT TO REGISTER ***
Live with a lush outlook, love the north sun, invest with it all at the door and the city within a walk, ride or cycle! Oriented for light and lush outlooks over landscaped central gardens, this second-floor two bedroom apartment shines with living-dining flowing through walls of northerly glass to a sunny balcony, big bedrooms around a sleek central bathroom, and all the business and buzz of this cosmopolitan inner-suburban Yarra-edge location.
Designed for a lock-and-leave lifestyle with a sleek prestige appliance kitchen facing living across a clever breakfast bench and a well-appointed bathroom featuring a walk-in shower and concealed cistern WC, this reverse-cycle air-conditioned home offers a superior level of detail with stone benchtops and an integrated dishwasher for the kitchen, floor-to-ceiling tiling and mirror-storage for the bathroom, and full-height mirrored robes for each bedroom
But it's the details of this full-facility building that really set this one apart. With secure garaging, garden entertainment spaces, a 20m indoor pool and fully-equipped gym, this well-resourced group adds 5 Star facilities to this city lifestyle. With the restaurants, retail and remarkable vibe of Victorian St on the doorstep, the space and serenity of riverside walks around the corner, and Victoria Gardens shopping and cinemas within 150m, this elevated apartment offers so many lifestyle choices. You can even choose to jump on a tram, throw on a helmet or lace up your shoes to head into the city!

Description:
Prime locale with endless potential
Occupying a superbly central Abbotsford position, this single level home offers exciting potential to renovate or extend (STCA). Set on a sizeable allotment measuring 247 sqm approx., the generous proportions of the existing residence coupled with its expansive outdoor areas invite you to imagine the possibilities. A formal living area flows into a light filled sun room, leading out to the rear courtyard with storage shed, providing an appealing alfresco entertaining space. A kitchen is appointed with ample storage, gas cooktop and oven. Three spacious bedrooms with original period features are accompanied by a bathroom with shower over inbuilt bath. A versatile study and laundry complete the home. Situated a short stroll from Victoria Street dining and trams, with Collingwood train station, Yarra River walking trails and Gahan Reserve close by.

Description:
Stylish inner-urban oasis of unexpected space and lush privacy
To arrange a private inspection or request more information please call Rebecca Edwards on 0423 759 481.
Totally tranquil amidst lushly private gardens, this stunning home is an inner-urban oasis of unique architectural design and plentiful family space. An outstanding opportunity on a tightly-held, tree-lined avenue, this charismatic home is just strolling distance to an endless choice of cuisines and cafes, trains, trams, Convent Arts precinct and Yarra parklands. Beyond high-walled garden and ample off-street-parking, discover a sun-flooded interior where a relaxing resort-style ambience and lovely leafy outlooks create a genuine sense of sanctuary across both spacious levels. The ground floor is designed for easy-flowing living and entertaining with an exotic atrium courtyard playing a soothing backdrop to the fireside lounge and dining areas and the luxuriant rear gardens providing the perfect scenic outlook to a beautifully appointed European kitchen and casual family spaces. Outside, gorgeous greenery and north/easterly sunlight create a superb natural milieu for all your garden entertaining. Privacy and serenity are the unexpected pleasures underlining this city-edge home comprising a luxuriously large main bedroom (huge spa-ensuite) open to a treetop balcony, 3 additional double bedrooms (1/dual access to the sun-filled family bathroom) and a teen living area fitted for study and relaxation. Alongside its obvious aesthetic appeal, this home is packed with unseen surprises with excellent storage, powder room, separate laundry, internally accessed large garage with workshop/hobby area, hydronic heating, air-conditioners, garden shed, intercom and auto-gates. Just 3kms from the city center, handy to Melbournes sporting precinct, the Sophia Mundi Steiner school, Collingwood Secondary College and surrounded by an abundance of lifestyle conveniences, this ones a winner in every way.
Insights: 84 Charles Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2002 and 2 other 4 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
TIMELESS ELEGANCE AND SWEEPING PARK VIEWS
**INSPECT STRICTLY BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. PLEASE CONTACT AGENT FOR TIME**
Victorian elegance & grace are on full display at this tastefully renovated two-storey terrace opposite Victoria Park.
Polished concrete floors & Caesarstone benchtops are among the contemporary highlights that sit harmoniously alongside the homes original period features including ornate fireplaces, soaring ceilings and decorative plasterwork. Offering plenty of space for families, this beautiful home is metres to the retail attractions and eateries of nearby Johnston Street.
- Four well-sized bedrooms (4th may be utilised also as separate study), including a highly desired ground floor bedroom
- Versatile living/dining zone with sitting area/lounge and cosy gas fireplace
- Luxe entertainers kitchen with first-class appliances and lavish stone benchtops
- Sparkling family bathroom plus low maintenance courtyard with rear laneway access
- Master bedroom with balcony overlooking the open expanses of Victoria Park
- Loft/attic space with drop down ladder, under-stair storage, alarm & secure video entry
Timelessly appealing with incredible parkland views & brilliant proximity to Dights Falls & the Yarra River, this is a wonderful opportunity for families in a neighbourhood that really is second to none.

THE BEST OF ABBOTSFORD, OPPOSITE GAHAN RESERVE
**INSPECT STRICTLY BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. PLEASE CONTACT AGENT FOR TIME**
Charm and class await behind the doors of this classic Victorian era home.
- 2 large bedrooms with built in robes
- Big bright open plan kitchen/living/dining area
- Well appointed kitchen with loads of storage
- Updated modern bathroom with laundry facilities
- Entertainers terrace/ rear lane access
Top shelf inner city Melbourne real estate could be yours!

Are you in the market for an inner city residence that oozes style and luxury while offering fantastic recreational facilities?
The light, warmth and energy efficiency of an entirely north facing two bedroom one bathroom apartment has everything you have been looking for in inner city living. With Miele kitchen appliances and high quality finishes throughout this is where your search ends.
Serviced by onsite security, building manager and childcare, clever storage, gym, indoor lap pool and secure lock up storage this is truly the ultimate lifestyle.
This amazing Abbotsford location right on the edge of the city offers an array of excellent amenities and attractions, from the nearby Victoria Street with speciality shops and delicious restaurants, Yarra River parklands for those who love to cycle and walk, iconic Abbotsford Convent, Victoria Street trams, and North Richmond Station.

Description:
Riverside Retreat Playhouse For Sale
This Playhouse Apartment complex is located on the 9th floor this stunning 2 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom 1 Carpark apartment is positioned right on the cusp of the Yarra with everything at your doorstep, just 3kms from the CBD.
Boasting an open plan living/dining, 2 bedrooms with built in robes. The kitchen includes showcases stone benches with quality Italian SMEG appliances, 5 gas cooktop burners and an integrated dishwasher with plenty of storage space. Central bathroom and European style laundry. Fabulous private balcony facing the river and nature strip with illuminating the space with an abundance of natural lighting and fresh air.
Other features include:
Sliding doors, furnished floorboards, split system heating/cooling and secure video intercom entry. One secured basement car space with storage cage, a welcoming guest lounge, heated indoor swimming pool, fully equipped gym and outdoor BBQ area.
Within walking distance of Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, IKEA, trams, grocers, restaurants, cafes and the Yarra River walking/cycling paths.
Please contact Robin Yu 0422 670 969 to register your interest.

Description:
Quality near new apartment in a riverside setting
Exuding a sense of space and light, this contemporary apartment features a generous layout enriched with quality appointments and elevated district views. Next to the Yarra River, it's placed a short walk to the tram and minutes to Victoria Gardens Mall. As an investment at $350 per week rental now, you are getting a gross yield of about 5.7%. That is a fantastic return.
- Open plan living, dining room and kitchen with a study nook
- Living room extends to a balcony with views towards the city
- Gas fitted kitchen with stone benches and Smeg appliances
- Tranquil double bedroom with a mirrored built-in wardrobe
- Neutral bathroom with a frameless shower and smart finishes
- Easycare flooring, air conditioning and an internal laundry
- Resort style facilities with an indoor lap pool and full gym
- Barbecue area, guest lounge and podium level garden retreat
- Steps to greenery and to river walking and cycling trails
- Close to Victoria Street and Richmond/Abbotsford cafes
Providing a Safe Environment for Inspections and Auction On-site
- Inspections via By Appointment or Open for Inspection as scheduled.
- Limiting to 20 people for Auction Onsite and Open for Inspection.
- Names and contact details of all those wishing to enter the property will be recorded.
- As required by Law, 1.5m Social Distancing is required at the property.
- Please sanitise your hands prior and after inspection; sanitiser provided.
- Please do not touch any surfaces, fixtures, and fittings.
- If you are feeling unwell, please kindly stay at home.
- Post-inspection cleaning of the premises will be undertaken.
McGrath remains focused on the health and safety of our employees, clients, their families, and our local communities.

Description:
Exciting development opportunity with approved plans and permits
Please register your interest in attending the open for inspection so that we can ensure compliance with the latest regulations.
New luxury residence, with work-from-home and/or office potential. These are some of the options available for an existing 2BR Victorian home, comfortably updated, with approved plans and permits for a multi-level new residence, readily adaptable for business and/or residential occupancy. Zoned Commercial 2 with existing Residential rights, in a thriving precinct close to Nicholson Street's newest cafes, public transport and Yarra parkland, this is the ultimate in inner-city living. Approved development plans include undercover parking for 3-cars, glass-encased lift access, 4 double bedrooms, 3 luxurious bathrooms, expansive living areas, custom kitchen and vast entertaining terraces offering stunning city views. There is the further option to negotiate with the vendor, a renowned Melbourne boutique builder, about full construction options to incorporate your own flair for interior design, fittings and finishes, and take advantage of stamp duty and other applicable savings. An outstanding opportunity in a prime CBD-edge position! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd.
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
If you're attending an open for inspection, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from anyone attending the open for inspection, including other prospective buyers and our team members, and if requested wait outside so as to reduce the number of people in the property at any one time. Lastly, please refrain from touching items/fixtures and doors within the properties. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.

UNPARALLELED VICTORIAN LIFESTYLE OPPORTUNITY...
Please register your interest in attending the open for inspection so that we can ensure compliance with the latest regulations.
A leafy city-edge neighbourhood with Yarra Walks at the end of the street sets the scene for this classic Victorian delivering a lifestyle of immediate comfort and enviable convenience along with exciting options to enhance and possibly expand (STCA). Inviting interior comprises a side hallway accessing three spacious bedrooms, plus an updated bathroom, light-filled open-design lounge/meals area and separate kitchen. High ceilings add to the appeal along with a secure courtyard complete with access to the rear ROW. Location perfection, it's also walking distance to riverside trails and parkland, Collingwood Children's Farm, Nth Richmond Station, as well as Victoria Street's cosmopolitan shops, cafes and restaurants.
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
If you're attending an open for inspection, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from anyone attending the open for inspection, including other prospective buyers and our team members, and if requested wait outside so as to reduce the number of people in the property at any one time. Lastly, please refrain from touching items/fixtures and doors within the properties. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.

Description:
Breathtaking views, brilliant style & 2 balconies
Spectacular uninterrupted views sweeping from South Yarra to the city skyline provide a remarkable day/night backdrop to the stylish sophistication of this amazing apartment with 2 balconies. Securely set in the highly-regarded Green Square complex with handy car space and storage on title, this stunning 2 bedroom home's riverside location by the Main Yarra Trail is perfectly enhanced by luxurious resort-style facilities including sky lounge, swimming pool, gym, sauna, library, meeting room, BBQs and Jack Merlo designed gardens. The innovative, holistic approach from SJB Architects extends into this hi-spec designer apartment offered for the first time with NBN fibre optic connection direct to the premises plus full-height double-glazed doors, heating/cooling, LED lighting and video intercom. The main bedroom (mirror BIRs) includes a large study alcove and separate balcony while the living room opens to a big entertainers' balcony with an external awning. The kitchen/meals area is a stand out with full-wall mirrored splashback, deep stone benchtops and excellent Smeg appliances, plus there's a chic streamlined bathroom (double shower heads), European laundry and double block-out blinds. The perfect setting to savour hot-air balloons at dawn, sensational sunsets and fireworks at night near Victoria Gardens shops and cinemas, cafes, restaurants and city/MCG-bound trams.

Description:
The Gift Of The Good Life At Green Square
***IMPORTANT***
Due to COVID-19, Melbourne Real Estate are now conducting one on one inspections of properties only to qualified buyers. After assessing if the property suits your needs based on the photos, floorplan and property description, you can book a private inspection by clicking the Book An Inspection link on this listing. A sales agent from Melbourne Real Estate will be in contact with you prior to the inspection to discuss the property, ensuring it meets your buying requirements before confirming the appointment.
We thank you for your patience while we take these added precautionary measures in an effort to limit the spread of COVID-19.
Green Square development marks a high point in the evolution of urban Melbourne living. A four-tower complex built behind the famed Terminus Hotel and moments from the Yarra River, bike trails and golf course, with Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, IKEA and readily accessible public transport close by, Green Square has something for everyone.
This seventh level, top floor apartment impresses with full-height, light maximising glazing, considered open-plan design and luxury fixtures and fittings. Featuring a polished, fully tiled bathroom accessing good-sized euro laundry, super stylish stone-topped open plan kitchen with mirrored splash-backs, stainless steel appliances, integrated dishwasher and generous dark-toned cabinetry. The generous dining/living zone extends out to a private covered terrace and a spacious bedroom contains built-in mirrored robes. Fully carpeted throughout, with split system air-conditioning. Exclusive resident amenities include a library, indoor/outdoor swimming pool, gym and rooftop barbecue with sky garden. Green Square has become a popular choice for both the astute investor and owner-occupiers alike.

Description:
CHIC STYLE WITH THE CITY AT YOUR DOORSTEP
Currently leased until October 2020
Ideally situated between the banks of the iconic Yarra River and the convenience of Victoria Street in Abbotsford, this thoughtfully designed apartment is the perfect amalgamation of urban green oasis and city-edge living. Commute to work via bike on the Capital City Trail, or jump on a tram practically on your doorstep.
As you step inside, you're welcomed by the open plan living and dining area. A designer kitchen features quality Miele appliances, fittings, and smart storage. Offering a spacious two bedroom design with a shared bathroom and private balcony. Bonus features include heating/cooling, European-style laundry, video intercom, and a secure car space.
The position offers the best of both worlds: nature and convenience. Moments from Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Yarra Bend hiking and bike trails, famed restaurants & shops of Victoria Street, Richmond and Collingwood whilst trams, grocery, child care and cafe are ideally located at your door. "Precinct" features everything you'd expect from luxury city-edge living: an indoor 20 metre swimming pool, landscaped gardens, fully equipped gymnasium, on-site café, on-site child care centre, and manicured gardens.

Description:
Seamless style on the city's fringe
Seize this opportunity to live on the edge of the city with impressive skyline views and lifestyle benefits to match this stylish 2-bedroom apartment. Designed to impress with light saturated open plan living and entertaining serviced by a fabulous island stone kitchen, s/s appliances encompassing gas cooktop, integrated dishwasher and sleek grey toned splashback. Enjoy a sunset drink on an adjoining undercover balcony overlooking this vibrant locale.
The bedrooms are smartly appointed with BIRs serviced by a quality fully tiled bathroom with in-wall cistern WC. Relish the close proximity to Victoria Street and its bustling eateries along with Yarra Bend Park and a myriad of cycling/foot trails, trams, trains and buses to get you anywhere you need to go. Moments to Victoria Gardens, cinemas and IKEA for all your apartment's decor needs. Close to the city for bars, theatre shows, premium shopping and dining, boasting the life you have always dreamed of!
Couples, professionals, downsizers and investors will be equally impressed by this eye-catching apartment. Offering secure keypad entry, lift access, intercom and shared residential swimming pool and gymnasium. Additionally, providing split system heating/cooling, Euro laundry and modern flooring/blinds.

Above and beyond...
***This property is available for inspection by appointment - Please contact us to arrange a suitable time***
Breathtaking views of the city skyline from the huge private terrace of this boutique podium level townhouse. Enter through the security foyer and up to the second floor to where you find a spacious 2 level residence with a huge kitchen open plan living and
entertaining area leading onto the spacious terrace. Upstairs are three generous bedrooms, master with ensuite and balcony with more stunning views, a central bathroom and study nook. There is side by side secure parking for 2 cars, timber floors, quality finishes and a location central and convenient to public transport, shops restaurants, and the MCG. You're so close to the city you feel like you can reach out and touch it.

Lastly, please refrain from touching items/fixtures and doors within the properties. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.

Description:
Peaceful period living in a brilliant Abbotsford location
NOTE: Inspections via private appointment only.
A perfect match for passionate inner city buyers who have been searching for a beautiful period home that offers a stunning location in a quiet yet convenient Abbotsford pocket, this standout 2 bedroom single fronted brick Victorian is not to be missed!
The long classical hall with stunning archway detail and towering ceilings takes you all the way through to the relaxed and sizeable living and meals zone at the rear. This superb main area features high angled ceilings and is a sensational space that includes the kitchen which offers timber detail and stainless steel appliances including a Miele dishwasher.
The front bedroom promises an elegant ornate fireplace and storage, while the 2nd bedroom includes ample built-in robe storage and access to a small courtyard. The bathroom lets in fantastic natural light and comes with laundry facilities, while further enjoy a rear brick courtyard with additional powder room and access to the rear laneway, gas heating, and attic storage.
Walk to funky nearby cafes including Mavis the Grocer and Admiral Cheng Ho for your morning latte hit, while you're also not far from restaurants and shops on Johnston Street and Victoria Street, Victoria Park, Gahan Reserve, Andrews Reserve and other Yarra River parklands, Main Yarra Trail, Collingwood College, Hoddle Street buses, Collingwood Station, and Eastern Freeway.

An impeccable blend of contemporary flair and stylish low-maintenance living defines the interior spaces of this modern town residence, offering instant appeal for astute investors and discerning lovers of an inner-city lifestyle close to every desirable convenience.

Description:
Secluded away in the riverside pocket...
This low-level apartment complex is very discrete and sophisticated the character of the development blends in to the leafy part of Abbotsford almost unnoticed. It is some 100 meters away from the beautiful Victoria Park, 2-minute walk from Bus stop and Train station, moments away from green river walks and the bustling restaurant and cafe district of Abbotsford - Collingwood has to offer.
The security system in the complex is a high level and a grandeur foyer awaits. Light filled open living with a feature of a large balcony creates a feeling of abundant space and views of the majestic Yarra River. The layout has a very practical design which includes a large living and dining area , large kitchen amenities with stone bench top. As you walk into the bedroom a large mirror wardrobe adds to the practicality of the design. In the bathroom includes an oversize long shower and a laundry. The secured basement parking and storage is an additional feature to the apartment. This may suit a first home buyer, a lifestyle downsize or a long-term investor.... The apartment would be able to be rented out form $400 to $420 per week.

Description:
Stunning riverside apartment with sweeping views across Victoria Park
***This property is available for inspection by appointment - Please contact us to arrange a suitable time***
Embracing an exclusive riverside lifestyle opposite Victoria Park, this stunning designer apartment is situated on level Five of the renowned 'Trenerry' complex. It is placed strolling distance to Yarra trails, Dights Falls, Abbotsford Convent and Studley Park, plus Johnston Street cafes, trams and city trains. Stylish, spacious and impeccably appointed throughout, it offers a superb open plan living and dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows and a deluxe oversized balcony, crafted for summer entertaining with sweeping views across the hallowed ground to the CBD. The gourmet CaesarStone kitchen boasts premium Gaggenau gas appliances plus a dishwasher. Further on are two king sized bedrooms including the main with a sleek ensuite; both have mirrored built-in robes and access to a second glorious balcony. There is also a sparkling bathroom and large study enclosed by glass. It features a European laundry, ducted heating/cooling, video intercom entry, lift access and a secure car space.
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
If you're attending a Private Appointment, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from our team members, and if requested wait outside until the property is ready for the appointment. Lastly, please refrain from touching items/fixtures and doors within the properties. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.

Description:
SOLD OFF MARKET! TREE TOP RIVER ASPECT IN DESIRABLE CORNER POSITION
Corner positioned with uninterrupted views of the Yarra river is this stylish & north facing modern residence.
This exceptional residence with parkland serenity & spacious interiors provides a lifestyle of luxury & low maintenance living. Featuring 2 double bedrooms both with built in robes and direct access to the oversized terrace, master bedroom with its very own private en-suite bathroom & an additional main bathroom. Generous kitchen features with stone bench top, Blanco cooking appliances and dishwasher along with plenty of cupboard storage. Complete with a light filled and spacious living and dining area with floor to ceiling windows leading you to your huge wrap around terrace.
Additional features include split system heating and cooling, timber floors throughout, lift access with secure building access, double glazed windows, European laundry, car space and storage cage.
Enjoy the sights & sounds of the Yarra River with easy access to Parklands, Yarra trails and only moments away to Victoria Street cafes, restaurants and vibrant shopping precincts & public transport.

Description:
AUCTION BROUGHT FORWARD TO 6:00PM WED 25TH MARCH
We invite you to contact us for a private inspection.
A modern revelation, this vibrant Victorian cottage features tastefully styled interiors, generous al fresco entertaining and a desirable inner-city location thats second to none. Behind the picture-perfect façade lies a light-filled renovated home showcasing a living room and dining separated by a stylish kitchen appointed with a CaesarStone central island bench/breakfast bar, Blanco stainless-steel cooking appliances and a Bosch dishwasher. The tailor-made comfort is further enhanced by two carpeted bedrooms fitted with built-in robes, a vogue bathroom, European laundry, split-system air conditioner and floorboards. Promoting an easy-care indoor-outdoor lifestyle, double doors deliver a seamless flow to a paved courtyard and garden. Zoned Commercial 2 with existing Residential rights, the quietly located gem offers a unique opportunity to live, play, socialise and work from home. You could even pursue the potential of extending upwards and/or outwards at the rear (STCA) to complement the mix-and-match options on offer. Positioned to perfection, its within easy access of everything for which this sought-after locale is so well-known, including Collingwood Station, trams, Gahan Reserve, the hottest bars, restaurants and cafés in Fitzroy and Collingwood, The Hive Shopping Centre, Abbotsford Convent Farmers Market and the banks of the Yarra.

Description:
Distinguished by superb design
The innovative, imaginative approach for which Interlandi Mantesso Architects are so highly regarded is immediately evident throughout this sophisticated c2017 townhouse - a residence that's equally distinctive in terms of its external lines and its internal dimensions. Beyond unique aesthetic first impressions and an elevated entrance, a living/dining area framed by 4.2m ceilings and polished concrete floors is complemented by an open-plan kitchen where the beauty of black stone bench-tops enhances the visual impact of sparkling stainless steel appliances. A downstairs bedroom featuring heating/cooling, built-in robes and its own bathroom is matched upstairs by a similarly seductive second bedroom also accompanied by an exceptional ensuite and built-in robes. Secure parking for two cars ensures the style of the design is matched by total convenience in a location that puts great cafes, the Yarra Trail, the Victoria Street vibe, trams and trains to the CBD all within moments' walk.
Jellis Craig Coronavirus Update
Please note some key changes to our open for inspection processes as we continue to work through the current Coronavirus situation;
- A reminder to maintain healthy social distancing (at least 1.5m) from anyone else attending the open for inspection, including the Jellis Craig sales teams
- Please refrain from touching surfaces within the property where possible
- You may be requested to wait outside the property to help reduce the number of people in the property at the one time
OFI appointments may be subject to change or be run by appointment only. We encourage you to contact the listing agent prior to attending an open for inspection to confirm inspection details.
We also request you refrain from attending an open for inspection if you have:
- Tested positive to, or have symptoms associated with Coronavirus
- Recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
- Recently been overseas or agreed to any self-isolation conditions
If you are unable to attend the property but are still interested, please contact the agent and they will advise you of the best way to proceed.
Thank you for your understanding as we work through this situation together.

Description:
On-trend living with leafy alfresco appeal in cosmopolitan surrounds
Boasting a chic transformation from its iconic Harold Boot Company factory origins, this stylish two-bedroom apartment promises a vibrant inner-city lifestyle in contemporary space and luxury. Surrounded by trendy bars, cafés and eateries, the home is positioned for ultimate convenience, an easy walk from Collingwood Station, Victoria Street trams and the Hive shopping centre, with direct access to Yarra River recreation at the end of the street.
Beyond a secure entrance and a lush, barbecue communal garden, the home has been exquisitely crafted for low-maintenance living with double glazing and Daniel Robinson Hawthorn clay brickwork. Flooded in natural light, the home blends sleek timber-look joinery and bluestone floors with verdant leafy outlooks.
Ready for easy relaxation and vibrant indoor-outdoor entertaining, providing sizeable open plan domain and a sheltered treetop balcony, including bespoke media cabinetry and split-system air-conditioning. A chic, fully appointed kitchen plays the perfect host to every occasion, effortlessly melding into the living areas on-trend design with smoky-mirrored splashbacks and gleaming stone benchtops.
Vibrant sunsets and glittering city lights incite a restful nights sleep from both bedrooms, each equipped with built-in robes, while a private ensuite is awarded to the main. Completed by a modern main bathroom with walk-in shower and Euro laundry, plus basement parking and storage cage, the home delivers a dynamic cosmopolitan lifestyle in a unique setting with every convenience at its door.
Open for inspection entry via Nicholson street

Description:
Captivating light, luxury & living in garden seclusion
State-of-the-art, double-storey expansion beyond a beautiful heritage façade showcases the sophisticated space, excellent views and relaxing garden of this stunning home near the Yarra. Larger than expected and luxuriously appointed, this architect-extended tuckpointed brick residence highlights brilliantly designed, open-plan style over 2 flexible and flowing, sun-filled levels. Multiple zones to spread out and savour include a top-floor lounge room adjoining a fitted study area.
The downstairs living room with cosy wood heater is filled with natural light and extends to a brilliantly crafted Ilve/ASKO eat-in kitchen featuring an integrated fridge/freezer and Vintec wine fridge all wrapped in high-end Smith+Smith cabinetry. Just outside fringed in wisteria and covered by an automatic retractable awning is an entertainment deck enjoying a sunlit setting overlooking the secluded greenery of a leafy landscape garden. This attractive 3 bedroom home also offers excellent accommodation with a downstairs main bedroom including WIR and 2-way marble ensuite/bathroom and upstairs bedrooms savouring spectacular city and convent views.
Other attributes include a 2nd bathroom, laundry, copious custom storage, double-glazing, zoned central heating/cooling, CAT5 cabling, broad hardwood floorboards, storage/workshop and bespoke wood store. Nestled in a tranquil pocket by Yarra River trails and the Convent Arts precinct, the location is exceptional just minutes to the CBD and inner-city cafes, restaurants, shops and train station.
Jellis Craig Coronavirus Update
At Jellis Craig the health and wellbeing of our clients and staff is our highest priority.
In light of the recent Coronavirus outbreak, we are taking measures to protect our clients and staff from coming into contact with the virus, and request that you do not attend an Open for Inspection if you have:
- Tested positive to Coronavirus
- Symptoms associated with Coronavirus
- Recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
- Recently been overseas
- Agreed to any self-isolation conditions
We also ask that you maintain adequate social distancing from anyone attending the open for inspection, including other prospective clients and Jellis Craig sales teams and where possible refrain from touching surfaces within the property. We also appreciate your understanding if you are requested to wait outside to reduce the number of people in the property at a time.
Thank you for your understanding.

Description:
Captivating light, luxury & living in garden seclusion
State-of-the-art, double-storey expansion beyond a beautiful heritage façade showcases the sophisticated space, excellent views and relaxing garden of this stunning home near the Yarra. Larger than expected and luxuriously appointed, this architect-extended tuckpointed brick residence highlights brilliantly designed, open-plan style over 2 flexible and flowing, sun-filled levels. Multiple zones to spread out and savour include a top-floor lounge room adjoining a fitted study area.
The downstairs living room with cosy wood heater is filled with natural light and extends to a brilliantly crafted Ilve/ASKO eat-in kitchen featuring an integrated fridge/freezer and Vintec wine fridge all wrapped in high-end Smith+Smith cabinetry. Just outside fringed in wisteria and covered by an automatic retractable awning is an entertainment deck enjoying a sunlit setting overlooking the secluded greenery of a leafy landscape garden. This attractive 3 bedroom home also offers excellent accommodation with a downstairs main bedroom including WIR and 2-way marble ensuite/bathroom and upstairs bedrooms savouring spectacular city and convent views.
Other attributes include a 2nd bathroom, laundry, copious custom storage, double-glazing, zoned central heating/cooling, CAT5 cabling, broad hardwood floorboards, storage/workshop and bespoke wood store. Nestled in a tranquil pocket by Yarra River trails and the Convent Arts precinct, the location is exceptional just minutes to the CBD and inner-city cafes, restaurants, shops and train station.
Jellis Craig Coronavirus Update
At Jellis Craig the health and wellbeing of our clients and staff is our highest priority.
In light of the recent Coronavirus outbreak, we are taking measures to protect our clients and staff from coming into contact with the virus, and request that you do not attend an Open for Inspection if you have:
- Tested positive to Coronavirus
- Symptoms associated with Coronavirus
- Recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
- Recently been overseas
- Agreed to any self-isolation conditions
We also ask that you maintain adequate social distancing from anyone attending the open for inspection, including other prospective clients and Jellis Craig sales teams and where possible refrain from touching surfaces within the property. We also appreciate your understanding if you are requested to wait outside to reduce the number of people in the property at a time.
Thank you for your understanding.

Description:
Contemporary townhouse living in exclusive riverside precinct
A relaxed lifestyle awaits at this peaceful riverside location with easy access to the Yarra River Trails, Dights Falls and Victoria Park the ultimate city-edge living surrounded by nature. Contemporary in style and spanning three levels, this stylish, low-maintenance townhouse will not disappoint. The clever layout situates the lovely light-filled lounge, dining and granite-topped kitchen plus a balcony on the lower level. While the two, newly carpeted bedrooms are split across the next levels - each with their own bathroom offering added privacy. Both bedrooms have generous robes, one has a balcony and additional space for a study while the top floor bedroom boasts lovely city skyline views. The spacious, marble-topped bathrooms have great shelving and cabinetry, and one also features a bath. Carefully considered, this residence includes a separate laundry room, solid timber stairs, Smeg appliances, recently installed LED downlights throughout, new family size hot water service, Noirot panel heaters throughout and a large pantry. Freshly painted walls, new flooring and two undercover parking spaces make this a highly desirable and instantly appealing property. Nearby are several cafes, retail shops, excellent transport options and easy freeway access. Simply move in and reap the benefits of a tranquil lifestyle moments to all the excitement and vibrancy this industrial-chic, inner-city location has to offer.

Description:
CHARMING VICTORIAN NEAR-CITY SANCTUARY
Loads of character and charm plus near-city convenience and the bonus of rear off-street parking will draw buyers of all ages and life stages to this updated single fronted Victorian home, with a light and airy, reconfigured kitchen/dining/living area as its focal point.
Behind a pretty picket fence and cottage garden, the wide front verandah presents an idyllic setting for a quiet moment under majestic street trees. At the rear, the brick paved courtyard invites alfresco entertaining. The bedrooms retain their original period features and the family bathroom also has an old-style charm with provision for laundry facilities.
As a market entry, downsizer or rental investment, this quiet and private weatherboard home offers exciting scope for further modernisation, even possibly the addition of an upper level to maximise family living space (STCA).
With Abbotsford Primary School across the road, Victoria Street acclaimed pubs and eateries, city tram and train and Yarra Bend riverside walk/cycle paths (approx. 600 metres). Victoria Gardens SC is just minutes away for every possible retail requirement, plus parks, gardens and sports and entertainment venues.
* Timber floors, high ceilings, OFPs
* North facing living area and rear courtyard
* Easy-care front and rear gardens.
* Roll-door rear entry to off-street parking via ROW
* Dog-friendly cafe just around the corner
* Woolworths, Aldi and Asian Supermarket (approx. 600 metres)
* Close proximity to 8 Murray Street, 3 Bags Full and other funky local venues
* Walk to Abbotsford Convent and Collingwood Children's Farm
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days

Description:
AUCTION
OBVIOUS
A traditional Victorian terrace with a full Architectural extension, positioned just 300 meters from Yarra bend walks and in the heart of some of Abbotsfords highly acclaimed café and restaurants. With 3 large bedrooms you enter through the stunning façade to find high ceilings and the front section rich in period detail. 2 bedrooms are followed by a large and unique oversized kitchen, island bench and living room stepping out to a landscaped decked courtyard. The kitchen with SMEG appliances is the heart of the home can easily cater for large dinner parties. Upstairs youll find what the owners love to call their own oasis. With a oriental theme the space feels so tranquil and the pitched roof gives a loftiness hard to find. Wake up in the morning, step out onto your own master terrace and the sun will filter through on the daily.
SEALS THE DEAL
Is the proximity to Johnson St, Smith St, Gertrude St and of course, the ability to walk into the city.

Description:
Garden-view living & city-edge life
Live with a lush outlook, love the north sun, invest with it all at the door and the city within a walk, ride or cycle! Oriented for light and lush outlooks over landscaped central gardens, this fifth-floor two bedroom apartment shines with living-dining flowing through walls of northerly glass to a sunny balcony, big bedrooms around a sleek central bathroom, and all the business and buzz of this cosmopolitan inner-suburban Yarra-edge location.
Designed for a lock-and-leave lifestyle with a sleek prestige appliance kitchen facing living across a clever breakfast bench and a well-appointed bathroom featuring a walk-in shower and concealed cistern WC, this reverse-cycle air-conditioned home offers a superior level of detail with stone benchtops and an integrated dishwasher for the kitchen, floor-to-ceiling tiling and mirror-storage for the bathroom, and full-height mirrored robes for each bedroom
But it's the details of this full-facility building that really set this one apart. With secure garaging, garden entertainment spaces, a 20m indoor pool and fully-equipped gym, this well-resourced group adds 5 Star facilities to this city lifestyle. With the restaurants, retail and remarkable vibe of Victorian St on the doorstep, the space and serenity of riverside walks around the corner, and Victoria Gardens shopping and cinemas within 150m, this elevated apartment offers so many lifestyle choices. You can even choose to jump on a tram, throw on a helmet or lace up your shoes to head into the city!

Description:
Yarra River Lifestyle
The Riviere is arguably one of the finest urban living developments, down by the banks of the tranquil Yarra River.
Our residence showcases 2 bedrooms, light filled master with robes, perfect guest bedroom or study area, central bathroom, open plan living/dining and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances with dishwasher.
Featuring an undercover private courtyard with a favourable north facing aspect, hardwood floors, split system heating and cooling, security entrance, storage cage and garage parking for 1.
The position is outstanding, with bike trails, parkland, Dights Falls, Abbotsford Convent, public transport and boutique retail all close to hand.

Description:
Cosmopolitan Inner-City Living With Yarra Views
Set on the banks of the Yarra River with kilometres of walking trails to enjoy; this tranquil ground floor apartment promises a cosmopolitan inner-city lifestyle with all the convenience you could wish for, could now be yours.
A modern lobby provides a warm introduction and a great place to meet guests upon arrival; leading to a spacious one-bedroom apartment with an open plan living and dining room enhanced by wide Oak floorboards, complemented by a stylish kitchen boasting terrific storage options and quality Blanco cooking appliances. Step outside to a private terrace that offers both protected and open space; with views of the majestic Yarra River. Extra features include intercom, split system air conditioning, secure basement carparking and a storage cage.
Delivering a peaceful lifestyle a stones throw from Victoria Park and Train Station, Dights Falls, cafes and eateries. Its just moments from Abbotsford Convent and Collingwood Children Farm, the Eastern Freeway, Fairfield Boathouse and 5kms from Melbourne University and the bustling hub of the CBD with endless dining options, theatres and art galleries, exclusive shops, Crown Casino and eclectic laneways to explore.

Riverside
Don't miss the opportunity to own this impressive apartment with uninterrupted views of the Yarra River. Description:
RESORT STYLE LIVING/ CITY SIDE LIFESTYLE.
The Lifestyle.
This 7th. floor one bed apartment will appeal to the first home owner, downsizers or those who want a city pad. The list of attributes are endless.
Surrounded by lush gardens, with the Yarra river walking and bike tracks as your backyard, you won't want to leave home.
Include a rooftop garden and amenities, a communal vegetable patch, not to mention a gorgeous pool and full gymnasium.
If you can drag yourself away, you can walk to Victoria Gardens shops, the eateries of Victoria street, Bridge rd. and Swan street.
The 109 tram out the front can take you into the C.B.D. and other precincts.
The Abode.
This is a corner one bedroom apartment affording extra privacy and windows.
The generous bedroom has built in robes.
You will find much desired timber flooring in the hallway, living and dining . This leads to you private balcony, with a pleasing vista.
The modern streamlined kitchen has stainless steel appliances with an integrated fridge.
The modern, immaculate bathroom will please.
Your own secure car park and storage cage rounds off this bright and sunny apartment.
What to do.
Contact us now to book your own private inspection.

Description:
Desirable by design just moments to the Yarra & the city
A creative, architect-designed transformation opens the space, adds a second level and makes this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom residence an outstanding city-edge lifestyle opportunity. The easy, free-flowing layout of this stylish light-filled home integrates high-quality features, smart design elements and an abundance of custom storage. Highlighted by double-glazed windows, Blackbutt floors and beautiful outlook to a lush vertical garden, the open-plan living and dining area incorporates a stunning Miele-equipped, Caesarstone kitchen plus an entertainment unit and multiple bifold doors adjoining a covered and heated alfresco deck. Downstairs is a robed bedroom, streamlined bathroom and laundry, while upstairs features pure wool carpets, 2 further bedrooms (BIRs, views) and immaculate 2nd bathroom. Also offers reverse-cycle heating/cooling in a friendly and convenient position near the Convent Arts Precinct, Yarra River, Fitzroy restaurants and cafes, the CBD, trams and train station.

Description:
UNINTERRUPTED RIVER VIEWS IN SOUGHT AFTER LOCATION
Positioned with uninterrupted views of the Yarra river is this stylish & north facing modern residence.
This exceptional residence with parkland serenity & spacious interiors provides a lifestyle of luxury & low maintenance living. Featuring 2 double bedrooms both with built in robes and direct access to the oversized terrace, master bedroom with its very own private en-suite bathroom & an additional main bathroom. Generous kitchen features with stone bench top, Blanco cooking appliances and dishwasher along with plenty of cupboard storage. Complete with a light filled and spacious living and dining area with floor to ceiling windows leading you to your huge entertainment terrace.
Additional features include split system heating and cooling, timber floors throughout, lift access with secure building access, double glazed windows, European laundry, car space and storage cage.
Enjoy the sights & sounds of the Yarra River with easy access to Parklands, Yarra trails and only moments away to Victoria Street cafes, restaurants and vibrant shopping precincts & public transport.

Description:
Streamlined sophistication in a leafy city-edge setting
An excellent, easy-care lifestyle so central for strolling and cycling to the CBD, the Yarra River, hospital precinct and the Smith/Gertrude/Brunswick Streets quarter highlights the extraordinary appeal of this sophisticated north-facing residence. Natural north light cascades into the architect-designed spaces of this stylish contemporary home that's serene, secure and secluded beyond a magnificent plane tree canopy. Accessed through full-height stacker doors, enjoy effortless entertaining on the superb alfresco terrace adjoining a streamlined living and dining zone that's brilliantly served by a gourmet kitchen boasting Smeg stainless-steel appliances, soft-close drawers and stone benchtops. Accommodation includes 2 high-ceiling bedrooms with mirrored robes, study alcove and immaculate central bathroom while there's also a full laundry and first-class features such as split-system heating/cooling, security alarm, video intercom, LED lighting, polished hardwood floors, big window vistas, double roller blinds, great storage and internal remote-control garage. Also close to Train Station, Trams and Buses.

Description:
Stunningly renovated elevated brick Victorian Absolute top shelf blue chip location
Hidden behind its evocative Victorian façade, this terrace conceals a sophisticated full renovation. Flaunting premium finishes alongside traditional design elements, the cleverly-extended floorplan boasts contemporary spaces that provide families with a stunning low-maintenance sanctuary.
- Seamlessly extended 3 bedrooms plus study Master bedroom with terrace
- High-end Bosch kitchen, gas cook top and dishwasher
- 2 sparkling bathrooms, main is centralised and ensuite to master bedroom
- Peaceful living/dining zone leading out to low maintenance entertainers courtyard garden
- Ducted heating/cooling and alarm system
Wide residential street, stroll to station and emerging Johnston Street cafes, restaurants and night life scene, St Heliers Street Gallery and Collingwood Childrens Farm.
Adjacent to Victoria Park community oval, Dights Falls, Yarra river, bush walks and bike trails at your door.
The beautiful home offers the perfect inner city lifestyle and all the hard work has been done!

Establish city life, your way in this 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment that's located close to the CBD, public transport, Yarra Bend parkland, Studley Park Golf Course as well as the vibrant Victoria Street restaurant district.
Flooded with natural light, this sophisticated home features a sleek kitchen with an island and Miele appliances, generous living and dining area, main bedroom with BIRs and ensuite, 2 modern main bathrooms, European laundry, split-system heating and cooling, secure basement car space and storage cage.

Description:
Vendor Must Sell! Make an offer!
Aptly named for its peaceful position, this elevated 8th floor two bedroom apartment within 'Sanctuary' represents a luxurious and convenient lifestyle opportunity. Beautifully appointed, with picturesque Easterly views and eucalypt and Yarra River outlooks and situated at the rear of this award winning development, accommodation includes an open plan living room complemented by a spacious riverside terrace which wraps around the apartment to capture CBD Views, featuring a stylish kitchen with Bosch appliances, stone benchtops and mirror glass splashbacks. Two deluxe robed bedrooms, the main with spacious ensuite.
Complemented by features such as a well-appointed bathroom, heating, cooling, Euro laundry, lift access, large storage cage and one garage space. A quiet, secluded location positions Victoria Gardens, the nearby bustle of Victoria Street, Bridge Road and excellent transport links within easy reach, as well as handy onsite community facilities including swimming pool, gym, spa, sauna, cinema/entertainment room and residents' rooftop with magnificent views.

Description:
City Living Perfectly Positioned in Nature
Perfectly positioned between the banks of the iconic Yarra River and the convenience of eclectic Victoria Street, this wonderfully designed apartment is an ideal city edge first home, weekender or considered investment with an approximate rental return of $340 per week. Enjoy the best of both worlds, with instant access to natural bushland and green space, together with the vibrancy of this exhilarating neighbourhood.
Welcoming low-maintenance timber floors, open plan living and dining area, undercover balcony, quality fittings and fixtures throughout and a flexible floorplan make this apartment a must-inspect! A beautiful stone kitchen is flattered by quality stainless steel appliances including integrated dishwasher and smart storage. The queen-sized bedroom has built in robes, whilst the exquisite bathroom has plenty of discreet cupboard space.
The location offers the best of both worlds: nature and convenience. A short stroll will have you enjoying Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Yarra Bend hiking and bike trails, the green space of Flockhart Reserve, iconic restaurants & shops of Victoria Street, Richmond and Collingwood whilst public transport, grocery, childcare and cafes are on your doorstep. All this a few kilometres from Melbourne CBD!
"8 GROSVENOR" proudly provides residents with luxury resort-style living: an indoor heated pool, landscaped gardens, gymnasium and onsite building manager.

Address: Ground Floor Unit 5/6 Acacia Pl Abbotsford VIC 3067
Description:
Riverfront Serenity
This apartment offers riverside tranquility, modern apartment living, and metropolitan conveniences, to ensure an optimal inner-city lifestyle. With the Yarra Trail only steps away from your front door, keeping an active lifestyle is inspired.
Beautifully presented throughout, this ground floor, two-bedroom apartment in the sought-after Haven development features quality Miele appliances, smoky mirror splash back, elegantly tiled bathrooms and mirrored robes in both bedrooms. A full-width, undercover balcony guarantees a constant, soothing outlook and offers valuable outside space for entertaining a few or many.
Additional apartment features include a private northerly aspect, undercover parking & storage, onsite concierge and two delectable cafes, Kitty Burns and Frankie Says, right on your doorstep. Two residents gym, sauna, lap pool, sun deck, multiple relaxing lounge areas and a outdoor fireplace further add to the resort-style ambience of the Haven lifestyle.
A quick stroll to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre for retail and grocery needs or hop on a city-bound tram to access Victoria Streets vibrant food culture and mouthwatering eateries.

Address: Ground Floor Unit 5/6 Acacia Pl Abbotsford VIC 3067
Description:
North facing riverfront luxury
Find your inner city Haven.
Located on the edge of the Yarra, Haven On The River is an award winning development providing residents with exclusive resident facilities and is conveniently located only moments to walking & bike trails, Riverfront cafes, Victoria Gardens shopping precinct and the 109 tram at your doorstep.
Featuring a north facing, open plan and larger than usual floor plan, providing for zoned lounge and dining areas. Floor to ceiling glass windows and doors provide an abundance of natural light and an effortless florw to the sheltered entertainers size balcony with views to the treetops and the Yarra River.
The contemporary kitchen is very well appointed with a large island bench, an integrated fridge, stainless steel Miele appliances, gas cooking, dishwasher, stone bench tops and a plethora of cupboard space. Two double bedrooms with mirrored built in robes, the main with an ensuite bathroom and the second with balcony access. The functional layout is complimented by a central bathroom, laundry facilities and additional storage in the hallway, ducted reverse cycle air conditioning, secure intercom entry and a basement car park plus storage cage.
Residents enjoy the use of a secure and luxurious lobby entrance with fire place, concierge located moments away, swimming pool, gym, sauna, therapy room and a communal rooftop recreational area with lounge and BBQ area.
An ideal opportunity for the owner occupier to secure their private piece of riverfront luxury, ready to move in January 2020 when the current tenancy agreement expires.

Description:
Luxurious Single Level Living with Tranquil Yarra River Setting
Superbly positioned up high on the 3rd floor with relaxing views over the Yarra River, historical Victoria Bridge and leafy Gum Tree surrounds, is this exclusive three bedroom, two bathroom residence completely surrounded by unique private roof top garden of approx 173m² within the prestigious Sanctuary Building creating an envious lifestyle.
This sun filled apartment offers open plan living and dining with a gas fireplace, custom joinery and sliding doors transitioning on to a stunning low maintenance roof top terrace with dining deck, lounge area and landscaped garden including veggie patch. An entertainers stone kitchen features Miele appliances including an integrated fridge and dishwasher, stone island bench with breakfast bar and ample cupboard space.
The three fitted bedrooms all open onto the terrace, main bedroom has a walk-in robe and ensuite with luxurious finishes including stunning bathtub.
Fastidious appointments include secure basement parking for two cars with lift access, one huge storage cage, Oak flooring, separate laundry, zoned central heating and air conditioning.
Residents of the Sanctuary Building enjoy the outdoor heated swimming pool with spa and lounge area, two gymnasiums, resident roof top entertaining terrace with barbecue facilities and cinema, 7 day concierge service and direct access to the Yarra river bike and walking trails.
This incredible river setting is located just 3.5 kilometres from Melbournes CBD, you can enjoy a cosmopolitan lifestyle of complete convenience with Victoria Gardens across the road, trams at your front door, fabulous cafes by the River and in every direction and Richmond and Kew Junction close by.

Description:
"Denton Mills"
An oversized sanctuary of light-filled luxury with the best of quirky Abbotsford at your doorstep, this one-of-a-kind and expansive (76sqm apprx) ground-floor apartment boasts rarely found proportions and dimensions, premium inclusions and some truly unique design elements. Towering square-set ceilings throughout provide generous amounts of natural light, air and a genuine sense of space. The considerable living/ding area is surrounded by floor-to-ceiling windows and is large enough to create a designated workstation or reading nook and cater for the grandest of dining tables and sofa's. Bespoke in-built shelving and roller blinds complete this voluminous area. The large Queen size Master bedroom is light filled with full-width mirrored robes and plush carpeting, light pours in from the decked courtyard. The central bathroom is coloured in fashionable biscuit & oatmeal tones with stone-top vanity and walk in double shower. A stylish galley kitchen featuring crisp snow-white cabinetry, cherry red glass splashbacks, sleek stone benchtops, stainless steel cooking appliances (DW) and exceptional cupboard space is cleverly segmented. Beyond lies a full wall of integrated cupboards providing always sought-after storage space, an exclusive feature adding another unique element. An uncommon and very handy design feature is your own private 'back door' leading off the kitchen hallway with direct access to the lower-level parking space and storage cage and bike racks. Other highlights of this distinctive residence include stacker sliding doors from the living area to a private high-walled courtyard, as well as split-system heating and cooling for all-seasons comfort, stylish timber floors, discreet laundry facilities, plus intercom/secure entry. A true inner-city lifestyle awaits you in this colourful precinct. "Three Bags Full" fulfils your caffeine needs, within a short stroll lies the buzz of Victoria Street with its endless shops and renowned eateries, the Yarra River trails and parkland are just minutes away. Pop around the corner to the local Woolworths and Aldi, or perhaps head up Langridge Street to Smith & Gertude streets to enjoy what this wonderfully convenient position offers. BIG one-bedroom apartment's partcilaury on the ground floor are almost impossible to find, this one is just in time for Christmas! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Internal area
76m²

Description:
Bright Style, Uninterrupted Views
Ideally suited to the professional lifestyle and eminently attractive to investors, this is a superb elevated apartment with a stunning outlook, right on Victoria Street for the fast-paced, trendy Abbotsford lifestyle. Come inside and discover amazing, uninterrupted views of the city and beyond.
- Delight in the beautiful open-plan living and dining area with a gorgeous north-oriented atrium style balcony.
- Caesarstone kitchen with Miele gas cooktop and dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
- Master suite with striking city views, two more double beds, second fully tiled bathroom.
- The complex offers a swimming pool and gymnasium as well as a full-time building manager.
- Two secure tandem car spaces and a storage cage.
- Video intercom security, concealed laundry, ducted heating and cooling and split system in the living area.
Fabulous shopping, cafes and restaurants and an easy tram trip to the CBD all within minutes of your door.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.
The information about this property has been supplied to us by the property owner, while we have no cause to doubt its accuracy, we provide no guarantee. We cannot attest to the functionality of any fixtures, fittings or inclusions to the property. Land and apartment dimensions and floor/site plans are supplied by third parties. Typing mistakes, omissions, transposing can occur, we provide to assist but make no representation. Buyers must carry out their own due diligence.

Description:
UNDER OFFER
Secluded and secure in the heart of Abbotsford, this amazing corner apartment delivers an inner-city lifestyle like no other with its impressive floorplan, premium features throughout and uninterrupted views over the Yarra River and lush riverside parklands. Executive perfection, the home's light-filled interior showcases two genuinely large bedrooms (both with built-in robes), stylish master ensuite and main central bathroom. Add to this a superb kitchen with stone benchtops/splashbacks, Smeg cooking appliances and integrated dishwasher, plus an open-plan living/dining area flanked by floor-to-ceiling windows leading out to a full-width fully-undercover terrace to relax and enjoy the sublime outlook. Other highlights include a dedicated study alcove with built-in workstation, heating and cooling, square-set ceilings and concealed laundry facilities, as well as a lower-level car space and storage cage, plus exclusive residents' facilities including indoor lap pool, fully-equipped gymnasium and podium-level garden/entertaining area. Endless river trails virtually at your doorstep, it's also walking distance to Victoria Street trams, cool cafes and restaurants, boutique shops and Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, as well as easy access to Abbotsford Convent and the Epworth medical precinct.

Description:
Outstanding opportunity to renovate and update
Edwardian charm is coupled with enormous potential in this conveniently positioned Abbotsford residence. Positioned at the end of a cul de sac with high cathedral ceilings, a versatile floorplan and generous proportions, this utterly unique abode holds exciting scope to update and renovate into an outstanding family home (STCA). An open plan living area incorporates a large kitchen zone, opening out to a courtyard with scope for a tranquil alfresco entertaining spaces. Two spacious bedrooms with period elements are accompanied by an ensuite main. A second bathroom, versatile loft area with enclosed balcony, laundry and parking for one car completes the home. In excellently close proximity to North Richmond train station, Victoria Street shops and cafes, Fitzroy Gardens and Yarra River walking trails.

Description:
Love the Location, Cherish the Contemporary Charm
Find your new inner city home with this exceptional 2 bedroom apartment placed in the popular Precinct' complex, which promises a living experience that is stylish, contemporary, and relaxed.
- Take advantage of building facilities that include an indoor pool, gym, child care centre, and Eden and Mila's Gourmet Eatery café.
- Enjoy everyday activities in the open plan lounge and meals zone.
- Prepare meals in the sleek stone kitchen which features a tiled splashback and full Miele appliances.
- Both bedrooms comes with built-in robes, sleek bathroom, European laundry.
- Charming balcony has great entertaining potential or can be used for relaxed meals and drinks.
- Secure intercom entry and secure car space.
This wonderful location is just a few minutes by foot to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre as well as a diverse selection of restaurants on Victoria Street. You're also not far from gorgeous Yarra River parklands with walk and bike paths, North Richmond Station, and trams on Victoria Street transporting you into the CBD.

Description:
Expressions Of Interest
Chic style with the city at your doorstep
Ideally situated between the banks of the iconic Yarra River and the convenience of Victoria Street in Abbotsford, this thoughtfully designed apartment is the perfect amalgamation of urban green oasis and city-edge living. Commute to work via bike on the Capital City Trail, or jump on a tram practically on your doorstep.
As you step inside, you're welcomed by the open plan living and dining area. A designer kitchen features quality Miele appliances, fittings, and smart storage. Offering a spacious two bedroom design with a shared bathroom and private balcony. Bonus features include heating/cooling, European-style laundry, video intercom, and a secure car space.
The position offers the best of both worlds: nature and convenience. Moments from Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Yarra Bend hiking and bike trails, famed restaurants & shops of Victoria Street, Richmond and Collingwood whilst trams, grocery, child care and cafe are ideally located at your door.
"Precinct" features everything you'd expect from luxury city-edge living: an indoor 20 metre swimming pool, landscaped gardens, fully equipped gymnasium, on-site Café, on-site child care centre, and manicured gardens.
Contact Agent for Private Inspection

Description:
Heritage appeal meets modern inspiration in the ultimate lifestyle location
Unique for its heritage significance as part of the reinvented Denton Mills Hat Factory (c1874)- an iconic Abbotsford landmark, this contemporary 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment is an extremely rare offering of historical significance. Behind the imposing three-storey façade resides this ultimate urban pad, featuring a massive living/dining room, open-plan Miele kitchen, Euro laundry, secure double car space, video-monitored entry, heating, air conditioning, excellent storage, floorboards and high ceilings. Pick up a coffee at top-rated Three Bags Full Café on the doorstep before walking to The Hive Shopping Centre, Victoria Street, Collingwood Station, trams, the Yarra River and Browns Reserve.
