Description:
Endless Potential, Moments from Parkland
Promising a lifestyle of convenience with easy access to the CBD and the Yarra River trails, this attractive semi-detached period terrace provides an immediately comfortable home along with exciting value-adding renovation potential. Poised behind a picket fence, a welcoming front verandah provides a delightful spot to enjoy a morning coffee. Inside, the large master bedroom offers built in robes, a central bathroom is equipped with full laundry facilities, the neatly presented kitchen features gas cooking and overlooks the north facing lounge room which opens to a private wrap-around courtyard offering plenty of space for entertaining. An additional upstairs bedroom boasts an in-built study nook and the home is complete with gas heating and excellent internal storage. Superbly positioned close to the Abbotsford Convent, Collingwood Childrens Farm, Studley Park Boathouse and Collingwood Station.

Description:
Secluded & spacious overlooking the Yarra: urban living with a unique bushland ambience
With tranquil views over the river and surrounding bushland, this spacious apartment combines inner urban convenience with rural tranquillity. Just a short walk to the serenity of Yarra Bend Park, the Convent Arts precinct, vibrant Abbotsford cafes and Victoria Park Station, this corner residence is set to the rear of a well-maintained development. With terraces to two levels and a vast storage room, it comprises an expansive living/dining room open to a well equipped kitchen (Smeg appliances, pantry) and full-width terrace; two double bedrooms (BIRs, ensuite to main), both with terrace access; study, second bathroom and powder room/laundry. Including two secure car spaces, two storage cages and lift entry, this exceptional property features zoned air conditioning.

Description:
Timeless charm, unmatched convenience
Combining period character and contemporary style, this renovated Victorian terrace provides a sophisticated home superbly positioned in the heart of Abbotsford. With sleek finishes, ornamental period elements and spectacular views, enjoy a cosmopolitan lifestyle in a convenient location. A spacious living area, featuring an inbuilt desk, cabinetry and an open fireplace, opens out to a private leafy courtyard, creating a charming alfresco entertaining space. The bright kitchen is coupled with a formal dining area with an open fireplace and access to a lightwell courtyard. A generous main bedroom incorporates built in robes, breathtaking city views and accompanied by two additional expansive bedrooms. A contemporary bathroom includes a shower and European laundry. Rear laneway access completes the home. Situated moments from bustling Victoria Street, with Victoria Gardens shopping centre, North Richmond train station and Yarra River walking trails close by.

Description:
Stunning modern townhouse with a rooftop entertaining terrace
Enjoying a highly desirable address in the heart of Abbotsford, this stunning townhouse has been tailored for contemporary living with a bespoke industrial design by Jackson Clement Burrows. It is placed strolling distance to village cafes, Yarra Bend Park, Collingwood station, city buses and trams, and walking distance to vibrant Smith Street. The ground floor entrance flows to a large bedroom with built-ins, sleek bathroom and automatic single garage with ROW access. Upstairs is a king sized master bedroom with a wall of built-ins and plush twin ensuite, bright third bedroom with built-ins, sparkling bathroom with a shower over a bath, and European laundry. Flooded in light on the second floor is an elegant living area, dining area with a study nook and gourmet kitchen with stainless steel benchtops, a breakfast bar and premium Gaggenau fixtures including induction cooking. It also has a front balcony that leads to a glorious sun soaked rooftop entertaining terrace with leafy district views and a barbeque area connected to gas. Features include split system a/c, gas hot water, video intercom, hardwood floors and a watertank.

Description:
Elegantly renovated balcony terrace, select address
The best of both worlds! This classic Victorian residence combines period grace with light-filled contemporary style. In a quiet neighbourhood close to train and tram transport, the Convent Arts precinct and tranquil Gahan Reserve, the home, entered from an arched hallway, offers three well-separated double bedrooms (BIRs); an expansive living/dining room with gabled ceiling, gas log fire and northerly light court, flowing to an entertaining deck and ROW-access courtyard; designer kitchen (Carrara marble benchtops, premium appliances and pantry); stylish bathroom (bath and dual-head shower), and laundry/powder room. Features of this welcoming home include polished timber floors and other period detail, reverse-cycle air conditioning and back to base security.

Description:
SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437
***SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437***Independently accessed by its own elegant courtyard, complemented by refined contemporary style, security, a substantial gym, superb indoor lap pool and on site building management, this great ground level apartment offers every inner city advantage associated with 'The Precinct'. A living/dining area featuring split system heating/cooling and attractive courtyard outlooks is adjoined by a kitchen zone where Miele appliances, stone surfaces and a movable island bench make the quality instantly clear while 2 inviting double bedrooms share a designer bathroom. Enjoy an address that has re-defined Abbotsford living - and investing - only moments from Victoria Street tram routes, North Richmond Station, the bike tracks and walking trails that border the Yarra River and the total convenience of Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre including cafes and restaurants, and only 10 mins to Melbourne's CBD A perfect investment (currently tenanted), perfect first home, perfect for downsizers, perfect for all.
My Agent Real Estate, a boutique agency offering a high level of service and innovative Real Estate practices to our clients right across Melbourne. Contact Adriano on 0402 055 437, or visit our web site www.myagentre.com.au where you can see all our listings and apply for our properties on line.

Description:
$300,000
Make the most of this one bedroom 'Eden on the River' apartment, ideal for smart investors or owner occupiers seeking a relaxed and comfortable low maintenance apartment moments to Victoria Gardens and Victoria Street restaurants.
Fitted with stylish stone bench tops and floor-to-ceiling windows, this 6th floor retreat features a bright central living zone which opens out to a sun filled balcony where you can take in the serene views while enjoying an alfresco meal or Sunday morning coffee.
The kitchen has sleek cabinetry and stainless steel Miele appliances including an integrated dishwasher, while the bedroom enjoys mirrored built-in robes and timber shutter sliding doors for an open or private way of living. Other standout features include a stylish bathroom with laundry facilities, split-system heating and cooling, video intercom and storage cage.
The resort-style facilities of Eden are simply stunning and include a lobby bar, lounge with fireplace and business centre on the ground floor, rooftop terrace with river and city views, BBQs, movie lounge with large screen TV, boardroom and the 'Health and Well-Being Retreat' featuring a heated lap pool, spa, sundeck, gym, sauna, and therapy room.
Trams at your doorstep make going into the city an absolute breeze, while you're only moments to Yarra River walking and bike paths, Yarra Bend Park, schools, local shops and cafes, buses and North Richmond Station.
For Due Diligence, please refer to consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Redefined Luxury, Remarkable Lifestyle
Victorian by name, stunning by design; this freestanding, two-level residence is redefined luxury beyond expectations and beyond compare. Every element of this recently-completed home has been executed to perfection for a low-upkeep lifestyle of inner-city bliss. Custom-built storage, double-glazed windows/doors, French Oak flooring and full security with video intercom, alarm and CCTV brilliantly enhance the light-laden interior with stack-slide doors revealing a beautifully landscaped courtyard featuring plumbed BBQ, entertainment terrace and remote-control door (ROW). Quietly located near Yarra parklands/trails, cafe/restaurant precincts and train station; this outstanding contemporary residence boasts spectacular entrance hall, three stylish bedrooms (BIRs; main with WIR, ensuite and views), fitted open study, amazing living and dining room, striking black Smeg-equipped stone kitchen, two chic bathrooms, laundry, ducted heating/cooling, NBN and attic storage.

Description:
Secure & convenient - Ideal first home or investment
Securely nestled in a boutique development of only ten, this charming first floor apartment is the perfect entry point into one of Melbourne's most prized inner-city locations.
Filled with natural light, the apartment comprises an open plan living / dining, modern kitchen, spacious double bedroom (with BIR), bathroom with laundry facility, gas heater and covered off-street parking.
Positioned at the leafy end of Charles Street within easy walking distance to an array of bars and local cafes, Abbotsford Convent Arts Precinct, Collingwood Children's Farm and Yarra Trails. Train, tram and bus only minutes away.

Description:
Tranquil, resort-style living on the banks of the Yarra River
This extraordinary blend of riverside tranquility, stylish, modern apartment living, and metropolitan conveniences ensures an optimal inner-city lifestyle with a focus on relaxation and outdoor activities - with the Yarra Trail only steps away from your front door. Beautifully presented throughout, this stylish fourth-floor, two-bedroom apartment in the sought-after Haven development features quality Miele appliances, smoky mirror splash back, elegantly tiled bathrooms and mirrored robes in both bedrooms. A full-width, undercover balcony guarantees a constant, soothing outlook and offers valuable outside space for entertaining a few or many. Additional apartment features include a northerly aspect, undercover parking & storage, onsite concierge and two delectable cafes, Kitty Burns and Frankie Says, right on your doorstep. Residents gym, sauna, lap pool, sun deck, multiple relaxing lounge areas and a outdoor fireplace further add to the resort-style ambience of the Haven lifestyle. Simply stroll to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre for retail and grocery needs or hop on a city-bound tram to access Victoria Streets vibrant food culture and mouthwatering eateries. This wonderful pool side apartment is perfect for downsizers, savvy Air BnB investors or the ideal City base for outer towners.
Insights: 406/6 Acacia Place, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2019 and 94 other 2 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Rare Jewel in the Apartment Market
Extra-large corner apartment.200 METRES OF RIVER VIEW AND BUSHLAND + VERY LARGE BALCONY +
View, view, view this Rare Jewel in the Apartment Market with never-ending river view, Massive stunning balcony around and sophisticated extra-large floor plan NOT going to last for long.
Regarded address by renowned Bruch Henderson Architects over entertaining with the Yarra and the native bush of Yarra Bend Park as a brilliant backdrop, and still not far from Melbourne CBD.
You would love it all once you view, Designed so that contemporary refinement complements a river-side setting where bushland serenity provides a beautiful accompaniment to total convenience.
Includes low maintenance oak floors, reverse cycle heating/cooling and a Caesar-stone, stainless steel fitted kitchen, amazing view from any window and the massive balcony,
The stylish and sophisticated extra-large apartment also includes - open-plan living that flows to the stunning large balcony and fantastic views. This should be on the top of your list.
Set back from the hustle and bustle of Trenerry Crescent, take advantage of river fitness trails, easy access to the CBD and walking distance to Abbotsford Convent and Melbourne's finest restaurants. This is superior inner-city living with all the lifestyle benefits

Description:
JUST A STONE'S THROW AWAY FROM THE ABBOTSFORD CONVENT AND YARRA RIVER TRAILS
This third floor one bedroom apartment, measuring approximately 50 square metres internally, is located in the highly regarded Hank Dye building and features views of the historic Abbotsford Convent.
Track lighting and wide timber floors provide a clean and modern style to the bright open plan living area as does the stone bench tops, stainless steel Blanco appliances and gas cook top in the kitchen.
Other features include excellent robe space in the bedroom, sparkling large bathroom with laundry facilities, reverse cycle air-conditioning, secure parking and storage cage.
Positioned in a prime city edge location close to the serenity of the Yarra River and Abbotsford Convent Farmers Market, but also with close proximity to vibrant Victoria and Smith streets, the apartment will appeal to both owner occupiers and investors alike.
An added bonus for investors is the existing lease until 21st October, 2020 at $361 per week.
For further information please contact:
Nick Walters of Kingsford Property - The Apartment Specialists
0438 557 885
nick@kingsfordproperty.com.au

Description:
'Roseville': Victorian warmth & character with 2 street frontages
With an ornate pedimented facade and a northerly outlook to the reserve adjoining Victoria Park, this light-filled residence has been lovingly maintained by its owner of 40 years. In comfortable condition, with scope to enhance and to create a studio above a garage opening to Federation Lane (STCA), the home offers two double bedrooms opening from an arched hallway; striking stone-tiled bathroom with semi-glazed ceiling; spacious living room with library shelving, opening to a light well, dining area, neat functional kitchen (walk-in pantry); plus laundry facilities and 2nd WC. Including a sunny rear deck, courtyard oasis and viewing platform, this welcoming home close to the Convent Arts precinct, public transport and Yarra trails features classic period detail and split-system air conditioning throughout.

Description:
Total Living Package, plus Free Car!
Picture yourself coming home to the ideal calm oasis for the busy professional. Perfect for homeowners and investors alike, the Eden apartments are a gracefully designed paradise right on the banks of the Yarra River. The luxurious complex facilities include a full-length swimming pool, two spas, two gymnasiums, a cinema room and rooftop kitchen and terrace, as well as great cafes. Enjoy the peace of mind of a 24-hour concierge and secure underground parking.
This brilliant apartment comes with the added bonus of a free Mazda!
Discover stylish open-plan living and dining served by an elegant stone-dressed kitchen with Miele stainless appliances, all opening out to a huge private terrace ideal for a big party with friends!
Relax in the good-sized double bedroom with built-in robes and a stylish fully-tiled bathroom with concealed laundry. With beautiful Yarra River parklands and trails just metres away, this sensational residence is a short ride on the tram (#109 at your door) into the CBD and everything that central Melbourne has to offer.
Features:
* Chic open-plan living and dining
* Huge private terrace for entertaining
* Stylish kitchen
* Double bedroom with BIR
* Stylish fully-tiled bathroom
* Complete lifestyle building
* Pool, gyms, cinema, rooftop terrace
* Secure parking
* 24-hr concierge
* Intercom security
* Yarra parklands metres away
* CBD minutes away on tram

Description:
Eden - Sophisticated Luxury Living
Situated in the sophisticated Eden development, this luxurious apartment boasts breathtaking city views and contemporary design in a superb location. The open plan living and dining area opens onto the balcony showcasing views of the city and lush greenery, adjoining a large stylish, chef's kitchen equipped with Miele appliances and stone benchtops. Both spacious bedrooms are fitted with built in robes, with one featuring a sleek ensuite with impressive dimensions and the other filled with sunlight. A second elegant bathroom is complemented by a European laundry and additional storage in the hallway. Also includes secure underground parking space, communal rooftop retreat and access to a health and fitness centre. Perfectly positioned with Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Yarra River walking trails and plentiful public transport moments away.

Description:
Historic warehouse surrounds, stunning locale
Superbly positioned, this appealing residence offers sophisticated, low maintenance inner city living. Situated within the historic former Yarra Mills, enjoy the residence's impressive city views and generous dimensions. A bright open plan living and dining area adjoins a balcony with alfresco dining space and outlooks towards the city and Victoria Park. A well appointed kitchen features a suite of Smeg appliances including gas cooktop, over and dishwasher, a European laundry and access to a second balcony. Both spacious bedrooms feature built in robes and reverse cycle air-conditioning. There are also two large full bathrooms with stone benchtops, ample storage and skylights. A secure parking space with a large storage cage completes the home. Situated directly opposite Victoria Park, with Yarra River walking trails, Dights Falls and Johnston Street shops and bars, trains and buses close by

Description:
North-facing Urban Retreat with Stunning Treetop Vistas
Ideally situated between the Yarra River and the cultural vibrancy and convenience of Victoria Street, this wonderfully modern apartment is the perfect combination of luxury city-edge living and urban oasis.
Fantastic timber flooring features throughout the open plan living and dining area, providing the perfect canvas to compose your dream space. The thoughtfully designed kitchen boasts smart storage, marble style splashback, stone bench-tops and quality appliances. The absolute highlight is the north-facing full-length balcony providing beautiful green vistas across the treetops of the adjacent Andrew's Reserve and Yarra Boulevard.
An oversized master bedroom showcases a private ensuite, built in robes and a dedicated study nook. The stunning central bathroom features floor to roof tiling, with elegant fittings and fixtures. The second bedroom enjoys a charming outlook, together with built in robes. Bonus features include secure car space, reverse cycle heating/cooling and European laundry.
The locale offers the best of both worlds: the convenience of urban living, plus the treetop views and green space of nature. Moments from Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Yarra Bend hiking and bike trails, famed restaurants & shops of Victoria Street, and the cultural hubs of Richmond and Collingwood; whilst trams, trains and all of the inner city conveniences expected are a just a short stroll away.
The sought-after complex features everything you'd expect from luxury city-edge living: an indoor heated pool with stunning river vistas, landscaped gardens, bicycle storage, gymnasium and residents' barbecue area.

Description:
Best of Both Worlds: the River and the City
Ideally situated between the banks of the iconic Yarra River and the convenience of Victoria Street in Abbotsford, this thoughtfully designed apartment is the perfect amalgamation of urban green oasis and city-edge living. Commute to work via bike on the Capital City Trail, or jump on a tram practically on your doorstep.
As you step inside, you're welcomed by immaculate timber flooring, providing a sense of richness to the open plan living and dining area. A designer kitchen features quality appliances, fittings, separate pantry and smart storage. The spacious master bedroom boasts its own private balcony, modern ensuite and study area, whilst the neutral main bathroom is a lesson in classic elegance. Bonus features include heating/cooling, European-style laundry and a secure car space.
The position offers the best of both worlds: nature and convenience. Moments from Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Yarra Bend hiking and bike trails, famed restaurants & shops of Victoria Street, Richmond and Collingwood whilst trams, grocery, child care and cafe are ideally located at your door.
"Precinct" features everything you'd expect from luxury city-edge living: an indoor heated pool, landscaped gardens, gymnasium and building manager.

STUNNINGLY RENOVATED FREESTANDING VICTORIAN
Ideal floor plan for contemporary lifestyle.
Wonderful location, quiet and neighbourly with Gahan Reserve, transport, Collingwood Childrens Farm and local cafes all at your door. A beautiful home you will immediately fall in love with!

- Sundrenched open plan kitchen and living with cathedral ceiling leading out to decked, low maintenance courtyard garden
- Contemporary kitchen with stone bench tops, marble splashback and stainless steel appliances

- Central heating and reverse cycle cooling; double glazed extension

- Rent potential up to $850 per week ($44,200pa)
Outstanding location, only 4 doors down from Gahan Reserve with St Heliers art/culture precinct and an abundance of cafes and restaurants at your door.

Photo ID and contact details are required at all open for inspections.

Description:
Contemporary style and luxury, surrounded by endless lifestyle amenity
Secure, stylish and spacious, this contemporary three-bedroom town residence delivers an effortless indoor-outdoor lifestyle amid the infinite lifestyle indulgences of its community-focussed, city-fringe locale.
With secure pedestrian entry from Abbott Street and vehicular entry via Federation Lane plus additional secure basement parking, the homes impeccable location enjoys the Yarra River parklands, Victoria Parks family recreation and sports precinct, and an endless array of cafés, restaurants, bars, sports, transport and shopping destinations at its threshold.
Filled with natural light, the zoned layout is welcomed by a spacious lounge area followed by a vast meals/ living room flowing into a north-facing alfresco courtyard with option for secure parking. A central neat and tidy kitchen effortlessly caters to guests with a wide breakfast bar and a full appointment of appliances among its abundant cabinetry.
Providing two lavishly sized robed bedrooms including a luxurious master with ensuite, plus a third guest bedroom or home office, plus a sparkling central bathroom, the home is completed with plenty of storage, a European laundry and the comfort of split system air-conditioning for a stress-free, lock-and-leave lifestyle.
Insights: 4 Federation Lane, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2019 and 27 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary warehouse conversion with yesteryear charm
Character-filled and entirely captivating, this first floor, two-bedroom two-bathroom loft warehouse conversion spectacularly balances its industrial origins with contemporary functionality and flair. Inside, youll immediately be struck by the beautifully preserved industrial beams, dramatically-high slanting ceilings and just enough exposed brick to remind you of this homes origins which previously housed a textile company. Imagine spending your wintery days in front of the woodfired heater with the sun streaming through the large metal framed windows! Tasmanian Oak flooring, stylish light fittings and plenty of natural light create a welcoming and warm inviting space. An open plan living and dining zone embraces guests with astounding space in the comfort of split-system air-conditioning. The modern kitchen befits the warehouse charm with plenty of cupboards, a large pantry, stainless-steel appliances and stone-topped benches. Above the kitchen is a flexible and generous-sized mezzanine floor which could house an office or spare bedroom. Both carpeted bedrooms have a northerly aspect, excellent storage - the main is fitted with a walk-in robe, bright ensuite with large shower and undercover balcony, perfect to enjoy a morning coffee. Complemented by a secure single car garage (two parking permits available) and the possibility of adding a large rooftop terrace (STCA) this picture-perfect warehouse is not to be missed. Ideally positioned in Abbotsfords most sought-after street and just 2.5kms from the CBD, this peaceful sanctuary incites a lifestyle of recreation with the Yarra River & surrounding green spaces, Abbotsford Convent and many cafes and bars all within walking distance. This lovely piece of contemporized yesteryear charm will not disappoint.
Insights: 2/2A Mollison Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2019 and 94 other 2 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Vibrant, visionary inner city spaces
A seamless combination of classical refinement and contemporary style creates an exemplary family residence. Immaculately preserved Victorian features are complemented by streamlined finishes, offering sophisticated living in a vibrant location. A stylish open plan domain enhanced by desirable north west orientation flows out through bifold doors to a tranquil rear deck with Zen garden and fish pond. The sleek kitchen is appointed with European appliances including gas cooktop, oven and integrated dishwasher. Two generous bedrooms feature open fireplaces including an ensuite main equipped with built in robes, freestanding bath and rain shower, accompanied by a third spacious bedroom with robes. A chic central bathroom with a walk in shower, a European laundry and a single carport completes the home. Positioned in close proximity to Abbotsford Primary School, Victoria Street shops and amenities, Yarra River walking trails and North Richmond train station. Note: No heritage overlay and GRZ2 zoning

Lifestyle, elegance, entertainment and convenience
Situated in a sensational lifestyle location, this perfectly positioned period residence offers stylishly updated interiors and a flexible floorplan featuring superb zoning. Effortlessly combining traditional charm with inspired contemporary style, soaring high ceilings accentuate the sense of space throughout. Baltic pine floors flow through the hallway past two generous bedrooms, each equipped with built in robes. Expansive open plan living and dining awash with natural light adjoins a sleek kitchen fitted with timber benches and European appliances including gas cooktop and dishwasher, while a sizeable sun drenched courtyard with built in bench seating presents the perfect backdrop for entertaining. In the heart of Abbotsford, enjoy close proximity to cafes and restaurants on Victoria Street, transport and abundant walking and bike trails along the Yarra River. Description:
Prime Property In Sought After Abbotsford
A former textile mill and now coveted inner urban home, this impressive architecturally converted development occupies a rare riverside position opposite Victoria Park. With easy access to city bound trains, and the best of Abbotsfords cafe, bar and retail scene nearby, owner occupiers and investors alike will appreciate its many charms.
Along with an impressive foyer and attractive landscaping around the preserved original chimney stack, the level 5 apartment offers an open plan design with timber floors, a classic neutral interior and plenty of natural light from full height glazing. Comprising two elegant Queen sized bedrooms, master boasting WIR and chic en-suite, the second offering BIRs. The central bathroom has stylish designer tiling and includes a euro laundry, while a space enhancing kitchen with stone counters, Miele appliances and good storage services the dining/lounge zone. Cultivate your herb garden on the expansive balcony or just enjoy the extra entertainment space in this thoroughly contemporary property that ticks all the boxes with heating/cooling, secure entry and allocated garaged parking.

Description:
Exclusive luxury top floor living with city views
A triumph of architectural excellence within the converted St Joseph's School c1893, this luxury top floor residence is 1 of only 6 where brilliantly designed space and high-end quality rise with stylish confidence to city skyline views. Spectacularly chic and spacious embraced by rich heritage character, this 2-level home affords a remarkable lifestyle in a dynamic city-edge pocket just seconds to the Yarra, cafes, restaurants, shops and trains. This first-class 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home reveals an unsurpassed level of refinement including main bedroom with ensuite and balcony (shared with 2nd bedroom), stunning living and dining area opening to high-wall courtyard, excellent Miele kitchen with Dekton benchtops and ducted heating/cooling. Also offers basement car space and storage cage.

Description:
"Two Girls" - A boutique lifestyle
Enjoy a fantastic inner city lifestyle in this light filled apartment in one of Abbotsford most talked about boutique developments, "Two Girls". Winner of Best National Medium Density Award (MBA) and Best Victorian Apartment Complex (HIA), the distinctive Digiglass and patterned precast façade is merely the start of the building's story and the theme continues internally with every common area featuring artwork of some description. Comprising, entrance hall, open plan living/dining opening to balcony, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, bedroom with built in robes and dedicated study area also enjoying direct access to a light well, sparkling bathroom, Euro laundry, reverse cycle heating/cooling and locked storage cage. This property is superbly located less than 2kms from the CBD and is only minutes' walk to the Yarra River, Studley Park, Abbotsford Convent, Victoria Street restaurants and shopping precinct and access to all forms of public transport.

Description:
The Place & The Space To Build Your Dream
Perfectly positioned in one of inner-Melbourne's most dynamic riverside pockets; be the one & bring your best to this superb site with excellent rear laneway access to St Phillips Street. The currently derelict timber dwelling is on an enticing parcel of level land (268 sqm approx.) this unique Abbotsford opening presents endless opportunity to rebuild or redevelop (STCA). Imagine the possibilities and make it a reality within easy walking distance to Yarra River parkland and trails, local cafes, the Convent Arts Precinct, Collingwood station (3 stops to the MCG and 4 to the city!) and the popular retail-restaurant precincts of Richmond and Fitzroy. An absolute Abbotsford one of a kind ready for a stunning architectural transformation and highly sought-after inner-city lifestyle.
Please note: SITE INSPECTION ONLY, no internal access to premises.

Description:
Top floor panoramic views parkside and riverside
Size, style and a riverside position work brilliantly together to generate huge appeal for this contemporary sixth floor 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment. Located on the edge of the Yarra and directly across the road from the spiritual home of the Collingwood FC Victoria Park, 88 Trenerry Cres is a must see. A generous open-plan living and dining room extends onto a large entertainers terrace with views of the City and glimpses of the Yarra, which is also accessed from each of the two bedrooms. The sleek kitchen with stone benchtops and quality Gaggenau appliances ensures modern convenience when cooking. Additional features include a secure car space, storage, hard wood floors, Euro laundry, ducted heating/cooling and video monitored entry. A short stroll to Victoria Park Train Station and cosmopolitan cafés, restaurants and shops. With interest rates at an all time low, there is no reason to not be buying right now. If you have questions on your borrowing ability please contact me and I will happily refer you to a broker who has assisted many of my clients.

Description:
Lifestyle & Luxury
This superbly renovated double-fronted Victorian offers low-maintenance luxury in one of Melbourne's most perfect pockets with all the very best the inner north has to offer. Light, bright and generously proportioned the architecturally designed home features two spacious bedrooms with high ceilings, BIRs and OFPs, a luxurious retreat-style bathroom with an over-sized bathtub and OFP, a contemporary kitchen with stone bench tops and European appliances. Contemporary Living/dining opens to a landscaped courtyard with external fire place, ideal for alfresco entertaining. Understated and amazing in every way, this surprising package excels in style, flexibility and function.
Providing classic Victorian appeal with two bedrooms and two bathrooms, formal sitting, separate grand dining room, a fully appointed modern kitchen and that's just the main home.
Outside, a sunny entertainers courtyard opens to a rare find - a double lock up garage with wide roller door to the rear lane.
On top of the garage, a third bedroom/studio with ensuite.
Put the tools away, the work is all done. Bring the bubbles and start living in style.

Deluxe urban oasis in a prized riverside enclave
A showcase of effortless contemporary living within an award winning development, this deluxe designer apartment presents a custom double storey design in stunning bushland surrounds. It also enjoys direct access to the Yarra River Trail and city trams.

- Steps from city trams and Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre

Description:
Large Immaculate One Bedder!
Located on the banks of the Yarra and only a short tram ride to the CBD, this immaculate one bedroom apartment offers an inner city lifestyle you can't resist!
This larger than usual apartment features a generous bedroom with built in robes, open plan living area including study nook, leads onto a private balcony. Modern kitchen with Miele appliances including dishwasher, stone benchtop and ample storage space.
Also features central modern bathroom, European laundry, split system heating/cooling, secure intercom system, and remote car park.
Included with this immaculate apartment is use of the buildings amenities such as:
- Indoor heated pool
- Fully equipped gym
- Beautiful gardens with seating
- Onsite childcare centre
- Onsite cafe
Just a short walk from Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, two tram lines right out the front on Victoria street, nearby parklands and bike paths. Everything you need is at your doorstep.

Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE PARKSIDE LIVING
An abundance of style mixed with low maintenance living, this 2 bedroom Precint apartment is sure to impess. A stone's throw to the popular Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, in a complex offering supurb amenities and recreational facilities, this is not one to miss.
East facing with stunning morning light, the sizeable living space opens onto a delightful balcony. Full sized kitchen with island bench and stone benchtops, splashback and stainless steel Meile appliances. Light filled main bedroom with mirrored BIRs, and functional central bath with plentiful storage and walk in shower.
Additions include euro laundry, heating/cooling, lift access, secure foyer and carpark on title. The complex has an indoor pool, gym on site, with a childcare centre and a multitude of fabulous Richmond eateries close by. Direct access to Yarra River parklands for those who love to cycle and walk, iconic Abbotsford Convent, Victoria Street trams, and North Richmond Station.

Description:
Boutique Class, City And River Views
Sophistication reigns supreme throughout this oversized three bedroom, two bathroom apartment boasting north and south facing balconies with city and Yarra River views. Situated in the boutique Yarra Yarra residential apartment complex, opposite Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, the property showcases stunning open plan living domain, featuring expansive floor-to-ceiling windows and wraparound balcony, and fully appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Further highlights comprise three beautifully presented bedrooms, two have built-in-robes, including lavishly proportioned master with ensuite, leafy outlook and private balcony with water glimpses. Excellent amenities include large bathroom/concealed laundry, entry hall/storage, split-system air conditioner, secure foyer/lift entry, visual intercom and basement car space with large storage cage. Guests Only Private Swimming pool with direct access to Yarra River Bicycle & walking track. Seconds from city trams, trendy cafés and scenic Yarra River trails, and just minutes from Victoria Street restaurants, Xavier College and the CBD confirms lifestyle perfection.
Alexkarbon Real Estate
122 Errol Street, North Melbourne Vic 3051

Description:
LUXURIOUS SIZE, MODERN STYLE, AMAZING CITY & RIVER VIEWS!
Enjoy fantastic city and river views, in a contemporary, over-sized apartment boasting a 60sqm approx size. Get ready to enjoy the serenity of the Yarra River paths, or the abundant Richmond and Abbotsford bars and restaurants, only a short walk away. With outstanding lifestyle facilities that include two gyms, an outdoor pool, sauna, multiple roof top spas and entertaining areas, life does not get better than this locale.
- Spacious bedroom, mirrored built-in-robes, louvre feature doors
- Enormous open plan living/dining of grand proportions, reverse cycle heating/cooling
- Private balcony with west/north aspect, sweeping views over the city skyline and Yarra River with stunning sunsets
- Top of the line kitchen, Miele appliances, gas stove-top, dishwasher, stone bench-tops, integrated fridge and freezer
- Secure undercover bike rooms, security intercom entry into the building and your floor
- Modern bathroom, European laundry
- Entrance hall with large study nook
- Total lifestyle size 60sqm approx. (internally 56sqm approx.)
- Filled with natural light and an abundance of storage throughout
- Access to the rooftop BBQs, dining and entertainment areas, 3 spas and swimming pool with panoramic views of the city and river, meeting room, cinema room, concierge service and secure underground visitor parking.
Enjoy the fashionable river front Kitty Burns and Frankie Says cafes just downstairs. The tram stop right on your doorstep will take you to the city, MCG and Melbournes premier sporting precinct, or to beachside St Kilda and South Melbourne.

Description:
Perfect location for first home buyer and also smart investor.
Are you in the market for an inner city residence that oozes style and luxury while offering fantastic recreational facilities? If so, look no further than this two bedroom apartment in the Precinct' complex which is a stone's throw to the popular Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre.
• Appreciate the amazing light throughout this open and sizeable ground floor property.
• Relax in style day or night in the spacious living and meals zone which has a terrific free-flowing layout.
• Have fun preparing meals in the stone kitchen with s/steel Miele appls.
• Generous main bedroom with a BIR, comfortable 2nd bedroom, beautiful bathroom boasts floor-to-ceiling tiling and quality tapware.
• Further take advantage of a charming balcony for alfresco meals, European laundry and heat/cool.
• Access an indoor pool, gym, child care centre, and a gourmet café.
This amazing Abbotsford location right on the edge of the city offers an array of excellent amenities and attractions, from the nearby Victoria Street with speciality shops and delicious restaurants, Yarra River parklands for those who love to cycle and walk, iconic Abbotsford Convent, Victoria Street trams, and North Richmond Station.

Description:
Luxurious Living with Spectacular Rooftop Garden
Floating above the Yarra River with views that sweep to the city skyline, this exclusive three bedroom, two bathroom plus two study sub-penthouse, situated on the 7th floor of prestigious Sanctuary Place is a rare and rewarding residential experience set in one of Melbournes most progressive neighbourhoods.
Privileged with amenity and priceless in outlook, the residences unique sense of privacy and exclusivity is augmented by a palette of high end finishes, banks of double glazed windows to take in the view from every room and a series of river and city viewing terraces for seamless indoor-outdoor living.
Created to replicate the functionality of a traditional home, the luxury-led design includes expansive open-plan living and dining with a gas fireplace, custom joinery and sliding doors transitioning to a stunning terrace with dining deck and feature murals echoing the river setting. An entertainers stone kitchen features Miele appliances including an integrated dishwasher, large island with breakfast bar and butlers pantry.
The three oversized fitted bedrooms, one with a study and two with city viewing terraces with double sliding glass doors for noise control, include the main bedroom suite with walk-in robe and ensuite with luxurious finishes. A separate study provides a private work space. Fastidious appointments include secure basement parking for three cars, two large storage cages, Oak flooring, sleek main bathroom, European laundry central heating and air conditioning.
Residents of Sanctuary Place enjoy the amenities you would expect from a 5-star hotel including a swimming pool with spa, two gymnasiums, resident entertaining terrace with barbecue facilities and cinema, concierge and direct access to the Yarra river bike and walking trails.
From this incredible river setting located just 3.5 kilometres from Melbournes CBD, you can enjoy a cosmopolitan lifestyle of complete convenience with Victoria Gardens across the road, trams at your front door, fabulous cafes and restaurants in every direction and Richmond and Kew Junction close by.
INSPECT AS ADVERTISED OR BY APPOINTMENT

Description:
Riverside Living
At the heart of the Yarra River-Victoria Park recreation and arts precinct and just minutes to the CBD, discover why Abbotsford is the ideal place to launch a fulfilling inner-city lifestyle from this modern light-filled townhouse. A remote-control accessed car space on title complements the easy-living appeal of this attractive low-maintenance home opening to north-facing rear courtyard garden that's privately set to enjoy alfresco entertaining. Includes 3 bright bedrooms, BIRs, 2 bathrooms (ensuite), generous living and lounge/meals areas, beautiful updated fully-appointed kitchen with Blanco appliances, laundry and heating/cooling. Stroll to river trails, open parkland, cafes, train station, extensive bus network and The Convent.

Description:
Exclusive Riverside Living or Blue-Chip Investing
Stylish, secluded and moments from the river, this second-floor apartment is sure to impress delivering an exceptional city-fringe environment with Abbotsford's renowned lifestyle attractions all within easy reach. Filled with natural light, the home's on-trend interior boasts two double bedrooms (both with mirrored robes) and stylish bathroom with frameless shower, spacious open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a stone-bench kitchen with tiled splashbacks, Blanco cooking appliances and dishwasher. Add to this a sensational full-width north-facing terrace (from the living area and one of the bedrooms) complete with private undercover area. Other highlights include split-system heating and cooling, laundry facilities, quality carpets and floors, plus lift to secure entry foyer and lower-level parking space. Instant access to the Main Yarra Trail, it's also walking distance to Victoria Street buses and Victoria Park Station, cool cafes, shops and restaurants, as well as Abbotsford Convent, Dights Falls and Studley Park.

Description:
Inner-city living with calming views
With views as peacefully leafy as this, it is hard to believe you are right in the thick of one of Melbourne's most vibrant locales! With a smorgasbord of restaurants only footsteps away, a range of shops including Victoria Gardens close by, plus CBD trams just outside, this contemporary apartment also delivers with the meandering Yarra River trails right on the doorstep.
Set on one of the higher levels of the sleek development, and finished with true style, the home is centred around sunlit living and dining zone enhanced by blonde wide-board floors. With oversized glass doors out to a broad balcony, this space makes the most of its tranquil aspect as does the super-cool kitchen which has been equipped with premium Smeg appliances including an integrated dishwasher.
Both of the double bedrooms are softened with chic grey carpets and offer fitted wardrobes, the master also benefiting from a smartly appointed ensuite - a second central bathroom, split system and Euro laundry are also included.
Made for living and with a focus on the very best lifestyle, this as-new abode includes a basement parking space & storage cage, video intercom & concierge entry plus use of a residents' BBQ terrace, gym and pool which all look out to the Yarra.
For all enquiries please contact Mark Kosch on 0438 693 332 Hodges Mentone.

Description:
Secluded Yarra outlook
Aptly named for its peaceful position, this elevated ground floor two bedroom apartment within 'Eden' represents a luxurious and convenient lifestyle opportunity. Beautifully appointed, with picturesque eucalypt and Yarra River outlooks and situated at the rear of this award winning development, accommodation includes an open plan living room complemented by a spacious riverside terrace, featuring a stylish kitchen with Miele appliances, stone benchtops and mirror glass splashbacks. Two deluxe robed bedrooms, the main with luxurious ensuite bathroom and river views, are complemented by features such as a well-appointed bathroom, heating, cooling, Euro laundry, lift access, large storage cage and two tandem garage spaces. A quiet, secluded location positions Victoria Gardens, the nearby bustle of Victoria Street, Bridge Road and excellent transport links within easy reach, as well as excellent onsite community facilities including lap pool, gym, spa, sauna and residents' rooftop with magnificent views.

Bring your vision to this prized neighbourhood
Worth its weight in gold, reclaim the beauty of Edwardian traditions or plan to create a brand new cutting-edge abode (STCA) with this original 3 bedroom home.
Single-fronted and sitting on 141 sq m approx. with a very handy rear ROW to a carport, there is enormous scope to design something extraordinary on this stunning tree-lined boulevard.
All the lifestyle ingredients are in place, from exciting dining along Victoria Street and wonderful walks along the Yarra River, to a quick train or tram ride into the city. Don't miss this opportunity to own a prime piece of land walking distance to the MCG, Smith Street and Brunswick Street.

Description:
Cosy Victorian Cottage
Offering a character-rich entry into a tightly held neighbourhood, this quintessential 2 bedroom Victorian cottage is overflowing with elegance and style.
Discover a large living room under soaring ceilings, a sparkling kitchen with breakfast bar and ample preparation space, and a surprisingly spacious dining area.
So close to Yarra River bike paths, Abbotsford Convent, Collingwood Children's Farm, Victoria Park Station and an enticing mix of bars and cafes, this is superior inner-city living with all the benefits.
2 large bedrooms
Welcoming hallway with grand arched entrance
Bathroom with shower over bath
Separate laundry
Working open fireplace and gas heating
New electrical circuit board and smoke detector
Paved, leafy courtyard with right-of-way laneway and potential for off-street parking
Original period features include ornate fireplaces, leadlighting, wrought iron-trimmed verandah, Baltic pine boards, ceiling roses, stonework, and bluestone foundations.
For more information, please contact Shawn White today.

Description:
A modern family home nestled in a boutique corner of historic Abbotsford
Set on a deep allotment of 249sqm in one of Melbournes oldest suburbs is this modern three bedroom, two-bathroom family home quietly nestled in a boutique, character-filled street. From here you will comfortably walk to Abbotsford Convent and Collingwood Childrens Farm and to nearby reserves and train stops barely 5 minutes away. There are plenty of delectable eating-out options too and as for your morning coffee simply pop into Mavis The Grocer across the road. A luscious fruiting banana tree plant frames the cute façade and inside the entrance is a soothing built-in fish tank which the kids will surely love! A further welcoming surprise is the modern interior with timber floors and clean lines; an open plan living and dining area and the sleek kitchen with a funky red splash back and stainless steel appliances. All three bedrooms have natural light, timber floors with one bedroom opening to a stylish, oversized bathroom with a separate bath. The inviting north-facing yard is a great spot to hang out, grow veggies and pluck juicy nectarines, oranges and lemons from your very own trees. Extra desirable features include heating and cooling, a security system, a generous storage room and highly prized off-street parking.
Insights: 208 Vere Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2019 and 27 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
SOLD BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437
**SOLD BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437**
Outstanding opportunity to purchase 220sqm (approx) of prime vacant land with current approval for cutting edge inner city development or new home site STCA
- Vacant Land: 10.1m x 21.8m (220sqm) approx.
- A rare opportunity to acquire Vacant Land in Abbotsford!!
- Water and sewerage services connected
- Current planning approval for 3 unit site
- Potential to build large family home STCA in superior pocket of Abbotsford.
Development Includes:
- Plans & Permits Approval comprising completed working drawings certified by council
- Approval to build 3 luxury, architecturally designed units, each accommodating the following lay-outs;
Unit 1: 2 bed, 1 bath
Unit 2: 3 bed, 2 bath
Unit 3: 3 bed, 2 bath
Location is paramount with this property being only a short minutes' walk to Johnston Street, Victoria Park Train Station, Victoria Street Tram, Yarra River and the Abbotsford Convent/Collingwood Childrens Farm. Nature is on your doorstep with parks and Main Yarra trail and Yarra Blvd nearby. Perfectly positioned on the edge of Richmond and Collingwood, the choices are endless with public transport readily available to take you on short ride into Melbourne CBD. You can enjoy the best that Abbotsford's inner city living has to offer with the area now well known for its array of trendy cafe's, pubs & bars which are just a stones throw away. Don't let this rare opportunity slip!
Plans, Permits and working architectural drawings are available upon request. Please contact Adriano Persichetti on 0402 055 437 or adriano@myagentre.com.au

Description:
The Gift Of The Good Life At Green Square
Green Square development marks a highpoint in the evolution of urban Melbourne living. A four tower complex built behind the famed Terminus Hotel and moments from the Yarra River, bike trails and golf course, with Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, IKEA and readily accessible public transport close by, Green Square has something for everyone.
This conveniently located ground floor 65 SQM apartment impresses with full-height, light maximising glazing, a considered open-plan design and luxury fixtures and fittings. Featuring a polished, fully-tiled bathroom accessing good sized euro laundry, super stylish stone topped galley kitchen with mirrored splash-backs, stainless steel appliances, integrated dishwasher and generous dark toned cabinetry. The generous dining/living zone extends out to a private covered terrace and two spacious bedrooms each contain built-in mirrored robes. Fully carpeted throughout, with split system air-conditioning, plus basement car parking and additional external storage; exclusive resident amenities include a library, indoor/outdoor swimming pool, gym and rooftop barbecue with sky garden. Green Square has become a popular choice for both the astute investor and owner occupiers alike.

Description:

A towering window wall and 4.5m ceilings highlight the epic proportions and New York character of this first-floor warehouse apartment in a sensational Yarra River pocket. Tucked away in the landmark BYFAS silk mill that's architect-converted for stunning modern living, this secure 2-level residence is big, bright and brilliantly-appointed. Offers 2 large bedrooms, separate study, impressive living and dining zone, immaculate Miele-equipped stone kitchen, stylish bathroom (frameless shower, spa bath), ducted heating/cooling, alarm, C-BUS, polished concrete floors, abundant storage, undercover car space, storage cage and wine cupboard plus lift and gym access. An amazing inner-city lifestyle by cafes, river walks, the Convent and trains.

Description:
Picturesque Victorian, perfect location
Rich in period appeal, this delightful Victorian home offers the ideal in single level living. Set amongst lush gardens, this charming residence presents immaculately preserved period details, soaring high ceilings and ambient spaces. The inviting living area centres around a fireplace, complemented by ceiling rose and inbuilt shelves, with French doors opening onto the private courtyard with established garden, alfresco dining and entertaining space, outdoor shower, storage shed and parking accessible by rear laneway. The appealing kitchen is appointed with gas cooktop, oven and Bosch dishwasher, with ample storage and courtyard access. Two spacious bedrooms showcase fireplaces, bright outlooks and built in robes, sharing a sleek bathroom with freestanding clawfoot bath, separate rain shower and European laundry. Located close to Abbotsford Convent and Collingwood Children's Farm, with plentiful public transport including Victoria Park train station and Johnston Street trams.

Description:
Luxury Skipping Girl Sanctuary On The Yarra
Spanning the entire floor in the iconic 'Skipping Girl' building looking north over the Yarra River to Studley Park, this expansive warehouse conversion boasts a vast single-level design with a massive undercover entertainment terrace and internal lift. Spectacular city-edge living by the Yarra, and under the glow of 'Little Audrey', is an unsurpassed, unique and ergonomically designed apartment. The property is enhanced by a communal floodlit championship tennis court and river-side BBQ terrace. The ultimate in craftsman-built luxury, secluded and peaceful in a Moderne Art Deco setting, this 350sqm (approx.) apartment features three bedrooms (WIRs, two beautiful ensuites), executive study/office, formal dining room, substantial living zone (with fireplace), glazed wall revealing the alfresco area, granite gourmet kitchen/meals, three marble bathrooms, huge laundry and utility room, artistic glass atriums, balconies, hydronic heating, large reverse cycle cooling, alarm, 3.3m ceilings and secure two car parking and large storage areas. Easy access to amenities such as Victoria Gardens shopping, Kew's private schools, cafes, restaurants, Melbourne's Sports & Entertainment Precinct and the CBD.

Description:
Remarkable views in an award winning development
A serene sanctuary on the Yarra; lush river views enhance this outstanding, contemporary apartment. Open plan living, adjoined by a sleek kitchen with Miele dishwasher, gas cooktop and oven, flows onto the spacious balcony boasting verdant river views and a northerly aspect. The undercover alfresco dining space can be enjoyed all year round. The sun-drenched main bedroom, surrounded by greenery, includes built-in robes and a stylish ensuite. A second bedroom, with a view to the Residents' Garden, is also fitted with built-in robes. Another bathroom presents quality fixtures, next to a European laundry. A tandem secure carpark, large storage cage, shared pool access and rooftop retreat complete the home. This apartment is perfectly positioned, off Victoria Street, Victoria Gardens shops, public transport and the Yarra River walking trails moments away.

Description:
MODERN STYLE WITH ABUNDANCE OF NATURAL LIGHT
Luxuriously sized, this third floor apartment boasts the best of inner city living, balanced with the tranquility of the Yarra River bike/walking trails. City views, multiple balconies and access to both a 20m swimming pool and fully equipped gym. Only two minutes to the city bound trams, Victoria Streets restaurants and a short stroll to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre with cinemas and more!
- 3 generously sized bedrooms, master with ensuite, built in robes, 2 with access to private terrace
- Light filled open plan living/dining area, reverse cycle heating/cooling
- 2 undercover terraces for alfresco dining
- Sleek kitchen, Miele stainless steel appliances, gas stove top, dishwasher, breakfast bar, stone bench tops
- 2 modern bathrooms, European laundry in separate alcove
- 2 secure undercover car parks with storage cage
- Total lifestyle 103 sqm approx. (internally 91 sqm approx.)
- Currently leased at $750pw until 17/7/19
- Security intercom entry and lifts
- Access to the 20m pool, fully equipped gym and private gardens, onsite childcare and cafe
Ideally located within walking distance to the delights of Victoria Street and Bridge Road cafes, restaurants and shops. Victoria Gardens, cinema and transport are also at your door. Take a stroll alongside the Yarra River, ride the bike paths, or visit the golf course and parkland only minutes away. Only a short tram ride to the CBD, this is truly the best of inner city living!

Description:
Warehouse conversion versatility in vibrant pocket
No matter how you want to live, work and play, this versatile warehouse conversion has the space and the flexibility to make it happen over 2 levels with alfresco terrace and internal garage. Privately set on the corner of Stafford Street, this character-filled oasis offers a spacious, warehouse-inspired interior where versatility is the key to success. This warehouse residence on its own title is the ideal home, office or combination with no upper boundaries for future extension/rooftop deck (STCA). A short stroll to the Yarra, Convent Arts Precinct, trains and retail-restaurant hubs, this unique inner-city sanctuary includes 2 downstairs rooms (bedrooms or lounge/study), huge open-plan 2nd level with bedroom area, kitchen, big bathroom and heating/cooling.

Description:
Period elegance, contemporary excellence
This superbly updated freestanding Victorian home offers light-filled family living. Positioned on a peaceful tree-lined street, the residence presents well maintained period features coupled with outstanding contemporary spaces. Spacious open plan living and dining, accented by timber flooring and gas fireplace, opens onto a generous deck with lush greenery and ample entertaining space and is complemented by a formal living area with gas fireplace and decorative ceiling and cornices. The sleek kitchen is well appointed with Bosch dishwasher, Smeg gas cooktop and oven and plentiful storage. The main bedroom benefits from a walk-in robe and ensuite with rain shower, accompanied by two north facing bedrooms with built in robes and access to bright courtyard. A second bathroom, European laundry, security system and secure 1-2 car garage complete the home. Located close to Victoria Street public transport and shops, Yarra River walking trails and Abbotsford Primary School.

Description:
AUCTION (UNLESS SOLD PRIOR) - MODERN HOME TO OCCUPY, INVEST OR DEVELOP (STCA)
Enjoying a tremendous inner-city location just moments to lively restaurants, cafes, and shops as well as the bustling CBD. Move straight in and enjoy a lifestyle offering everything right at your doorstep. Situated close to the CBD, Yarra River and local parklands. This home includes 2 bedrooms (BIRS), and a huge upstairs loft/study area with the potential to easily convert into a third bedroom (STCA).
Huge open plan living and dining, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances. A large modern bathroom with separate shower and bath facilities, polished timber floors, ducted heating and split system, and on-site parking via rear lane with a secure electric roller shutter.
A perfect entry level home ideal for first home buyers, those who work from a home office, and fantastic for investors with high rental return and future opportunity to develop (STCA), commercial zoning with residential rights. Those with possible redevelopment dreams will also be enticed by this property, this home offers an array of exciting possibilities!
You'll adore the location with a range trendy cafes, restaurants and bars nearby, and picturesque Yarra River parklands including Yarra Bend Park and Studley Park. Near Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, The Hive Shopping Centre with Aldi and Woolworths supermarkets, Abbotsford Primary School, numerous private schools, Victoria Park, Collingwood Children's Farm, trams, train stations, buses, easy access to the freeway, and just moments from the CBD.

Description:
PRIVATE NEGOTIATION
OBVIOUS
You want to wake up to these views. Once home to industrial textile mills, this historic brick complex has been re-designed to provide the best in New York-style warehouse living. The secure third-floor, two-storey residence has a number of remarkable vantage points. The entry-level open plan living space, with polished concrete floors and custom feature lighting, is framed by floor-to-ceiling glass and a terrace overlooking Studley Park, the Yarra Trail and Victoria Park. The entertainers kitchen with stone benchtops has a double oven, built-in coffee machine and integrated Bose sound system. Also on this level, the master retreat has an ensuite with double shower and a private balcony. There is an additional bedroom or study, plus another bathroom with shower. Upstairs, two bedrooms have shared balcony access. Theres a bathroom with spa and another large terrace with city views. Additional features include two car parks, storage cage and gym access.
SEALS THE DEAL
Its the size of a freestanding home, but you get the peace-of-mind that comes with living in a secure complex.

Description:
UNDER OFFER
CLASS ACT
LUCKY NUMBER 8! - Top floor with vast city views, overlooking the tranquil Green Square - Original owner, rare opportunity!
Contemporary style, an abundance of natural light and instant access to the delights of Abbotsford and Richmond. This impressive eighth-level, top floor apartment delivers an environment of outstanding quality and convenience in the highly regarded Green Square complex.
Large master suite, with extensive built-in-robes with full mirror doors & ensuite with floor-to-ceiling tiles
Large second bedroom, with study alcove, also with built-in-robes & full mirror doors
Bright open plan living & dining.
Floor-to-ceiling, double-glazed windows all with both sheer and block-out double roller blinds.
Generous balcony, with city views (fireworks visible every New Year's Eve), with geared VISIONTEX® Plus roller sunblinds with secure fasteners for privacy & UV protection from sun and weather
First-class entertainer's kitchen appointed with SMEG appliances, mirrored splashback and Hettich soft-close cabinetry. Stone island bench & large pantry with concealed microwave compartment. Dual quad-power sockets.
Central bathroom, bath & shower also with with floor-to-ceiling tiles.
European laundry.
Powerful reverse cycle Fujitsu heating & cooling (external unit situated on building roof for noise-free resident comfort)
Secure car space conveniently located on Lower Ground (street level) & storage cage on title.
Video intercom system
Fibre-to-the-Premise (FttP) "real" NBN and Foxtel ready, with data ports throughout the apartment
Access to extraordinary amenities including; indoor/outdoor infinity lap pool, extensive gym, sauna, Sky Lounge entertaining area with kitchen & BBQ, private Green Square garden with BBQ zones, herb garden, library & conference room. Full-time, friendly building managers through weekdays and weekends.
Urban river sanctuary, under 3.5km from the CBD.
Close to all transport (Routes 12 & 109 tram stop literally outside the front door, North Richmond station nearby), parklands, Yarra River bike & walking trails, new IGA convenience store downstairs, Victoria Gardens shopping precinct (IKEA, Coles, Hoyts, Fitness First and more), vibrant cafes, restaurants, pubs & nightlife.

Description:
INNER CITY HAVEN OF ENORMOUS PROPORTIONS
Sophisticated, stylish and superbly appointed, this 2-level contemporary residence, positioned perfectly, provides the ultimate inner urban lifestyle
- 3 bedrooms, floor to ceiling built in robes, master with ensuite and private balcony
- Light filled dual use open plan living or dining area features a gas log fire and opens to a front entertainers courtyard
- State of the art kitchen, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, large marble island bench
- 2 immaculate bathrooms, main central bathroom with bath, additional ground floor powder room
- 2 secure undercover off street parks via rear lane
- Decked rear courtyard situated perfectly off the 2nd living zone
- Dual zoned ducted heating and cooling, high ceilings throughout
- Land size: 5.5m x 32.5m approx. - 178.5sqm
- Entitled to parking permits with City of Yarra
Nestled in a leafy cul-de-sac and across the road from Abbotsford Primary School, this family residence is one not to be missed. A stone’s throw from Victoria’s Street's bustling restaurants, an abundance of transport options to whisk you into the city, moments from Yarra River walking trails, a stroll to the sporting precinct and much more!

Description:
Split Level Gem with CBD views - 97m2 (approx.)
Enjoying a street-facing position and set within a boutique block of 12, this smart split-level apartment blends inner city style and functionality. Designed to maximise space and light across the open plan layout, this spacious apartment offers CBD views with a private alfresco entertaining area. An outstanding opportunity for investors or couples looking for an inner-city pad, it occupies a sought-after address just steps from buses, Victoria Park Station as well as a host of cafes and restaurants along Johnston Street including Dr Morse, Rita's Pizzeria, Admiral Cheng Ho, The Yarra Hotel and much more. The apartment also features double height ceilings, separate dining area, integrated stainless steel kitchen with ample storage, 2 large bedrooms with second terrace access from both bedrooms, sleek central bathroom, split system air-conditioning and secure car space with storage. Just moments to vibrant Smith Street, Brunswick Street, Merri Creek, Yarra River trails and the CBD.

Description:
UNRIVALED LUXURY, UNBELIEVABLE STYLE, UNBEATABLE VIEWS
Enjoy fantastic city and river views from this over-sized, contemporary apartment. Perfectly positioned to enjoy the serenity of the Yarra River paths or take a short stroll to enjoy the abundant Richmond and Abbotsford bars and restaurants. With outstanding lifestyle facilities that includes two gyms, an outdoor pool, sauna, multiple roof top spas and entertaining areas, this is an unrivaled urban oasis!
- Spacious bedroom, mirrored built-in-robes, louvre feature doors
- Enormous open plan living/dining of grand proportions, reverse cycle heating/cooling
- Private balcony with west/north aspect, sweeping views over the city skyline and Yarra River with stunning sunsets
- Top of the line kitchen, Miele appliances, gas stovetop, dishwasher, stone benchtops
- Secure undercover parking and bike rooms, storage cage, security intercom entry into the building
- Modern bathroom, European laundry with well thought out storage solutions
- Entrance hall with study nook
- Total lifestyle size 60sqm approx. (internally 56 sqm approx.)
- Filled with natural light and an abundance of storage throughout
- Access to the rooftop BBQs, dining and entertainment areas, 3 spas and swimming pool with panoramic views of the city and river, meeting room, cinema room, concierge service and visitor parking
Enjoy the fashionable river front Kitty Burns and Frankie Says cafes just downstairs. The tram stop right on your doorstep will take you to the city, MCG and Melbourne’s premier sporting precinct, or to beach side St Kilda and South Melbourne. Life does not get more enjoyable than this!
This over-sized one bedroom apartment is a fantastic investment opportunity for a first home owner, a city base for those living out of Melbourne or an investment property with attractive rental yields.

Description:
Inner city hideaway with plenty of potential
Boasting a peaceful position tucked in from the street, this charming freestanding residence c1890 is in comfortable order throughout, while offering further improvement potential. Nestled in a verdant garden with mature fruit trees, this single level home is a perfect hideaway, presenting a rare and rewarding opportunity for first home buyers and astute investors. Awash with natural light, a practical kitchen featuring timber benches, gas cooktop, Bosch oven and dishwasher is positioned between a casual dining area and separate living space equipped with cosy open fireplace, while at the rear, a verandah extends to a courtyard garden, providing space for a contemporary extension if desired (STCA). The two bedrooms are both fitted with built in robes and share a functional bathroom. Includes attic storage and outdoor shed with laundry facilities. An ultra convenient location puts vibrant Victoria Street, the Yarra River, Woolworths, train station and trams all within walking distance.
Insights: 23A William Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2019 and 32 other 2 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Striking style in spectacular urban setting
Expressions of interest closing Tuesday 26th February at 5pm.
Just completed, this contemporary residence makes the most of its traditional setting near Abbotsford Convent, Collingwood Children's Farm and vibrant Victoria Street. Behind a striking recycled brick exterior, luxurious appointments highlight light filled living spaces throughout, with an arresting whole floor, first floor living space. Two private alfresco terraces, front and rear, accommodate indoor outdoor living, and are enhanced by quality interior finishes, high 3.3m ceilings, feature gas fireplace, bespoke cabinetry, Royal Oak floorboards, study nook and rooftop views to the rear. A stylish kitchen features stone benchtops and luxe Smeg appliances. Three generous bedrooms include a substantial main with a wall of robes and luxurious ensuite, and a spacious main bathroom is accompanied by a separate powder room. Also includes first floor powder room, double glazing, heating and cooling, Euro laundry, secure off street parking and laneway access.

Description:
MODERN INNER CITY LIVING WITHIN HISTORIC CHARM
Designed by award winning architects Kavellaris Urban Design and handcrafted by the Glenvill Group, St Josephs is a new benchmark in inner-city living.
- Three large bedrooms with an abundance of storage
- Large living and dining leading to a private north facing terrace with city views over a leafy outlook

Within close proximity to all modes of public transport, the historic Abbotsford Convent, Collingwood Children’s Farm & Yarra River trails, neighbouring Smith, Brunswick & Victoria Street, moment’s walk from various cafes, bars & restaurants and only 3kms from the CBD. This is inner city living at its best!

Description:
The high life
Situated in the sophisticated Eden development, this luxurious apartment boasts breathtaking city views and contemporary design in a superb location. The open plan living and dining area opens onto the balcony with space for alfresco dining showcasing views of the city and lush greenery, adjoining a stylish kitchen equipped with Miele appliances and stone benchtops. Both spacious bedrooms are fitted with built in robes, with one featuring a sleek ensuite with impressive dimensions and the other filled with sunlight and benefiting from balcony access. A second elegant bathroom features a shower over bath, complemented by a European laundry and additional storage in the hallway. Also includes secure underground parking space, communal rooftop retreat and access to a health and fitness centre. Perfectly positioned with Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Yarra River walking trails and plentiful public transport moments away.

Description:
Sophisticated residence in lifestyle location
Conveniently set in a dynamic lifestyle location, this two storey town residence boasts inviting and easily maintained living spaces combined with superbly spacious accommodation. Gleaming timber floors flow through the open plan living and dining area including a well appointed kitchen fitted with sleek benchtops, stainless steel appliances and pantry. Three light filled bedrooms equipped with built in robes share two functional bathrooms which offer scope to enhance if desired. This contemporary abode enjoys the additional advantages of an impeccable study alcove, sundrenched first floor balcony and delightfully private courtyard, an ideal setting for entertaining or casual dining. Includes laundry facilities, storage, ducted heating, intercom and garage accessed via rear ROW. Situated only a short walk from recreation destinations including the Yarra River, Victoria Park, Gahan Reserve and the Abbotsford Convent as well as trendy cafes along Johnston Street and Collingwood station.

Description:
Spacious 2 bedrooms apartment - Stylish Riverside Living Meets Chic City Life!
First time on the market / largest floor plan in the building + a storage cage
Do not miss this rare opportunity to secure this very spacious and deluxe apartment at Riviere - Melbourne’s exclusive riverside development.
Come home from the hustle-and-bustle of city living to an apartment on Trenerry Crescent, nominated by The Age newspaper as the best street in Abbotsford. This is a rare opportunity to secure one of Riviere’s beautiful, chic and well-presented apartments. This one's impressive with a beautiful outlook to historic and leafy surrounds. Take it all in from the tranquil and spacious balcony. Whether you are an investor or looking to secure your first city property, look no further than 509/10 Trenerry Crescent - your serene place to call home in a convenient city location.
This apartment does not disappoint in style, design, functionality and location. This living space affords residents the best of both worlds. A peaceful lifestyle with access to all the city has to offer. Step outside and enjoy morning walks along the Yarra or cycle to Melbourne for work. Otherwise, catch the train to the city. Victoria park station is only 700 metres away.
General Features:
- Car space
-Secure entry via intercom
-Spacious and easy access floorplan
-Broadband internet access
Private Balconies:
-Large square private balcony leading from the living room and kitchen
-Second long balcony with access from both bedrooms
Bedrooms:
-Large master bedroom and second bedroom with large mirrored built-in robes
-Sliding doors leading from both bedrooms to the balcony
Bathroom/ Laundry:
- Sleek and modern bathroom with large shower
- Clever internal and convenient laundry space
Kitchen:
-Smart kitchen with Smeg appliances including cooktop, electric oven and new dishwasher
-Spacious galley style kitchen (stone benches and stainless steel appliances)
-Light-filled living, cooking and dining zones
-Large pantry and functional top and bottom cupboards providing ample storage space
-Open plan to the living room and with easy access to the balcony
Heating, Cooling and Furnishings:
-Wall-mounted reverse-cycle heating and cooling
-Stylish, quality charcoal blackout blinds affording views, privacy and temperature control
-Stylish hardwood floorboards in the living areas
-Carpeted bedrooms
Outlook:
-Beautiful elevated outlook to historical buildings and the leafy surrounds of the Yarra
Parking and Storage:
-A single carpark for one vehicle

Description:
1 min walk to Victoria Street, next to Richmond, Kew, Hawthorn
Are you in the market for an inner city residence that oozes style and luxury while offering fantastic recreational facilities? If so, look no further than this two bedroom apartment in the Precinct' complex which is a stone's throw to the popular Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre.
Appreciate the amazing light throughout this open and sizeable ground floor property.
Relax in style day or night in the spacious living and meals zone which has a terrific free-flowing layout.
Have fun preparing meals in the stone kitchen with s/steel Miele appls.
Generous main bedroom with a BIR, comfortable 2nd bedroom, beautiful bathroom boasts floor-to-ceiling tiling and quality tapware.
Further take advantage of a charming balcony for alfresco meals, European laundry and heat/cool.
Access an indoor pool, gym, child care centre, and a gourmet cafe.
This amazing Abbotsford location right on the edge of the city offers an array of excellent amenities and attractions, from the nearby Victoria Street with speciality shops and delicious restaurants, Yarra River parklands for those who love to cycle and walk, iconic Abbotsford Convent, Victoria Street trams, and North Richmond Station.

Description:
INNER CITY LIVING IN RIVER PRECINCT VICINITY!
Contemporary in style, nestled in an exclusive pocket of the complex, you have a quiet, central courtyard right on your doorstep! Only a stone’s throw to the peace and tranquillity of the Yarra River bike/walking trail, or minutes on the tram to the CBD. This is enviable urban living without compromising on space or storage.
- 2 spacious bedrooms; Built in robes
- Light filled open plan living/dining area; Reverse cycle heating/cooling
- Private undercover terrace for alfresco dining
- Sleek kitchen; Miele stainless steel appliances, gas stove top, dishwasher, breakfast bar, stone bench tops
- Modern bathroom; European laundry in separate alcove
- Secure undercover parking with storage cage
- Security intercom entry
- Access to the pool, gym and private gardens, onsite childcare and cafe
Ideally located within walking distance to the delights of Victoria Street and Bridge Road cafes, restaurants and shops. Victoria Gardens, cinema and transport are also at your door. Take a stroll alongside the Yarra River, ride the bike paths, or visit the golf course and parkland only minutes away. Only a short tram ride to the CBD, this is truly the best of inner city living!
