Description:
Best Value Large Terrace 50m to Victoria Street !
This imposing balconied terrace is right next to the famous Victoria Street offering a great opportunity for you to transform this Victorian to your dream design with its existing versatile floor plan perfect for large family living, incorporating period characteristic and charm include the beautiful balcony, front lattice work and ornamental fireplaces.
This brilliant Victorian has a spacious design with light-filled interior features three upstairs bedrooms (large front master with balcony access) and a shower bathroom, Downstairs with lounge or bedroom, second bedroom with pine flooring, separate living room, a bathroom and a light-filled gas cooking kitchen with meals area. Adding to its appeal, the home has high ceilings throughout also boasts a separate laundry, side atrium, low maintenance front and rear courtyard with pergola and rear laneway access.
Located in a quiet street but an incredible locale, just a stone throw 50m to the famous food street "Victoria Street" with 109 tram, 100m to the Church Street with Tram, 1km to Victoria's Gardens Shopping Centre and IKEA, 500m to the Abbotsford Primary School and 1km to Richmond High School and Bridge Road Shops and only 850m walk to North Richmond Train Station. Plus only 3km to the CBD and close to Yarra River bike paths and walking trails!
Don't miss out this fabulous city-edge lifestyle opportunity for young professional, large family, investor, renovator or even home business (STCA)!
Flexible Settlement, Contact Simon Lee for inspection and make the purchase ASAP !

Moments from the buzz of Victoria Street, this highly maintained apartment on the second floor captures the essence of city living with its quality inclusions, private surrounds and world-class residents’ facilities. This super-stylish interior comprises of 2 sizable bedrooms (both with built in robes) and sleek central bathroom, open living/dining area. Description:
CALM AND TRANQUIL, SERENITY IN THE HEART OF THE CITY
Absolute river front, the perfect blend of modern living and idyllic natural surrounds that captures intimate and breathtaking Yarra River and bushland views. A leafy-green outlook will keep you renewed all year
- 3 inviting bedrooms, 2 with river views and direct balcony access overlooking the river, master with ensuite, BIR’s
- High end ‘French Provincial’ kitchen, SMEG 6 burner with 3 separate ovens, granite benchtops, new parquetry flooring, integrated ASKO dishwasher
- North facing living/dining with panoramic views of the river and bushland
- Enjoy your secluded wrap around balcony, drenched in sunlight with a calming aura, new window coverings / frames
- 2 stylish bathrooms, ornate tapware and cabinetry, powder on the ground floor
- Central heating/cooling throughout, secure storage cages, additional under stair storage
- Large laundry loads of space for washer and dryer, immaculate detailing throughout
- 2 privately located car parks, with exclusive direct lift access to apartment entrance
Wake to the chorus of Bellbirds, and the chatter of red dumped parrots & rainbow lorikeets when the eucalyptus are flowering. Watch the black cormorants & the white faced herons in the river as well as pacific ducks and seagulls. When it has been raining, watch the slalom canoeists trying their skills on the rapids below Dights Falls. Be awe-struck at the unimpeded view across the tree tops to the magnificent sunrises and, occasionally the sky dotted with hot air balloons - Simply stunning!
An attractive, low maintenance lifestyle awaits with a premier position opposite the rejuvenated Victoria Park and moments from transport, the CBD, Smith Street and Brunswick Street's shops, cafes and restaurants as well as the Abbotsford Convent.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.

A huge attraction of this apartment will surely be the huge oversized balcony, ideal for outdoor entertaining and private parties. With an outstanding Abbotsford location just a short walk to the popular Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and picturesque Yarra River parklands, this light-filled and stylish two bedroom apartment is sure to make a lasting impression.

The resort style complex offers you access to an indoor swimming pool, gymnasium, beautiful manicured gardens and outdoor areas which add further value to this wonderful apartment.
Perfect for owner occupiers and investors alike.
This apartment offers the ultimate in location and lifestyle.

Captivating Inner City Abode Ticks All The Right Boxes
With a standout Abbotsford location just a short walk to the popular Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and picturesque Yarra River parklands, this light-filled and stylish two bedroom apartment is sure to make a lasting impression.

You'll never tire of this excellent location close to fantastic Victoria Street restaurants and shops, Abbotsford Convent, Collingwood Children's Farm, North Richmond Station, and trams on Victoria Street transporting you into the CBD.

Description:
1 min walk to Victoria St, next to Richmond, Hawthorn & Kew
Are you in the market for an inner city residence that oozes style and luxury while offering fantastic recreational facilities? If so, look no further than this two bedroom apartment in the Precinct' complex which is a stone's throw to the popular Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre.
- Appreciate the amazing light throughout this open and sizeable ground floor property.
- Relax in style day or night in the spacious living and meals zone which has a terrific free-flowing layout.
- Have fun preparing meals in the stone kitchen with s/steel Miele appls.
- Generous main bedroom with a BIR, comfortable 2nd bedroom, beautiful bathroom boasts floor-to-ceiling tiling and quality tapware.
- Further take advantage of a charming balcony for alfresco meals, European laundry and heat/cool.
- Access an indoor pool, gym, child care centre, and a gourmet cafe.
This amazing Abbotsford location right on the edge of the city offers an array of excellent amenities and attractions, from the nearby Victoria Street with speciality shops and delicious restaurants, Yarra River parklands for those who love to cycle and walk, iconic Abbotsford Convent, Victoria Street trams, and North Richmond Station.

A tranquil sanctuary from a bustling, inner-city lifestyle
Flaunting picturesque views of the Yarra River and surrounding parklands, this spacious one-bedroom apartment delivers a tranquil setting to unwind from a bustling, inner-city lifestyle. Offering enviable space to relax or entertain, the home integrates its stylish interiors with its stunning surrounds through a large alfresco terrace for barbecue enjoyment. A dazzling stone-topped kitchen takes centre stage to the open plan living and dining space, providing a full-appointment of sleek Smeg appliances, while dressed in a chic medley of contemporary neutral colours and a bold smoked-mirrored splashback. Completed with a generous bedroom with mirrored robing, a separate, fully tiled guest bathroom with European laundry, plus a study area, the home assures comfort and security with split system air-conditioning, secure video and swipe entry, and basement parking with storage. An effortless lock and leave lifestyle awaits with premium residents’ facilities including gym, pool and library, just a stone’s throw from the endless shopping, decadent eateries and vibrant bars that Victoria Street and Bridge Road offer, while delivering immediate access to Melbourne’s sporting precinct, the CBD, and Yarra River recreation.
Insights: 405B/609 Victoria Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2018 and 39 other 1 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Classic freestanding charm, contemporary style
Stylishly renovated throughout, this captivating freestanding Victorian residence showcases a stunning blend of period elegance and irresistible modern style. Beyond a charming period façade, an arched hallway flows past two generously sized bedrooms to a spacious living room. A contemporary kitchen complete with polished timber floors and quality stainless steel appliances includes ample space for relaxed dining and opens out to a private sun drenched courtyard with storage shed and rear laneway access. Also features a bright, updated bathroom with bath and European laundry. Poised for further improvement, this home includes architect plans and council approved planning permit to expand into a fabulous two storey family domain. A light filled lifestyle oasis, this delightful home is enviably situated moments from Yarra River parklands and trails, vibrant shopping and dining on Victoria Street, Collingwood Station and Melbourne's sporting precinct.

Description:
"SUPERBLY LOCATED IN THE BEST POCKET"
"SUPERBLY LOCATED IN THE BEST POCKET"
Heritage charm and contemporary class unite in a stylishly refurbished two bedroom, single bathroom generous sized terrace located on the city's esteemed eastern fringe. Set behind a historic brick exterior, interiors include French oak floors, high ceilings, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, spacious bathroom with a separate laundry and a study/sun-room that opens up to a large paved, low maintenance courtyard garden.
Highly regarded as the best pocket in Abbotsford. Situated in a wide tree lined street literally moments away from the Yarra River, Yarra Bend park, Abbotsford Convent, cafes, shops, Collingwood Train Station and the CBD. Land size - 6m x 23m Approx. with rear lane-way access.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.

Description:
Prime Position, Low Maintenance Lifestyle - Sale by Closing Date for Monday 10th December (UNLESS SOLD prior)
Situated in an enviable Abbotsford locale this apartment is sure to impress.
Suited to both savvy investors or a busy professional looking for convenience and lifestyle, amenities are state of the art ‘The Playhouse’ complex include rooftop barbecue area, lap pool, spa, sauna, gym and library retreat.
Slick interior including contemporary kitchen with stone top benches and stainless steel smeg appliances, 2 bedrooms with natural light & BIRs, as well as stylish bathroom with euro laundry facilities. Full width balcony provides an abundance of natural light for the living space, and a perfect spot for a morning coffee or afternoon wine. Carpark & storage cage both on title.
Benefit from the convenience of Victoria Street trams, Victoria Gardens shopping centre, the Yarra & surrounding parklands and the Bridge Road lifestyle precinct all within a stones throw from your door.
Sale by Closing Date for Monday 10th December (UNLESS SOLD prior)

Description:
Great inner city location
An unrivalled inner-urban position just metres from Victoria Gardens and the Yarra River is the perfect setting for this sophisticated and state-of-the-art, two bedroom apartment. Finished with all the finest appointments in the highly-coveted 'Green Square' building, this apartment is a first class lifestyle option or an investment of enduring market appeal. With SMEG kitchen appliances, Caesar Stone bench tops and mirrored splash backs, the open-plan kitchen / meals / living is a sleek expression of sophistication with a balcony that currently overlooks the Yarra River, whilst there are mirrored robes in the bedroom and a convenient bathroom / laundry. Fully secure with video entry, basement parking, elevator, this is the ultimate inner-city pad. This luxury lifestyle is complimented by full use of the in-house library, resort style indoor swimming pool, fully equipped gymnasium, BBQ and entertainment space and its conveniently located on the city fringe, with transport at your doorstep, Victoria Gardens shops and cinemas across the road and world class Vietnamese restaurants just down the street. This is a cosmopolitan location made all the richer by having the Yarra River, Dights Falls and Studdley Park all just around the corner as well.

Attractive easy living with city views near the Yarra
Own street frontage, north-rear courtyard and balcony with city views ensure this spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom residence in the vibrant Victoria Park precinct is impressive from every perspective. Brilliantly appointed and secure, this stylish modern townhouse offers outstanding low-upkeep living only 3.5km to the CBD and just metres to cafes, train station, the Yarra and river trails. Description:
Federation Style; Modern Location
Be inspired by the splendid charm of this Federation era home, with the existing prospect to renovate, offering the enchanting features of the period in full display, from the iron lacework of the veranda to the high decorated ceilings and cornices, large rooms and original fireplaces.
A light-filled living area, served by a country style kitchen, overlooking the delightful established gardens complete with citrus and apple trees as well as fabulous covered alfresco entertaining. Plus, secure roller door access to the street for off-street parking. Relax in four bedrooms (two with built-in robes) a family bathroom with generous tub, as well as a separate powder room and concealed laundry.
Truly a lifestyle location, discover the great cafes and restaurants all within walking distance of your home. It's just moments from farmers markets at the Abbotsford Convent and Collingwood Children's Farm. Plus, beautiful parkland trails at Studley Park on the Yarra River are just down the road. Collingwood station is a five-minute stroll away and it is only 15 minutes into the CBD.

Description:
Contemporary Inner-City Living At Its Finest
This meticulously constructed west facing townhouse, with striking city views, sets a new standard for inner-city living. Designed for executive/family living and pouring with natural light, this stunning home offers a superbly zoned floor plan.
- Whole floor master suite including WIR & enormous well-appointed ensuite

- Chefs kitchen with impressive Caesarstone premium marble bench-tops; Large butler’s pantry; Gaggenau oven; Induction cooktop & integrated Miele fridge/freezer
- Bring the indoors outside with a city facing terrace with retractable doors and electric blinds
- Spotted gum floorboards expanding throughout
- Hydronic heating & reverse cycle heating & cooling and double-glazed windows throughout
- Double garage with internal access
- Endless storage options throughout
Location is king with this property being a short walk to the Yarra River, on the edge of Richmond and Collingwood, the choices are endless. And with public transport on your doorstep, you can enjoy the best that inner city living has to offer.

Outstanding resident facilities including heated pool, gym, sauna and 24 hour concierge.
Superbly located opposite Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre which has Hoyts cinemas, a Coles supermarket, Ikea and numerous specialty shops. There are city bound trams right out front which will also take you to Victoria Street's restaurants and North Richmond Station, while Yarra River walking and bike paths and parkland are all easily accessible.

Description:
A luxurious riverside apartment in a top location
This elevated two-bedroom apartment truly ticks all the boxes. You will feel relaxed the moment you arrive at the park-like surrounds that lead straight to the walking track along the banks of the Yarra River. The secure entrance and smart foyer with lift access gets you to this beautifully presented apartment decorated in warm earthy tones. The extra-wide hallway has impressive storage and houses the concealed laundry. A bonus room perfect for a study or a baby is off to one side and the stylish, fully tiled central bathroom is conveniently located near the second bedroom. Both bedrooms have mirrored built-in robes, split system air conditioners and the main bedroom has an ensuite and green leafy views. The smart kitchen has a glamorous smoky mirror splash back, a huge integrated fridge, Miele appliances, and a stone bench top - and there is plenty of space for a full-sized dining table. A spacious lounge room opens to the peaceful balcony from where you can almost touch the trees that line the river beneath you. This Zen-like apartment is only moments from transport, schools and Victoria Gardens shopping precinct and has two conveniently located cafes on your doorstep. In addition there are 2 car spaces and 2 storage cages.

Description:
Classic Charm and Convenience
Peace and tranquillity in a quiet street, just moments from parks and transport. Discover high decorated ceilings and elegant timber floorboards throughout this beautifully presented freestanding classic, offering a cosy feel while having extra living space and glorious outdoor areas.
The light-filled living room with open fireplace flows through to the kitchen and dining area, before stepping outside to gorgeous gardens with established plants and fruit trees and easy-care landscaping, as well as direct laneway access. Two sizeable bedrooms with built-in robes (one with its own fireplace) as well as a family bathroom with laundry facility.
With additional benefits including split-system heating and cooling and permit parking, the location is hard to beat - Collingwood station is metres away, Graham Reserve Parklands are just down the street, it's a short stroll to the river and it's only 10 minutes' walk to Victoria Street shopping, cafes and other amenities. Within close proximity of the Abbotsford Convent (market and petting zoo), significant and unique to this area are the educational facilities, which promote Steiner Schooling.

Description:
FLAWLESS TOWNHOUSE LIVING
Stylish Two bedroom + Living/Study Townhouse in popular Trenerry Mews with the Yarra, Dight Falls, Victoria Park, and bike trails at your doorstep, and only minutes to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Restaurants and Transport. Undeniable convenience in a much sought after area.
This freshly painted and carpeted property spans three levels of spacious living 171sqm and includes two large bedrooms, two bathrooms, a large courtyard, with two secure, automated and undercover carparks that have direct internal access.
The lower level consists of a separate Living/Study area with bathroom and under stair storage, with the possibility to convert this room into a third bedroom. There is direct internal and secure access to both carparks, with both able to be adapted for general storage.
The middle level features a light filled open plan living area which opens onto your private north oriented courtyard 19sqm, ideal for entertaining, relaxing or alfresco dining. An additional balcony is accessible from the main living area. The Kitchen features a stone benchtop, quality stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and SMEG Oven/Gas Cooktop, and a European Laundry.
The top level includes two large bedrooms with built in robes, and a central modern bathroom with both a shower, and bath. The master bedroom has direct access to the bathroom
Enjoy a relaxed lifestyle in this stylish contemporary residence or alternatively, take advantage of a fantastic investment opportunity.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.

Contemporary class and a cosmopolitan inner-city lifestyle
Flaunting a spectacular postcard view of the city's skyline, this surprisingly spacious (111sqmts approx of living) two-bedroom townhouse apartment delivers secure and quiet sanctuary from its bustling urban surrounds. Perfectly positioned above The Hive Shopping Centre at the heart of Victoria Street's decadent eateries, the home affords ultimate convenience - paces from city-bound trams and trains, the MCG and the Yarra's tranquil parklands.

Description:
Modern Living Packed With Extras In A Desirable Locale
Experience modern living at its finest with the convenience of ground floor living in this spacious two-bedroom apartment comprising a sleek designer-built chef's kitchen with stone benches and glass splashback. The stunning north-west wraparound covered decking sets this residence apart from the rest, providing complete privacy from the street while streaming abundant natural light through cleverly built brick pillars and exposed beams. Features bedrooms with stylish BIRs, double-glazed windows/doors, generous size bathroom boasting substantial walk-in shower, secure entrance, car space and storage cage. Benefit from all the conveniences Abbotsford has to offer, including traditional pubs and any choice of coffee shops, and only minutes to city train, the Yarra River trail and parklands.

Description:
Impressively spacious, compelling location
Exceptionally positioned overlooking Gahans Reserve, this impeccably maintained Victorian residence enjoys picturesque verdant outlooks and an array of remarkably convenient amenities within easy reach. Seamlessly blending traditional details with modern design, this double fronted domain is distinguished by high ceilings and superbly spacious single level proportions. Timber floors flow through open plan family living and dining areas featuring a practical kitchen fitted with Smeg appliances and abundant storage. Ideal for entertaining, the space is further enhanced by extensive windows overlooking a tranquil courtyard, beautifully framed by foliage and bathed in northern sun. Accommodation comprises three superb bedrooms fitted with built in robes sharing a central bathroom equipped with integrated speakers and spa bath. This outstanding abode is completed by a peaceful separate home office, laundry facilities, split system air conditioning and rear access. A prime address only moments from cafes, restaurants and shops on Victoria Street, Collingwood Children's Farm, Abbotsford Convent and the Yarra River as well as Collingwood station and buses, providing easy CBD access.
Insights: 104 Park Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2018 and 27 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Trenerry - a fresh first class address
Vibrant spaces and brilliant views form a combination that puts this two bedroom plus study property in a beautiful class of its own. The rare riverside position complement the spectacular vistas of Dights Falls, inviting spaces and large balcony of this exceptional apartment. An elegant hall leads to a living/dining area where the outlooks are memorable, the proportions are pleasing and the kitchen features stone benches, generous counter space and stainless steel appliances by Gaggenau. Morning light and sights of Studley Park's green expanses enhance the two bedrooms, served by built-in robes (walk-in-robe in master) and an ensuite that is fully tiled, impressively finished, main bathroom separate European laundry. Isolated Daikin heating/cooling, complete security, allocated garaging and a storage cage seal a city edge deal - moments from Yarra River, transport and the best of Abbotsford.

Description:
Freestanding Home on Two Titles with Endless Possibilities
Freestanding brick home with off-street parking and loads of appeal offering an opportunity to renovate or potential to pursue future options (STCA) on this excellent allotment of some 267 sqm approx. in prime CBD fringe locale. A fabulous lifestyle position in a cul-de-sac and only a short stroll to the vibrancy of Victoria St and world-class public transportation.
- No Heritage Overlay
- 3 bedrooms with car space
- Land 267m2 approx. (8.8m x 30.2m approx.)
- On two titles, ideal brand new home site or multi development (STCA)
- Further scope to renovate/extend into a superb family home (STCA)
Literally moments' walk from popular cafes, restaurants, Yarra River, parklands, Victoria Gardens, MCG, CBD, buses, trams and North Richmond station, the address could hardly be more convenient.

Description:
Superb inner city living
Combining character and a sought after lifestyle location, this unique and attractive residence on 250 sqm approx. with wide frontage delivers a spacious interior awash with natural light. A classic Victorian facade, complemented by a freshly landscaped garden, introduces this stylish home featuring soaring ceilings, timber floors and a wide arched hallway leading to two bedrooms, the main with built in robes. A contemporary kitchen offers timber bench tops and stainless steel appliances, while a relaxed dining space opens through French doors to the leafy north facing central garden, perfect for indoor outdoor dining and entertaining. Peacefully located at the rear, a generous light filled living space is highlighted by an open fireplace, cathedral ceilings and delightful garden views. Additionally boasts two functional bathrooms, laundry facilities and rare off street parking. While perfectly comfortable now, this home presents scope to enhance in the future. In a prime location moments from public transport, the Yarra River and trails, Collingwood Children's Farm, Abbotsford Convent, an array of vibrant cafes, bars and eateries and easy access to the CBD.

Description:
Contemporary chic with Deco flair, in an eclectic inner-city locale
Glowing with the irresistible charm of Art Deco architecture yet luxuriating in today’s contemporary comforts, this solid-brick, two-bedroom home sits cute as a button beyond its picket fence, delivering an effervescent urban lifestyle like no other. Offering the ultimate experience in indoor-outdoor entertaining, a skylit, open-plan domain is sprayed with natural light through a wall of bi-folding doors, integrating the home’s chic Spotted Gum interiors with private alfresco dining amid sunny, landscaped gardens. Compact yet practical, the kitchen offers abundant clever storage solutions and quality Miele appliances, while dressed in a striking medley of sleek white cabinetry, stone benches and a dazzling glass splashback. The two bedrooms are lavishly sized for restful retreat, flaunting yesteryear’s grace under soaring decorative ceilings, one with extensive fitted robes, the other with the enchantment of an ornamental open fireplace. Completed with a sparkling central bathroom with terrazzo tiled floors and European laundry, the home epitomizes modern living, in a bustling location only 3kms from the CBD. Surrounded by the eclectic culinary and shopping destinations of Abbotsford, Richmond, Collingwood and Fitzroy, its position is equaled by convenience and tranquility, paces from Gahan Reserve and Yarra River’s parklands, while surrounded by transport, including Collingwood Station at its threshold.

Description:
Love Living at Haven
Enjoy all the security and luxury features this spacious light filled two bedroom, two bathroom apartment has to offer, within the exclusive "Haven on the River" complex with exceptional resident facilities and totally convenient to the Yarra walking & bike trails, Riverfront cafes, Victoria Gardens shopping precinct opposite and the109 tram at your doorstep.
Featuring a spacious and larger than usual low-maintenance floor plan including a generous open plan living with separate dining area and floor to ceiling glass windows & doors to the entertainers size balcony with views over the swimming pool and leafy surrounds beyond. The adjoining contemporary kitchen is very well appointed including stainless steel Miele appliances, gas cooking, dishwasher, stone bench tops, plenty of cupboards and pantry. Both bedrooms are doubles with mirrored built in robes, the main with an ensuite bathroom and the second with balcony access. Additional features include a central bathroom with laundry facilities, split system air conditioning, secure intercom entry and a basement car park plus storage cage.
Residents facilities include a welcoming lobby entrance with fire place, concierge, swimming pool, gym, sauna, therapy room and a communal rooftop recreational area with lounge and BBQ area. An ideal opportunity for the owner occupier to move in and totally enjoy now or the investor seeking a property in this highly popular complex.
Insights: 204/6 Acacia Place, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2018 and 94 other 2 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
North facing balcony with spectacular river views
Perfectly positioned overlooking the Yarra and Studley Park, this north facing sun-filled two bedroom apartment offers a lifestyle second to none. In the heart of Abbotsford and within close proximity to the Yarra Trail, Dights Fall, Collingwood Children's Farm and the Abbotsford Convent with its Saturday Farmer's Market and cafe this apartment has all the sights, sounds and smells of country living just 3.5km from Melbourne's CBD.
This riverfront community offers outstanding accommodation and incorporates:
Open Living zone with designer kitchen
Queen sized bedrooms with BIR's
Sun filled balcony off the living room
Sparkling fully tiled bathroom
Reverse cycle air conditioning and heating
Full security entry, car park, bike rack and storage cage
Positioned to enjoy easy access not only to the city but also the diversity of delights of greater Melbourne, you are sure to fall in love with the chance to escape home and wander the endless Yarra trails and parkland whenever you choose.

Description:
REFINED INNER CITY LIVING
Cutting edge, New York loft terrace style living at its finest. Designed by award-winning architects Kavellaris Urban Design. Huge windows, superb joinery and quality finishes throughout. Impressive 4.2m ceilings and exposed concrete work together to create this stunning home.
- 2 large bedrooms with built in robes
- 2 stylish bathrooms; Main bathroom with bath
- Stunning open plan living/dining leading out to private north/west facing courtyard/terrace with gas outlet for barbeque
- Entertainer’s kitchen with Bosch dishwasher and gas cooktop
- Polished concrete floor and 2 reverse cycle air conditioners (heating/cooling)
- Secure off-street parking and visitor parking plus separate storage shed
- Potential rental return up to $650pw ($33,893pa approx.)
A coveted address favoured by those in the know. Located in a quiet street of Abbotsford yet walking distance to fantastic cafes, pubs, restaurants and the Yarra River with walking/cycling tracks and endless parkland.
In very close proximity to all modes of public transport, the historic Abbotsford Convent, neighbouring Smith Street, Brunswick Street and only 3kms from the CBD.
Community golf course and train station literally minutes away……
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.

Voguish Living @ The Green Square
UNDER OFFER
Perched and hovering high on the 4th floor of the beautiful “Green Square” development, this perfectly situated apartment is ideal as a magnificent city pad or would make a fantastic investment property with plenty of opportunity. Stunning, contemporary, this exquisite 2- bedroom apartment is completed with 2- bathroom, flawless layout, natural light flowing throughout that exudes style.

Description:
A Slice of New York
Located on the second floor in the iconic BYFAS silk mill, this is so much more than your average one bedroom apartment. The State-of-the-art warehouse conversion designed by acclaimed architect Edgard Pirrota has retained stunning features to complement the spacious open plan living and dining with floor to ceiling industrial style windows. The mezzanine level comprises a spacious bedroom, an abundance of storage and fully tiled bathroom. A separate study area, secure car space on title and a storage cage complete the picture. Features panel heating, dishwasher, secure entrance, visitor parking, and a well-equipped gym. A creation of flawless design and impeccable taste in an undeniable lifestyle position! Located nearby cafes, transport, Yarra River trails, Abbotsford Convent Arts Precinct, Collingwood Children's Farm and Studley Park Boathouses.

Description:
A rare combination of city fringe convenience and riverside tranquillity
This flawlessly presented one bedroom. Ground apartment delivers the best of both worlds and is suited to both owner occupiers and savvy investors alike. Sophisticated interior includes a spacious galley style kitchen (stone benches, stainless steel appliances), and light-filled living/dining zone + 2 large terraces.
Chic fit out in the bathroom (laundry facilities within), plus a thoughtful BIR layout ensures that this home provides the full package for any discerning buyer.
Other features include lift access, secure undercover carpark on the title (visitor parking available), video intercom, large storage cage and split-system air conditioner. Located on the edge of Victoria Park, an easy stroll to Collingwood Train Station and Johnston Street and the Abbotsford Convent, plus convenient access to Eastern Freeway. Do not miss this opportunity to secure a stunning home in a unique location

Description:
'Haven on the Yarra' - luxurious living with resort style amenities moments from the river
This one bedroom sixth floor apartment is positioned only 3.5kms from the CBD and offers resort-style living in the beautiful architecturally designed “Haven on the River” complex. An open plan layout provides space for living/ dining and study nook, the stone-topped kitchen provides sleek styling with a full-appointment of Miele appliances including dishwasher, custom cabinetry contrasted by a smoked mirror splash back. A lovely southerly view across Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre extend south to the tower of St Ignatius Church on Richmond Hill. Comprising a chic modern bathroom, Euro laundry, and a spacious bedroom enjoying good natural light, complete with mirrored built-in robes, in the comforts of split-system A/C, secure basement parking, storage cage, swipe building entry, and video intercom access. Enjoy world-class residents' facilities including concierge service, barbecue terrace, outdoor heated lap pool with spa, overlooking the Yarra surrounds, plus two gyms, sauna, and massage room.

Description:
Penthouse perfection, expansive space & city views
Residence 6 - Commanding premium top-floor space and city skyline views is this expansive new 2-level penthouse delivering the ultimate inner-city executive lifestyle experience in a boutique design of only 6 residences. Architect brilliance by Interlandi Mantesso, high-end quality and heritage character combine to deliver lifestyle perfection over 200 sqms (approx.) in the historic and dynamic setting of the converted St Joseph's School c1893. Boasting substantial open-plan living/dining area out onto a fabulous city-view terrace, 3 fitted bedrooms (main with ensuite), gourmet kitchen with integrated joinery, fridge and Miele dishwasher along with fitted laundry with Miele dryer and washing machine, 2 deluxe bathrooms, separate powder room, steel window frames, exposed brick walls, double glazing, ducted heating/cooling, oak floors, soft timber veneer panelling, 2 secure car parks and storage. This spacious residence with lift access, video intercom provides an exclusive opportunity to live in the very heart of Abbotsford with renowned cafes across the road, shops and restaurants at the end of the street, walking distance to Yarra parks and trails, trams and trains to the CBD.
Insights: 12 other 3 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
RIVERSIDE PRESTIGE WITH SPECTACULAR VIEWS
A superb modern complex with parkland serenity and elevated vantage finds this exceptional top-floor apartment providing a lifestyle of luxury and space complete with uninterrupted river views. Stunning interior boasts two double bedrooms (master with deluxe ensuite) and equally-stylish main bathroom, gourmet stone-bench kitchen with Blanco cooking appliances and dishwasher, light-filled open-plan living/dining area leading out to a wide terrace ideal for entertaining and enjoying the sights and sounds of the Yarra River. Stroll to Yarra trails and parkland, easy access to Victoria Street cafes and restaurants, vibrant shopping precincts and public transport options.

Description:
Sophisticated urban living with exemplary city views
It’s not everyday that you walk into an apartment of this caliber. It oozes sophistication, has an excellent layout and possibly one of the best city views in Melbourne – all in a top location. A super private oversized entertainers’ balcony spans the entire length of the apartment and even has space for a fire pit. The two bedrooms are conveniently located at opposite ends and both have generous mirrored robes, city views and direct balcony access. The fully tiled, sleek spa-like ensuite and central bathroom both offer abundant storage and are fitted with quality German made and designed Grohe tapware and Villeroy & Boch WC’s. High-end Miele appliances, stone bench tops and a clever island bench with storage underneath completes the elegant kitchen. As a bonus, the indulgent city views can be enjoyed from just about anywhere - which simply elevates an already luxurious apartment to the next level and guarantees an idyllic urban lifestyle in maximum comfort. Extra conveniences include a concealed laundry; secure entry, an undercover car space plus a pool and a gym. This exceptional apartment also has the unexpected feeling of seclusion and privacy, yet shopping, transport and the Yarra River are all on your doorstep.

Description:
ENJOY THE HAVEN LIFESTYLE
The easy living open plan design features a spacious living and dining room with timber floors opening out to a balcony which overlooks the swimming pool and a tree top greenery aspect through to the Yarra River. The balcony is also accessed via the main bedroom suite which includes mirrored built in robes and ensuite bathroom.The kitchen is stylish with stone bench tops, soft-closing drawers, Miele appliances and includes gas cooking and dishwasher. The second bedroom features sliding shutter doors, mirrored built in robes and has the potential to be used as a home office, guest room or study.
Other apartment extras include a central bathroom with laundry facilities, reverse cycle heating and cooling, video intercom entry and a secure car park.
Resident facilities include a welcoming lobby entrance with fireplace, rooftop terrace, BBQ's and a Well-Being Retreat featuring swimming pool, sundeck, gym, sauna and therapy room.
With fabulous cafes on site and only moments to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, transport at your door step plus Yarra River walking and bike paths you really can enjoy the Haven lifestyle.

Description:
A luxurious investment.....
If you're the type of investor who needs to be able to picture yourself or a family member happily residing in a property, or if you plan to occupy down the track, then this is possibly the right property for you to invest in.
More reminiscent of a luxury hotel than an apartment complex, flexibility and style are delivered within this corner-position Eden apartment, it enjoys the juxtapose of the bush land and water of the Yarra and our bustling cosmopolitan city along with the award winning facilities and amenities offered by the development.
*Sleek modern fitout
*Stylish open plan kitchen
*Miele appliances; stone benchtops & mirrored splashbacks
*Large versatile living/dining/study area
*Good size balcony enjoying morning sun
*Great bedrooms both with windows and robes
*Master bedroom with generous ensuite
*Iconic Melbourne outlook
*Ample storage throughout
*Secured car park & handy storage cage
*Leased until 3rd December 2018 for $31,285 pa
The Eden lifestyle offers residents a rooftop deck including spas, BBQ areas, meeting, function & cinema areas all with those amazing river and city aspects. Take full advantage of the Health & Wellbeing Centre inclusive of a 25 metre heated lap pool, spa, sauna and two gyms. Positioned on the river end of Acacia Place are Popular Kitty Burns and Frankie Says cafes leading onto the river walking and cycling trails.
Just 3km from the Melbourne CBD with shopping at Victoria Gardens and transport at your door. Smart investors will reap the rewards.

Description:
LUXURIOUS & MODERN, ENJOY THE BEST OF “GREEN SQUARE” LIVING
Location is everything with this light filled apartment. Yarra River recreation trails, Victoria Street tram and Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre are moments away. This has everything you want and more!
- Large bedroom with built in robes
- Spacious living/dining area with reverse cycle heating/cooling
- Enormous, undercover terrace overlooks the communal garden
- Open plan kitchen/dining; High end Smeg appliances, gas stove, dishwasher and stone benchtop
- Sleek bathroom and separate European laundry
- Security video entry, security camera
- Access to heated pool, gym, communal gardens, BBQ, library, meeting rooms & private entertainment facilities
This is the best of inner city living! Luxury finishes with a modern colour palette, this is move and enjoy time! The delights of restaurants/cafes on Victoria Street & Victoria Gardens cinema are right on your doorstep. Take a stroll alongside the Yarra River, ride the bike paths, or visit the golf course and parkland only minutes away. Only a short tram ride to the CBD!
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.

Description:
City-edge living at PRECINCT
Moments from the buzz of Victoria Street, this perfect fifth floor apartment captures the essence of city living with its quality inclusions, private surrounds and fabulous residents’ facilities. Super-stylish interior comprises 2 double bedrooms (both with robes) and one with ensuite. Sleek central bathroom, open living/dining area. Description:
Private and peaceful with huge potential
Positioned on a peaceful cul de sac in an alluring Abbotsford location with the Yarra River and trails on the doorstep, this single level freestanding residence presents an irresistible basis for pursuing plans to update or extend (STCA). Perfectly comfortable now, light filled, zoned interiors include living and dining opening to a central sun drenched courtyard, complemented by a well equipped kitchen featuring induction cooktop and stainless oven and a versatile second living space or studio with northerly aspects. Two bedrooms fitted with built in robes provide leafy outlooks over the rear paved courtyard and share a functional bathroom with bath and shower. Also includes one off street parking space. Ideally located with shopping and dining close by as well as trams, Victoria Park and Collingwood stations, Abbotsford Convent and Collingwood Children's Farm.

Description:
Location! Location! Location! Thrilling possibilities on 185m2 (approx.)
With the enchantment of its Victorian architecture now just a forgone reverie, this executor’s sale on a brilliant corner site of 185m2 (approx.), brings aspirations of renewed 21st century luxury. Its unparalleled locale, just 3kms from the CBD, delivers an effervescent inner-city lifestyle, metres from the Victoria Street’s decadent cuisines, Yarra River recreation, Victoria Gardens shopping, and city-bound trams.
Offering hints of its bygone era, the three-bedroom layout flaunts 10-foot ceilings and a scattering of ornate rosettes, picture rails and a cast-iron fireplace. Separate lounge and dining rooms are complemented by a central gas kitchen, spilling into the rear garage and workshop which doubles as a broader entertaining area. Each bedroom is generously sized including built-in robes, sharing an updated bathroom.
Situated within a General Residential Zone 1, free from planning overlays or title covenants, the site delivers inspiration for an extravagant renovation or extension, or the chance to realise your luxury new home dreams with potential city skyline views from the upper storey (STCA).

Luxuriously large, river-edge and resort-style
Arguably the most exciting offering in the Award Winning "Sanctuary" development, this sensational river-edge apartment is designed for those who demand the space and accommodation of a family home with the carefree advantages of a luxury apartment lifestyle. Right on the edge of Hawthorn handy to exclusive private schools, Victoria Gardens shopping and transport options, stunning water and bushland views are yours to enjoy both day and night from an outstanding 169m2 home where 3 bedroom/2 bathroom accommodation is quietly positioned well away from expansive living and entertaining areas, all enveloped by a stylish 39m2 viewing terrace. Consummate attention to detail prevails here with a sizeable and deluxe stone/Miele kitchen/butler's pantry designed for the most fastidious home chef, climate controlled cellar for the wine enthusiast, ample storage areas, Hotel-style main ensuite, home-office nook, high-speed NBN, Foxtel, zoned heating/cooling, plumbed BBQ, 3 car basement parking, 2 storage cages and access to communal rooftop spa-deck, cinema, lobby bar, function center, 2 gyms, 25 mt heated pool, spa, sauna, cafes and 24 hour concierge.

Description:

Architect-designed residence in a cool River Precinct cul-de-sac, this brilliant loft terrace is a stroke of genius in the boutique St Joseph's complex showcasing cutting-edge style, stunning features and impressive 4.2m ceiling. Stroll to the Yarra, the Convent, Victoria Street restaurants, Three Bags Full cafe and train station from this outstanding townhouse with own street frontage featuring a flexible 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom floorplan, light and airy interior with natural ventilation, landscaped entertainment courtyard and basement car space and storage cage on title. This compelling new home is an easy-care, city-fringe haven boasting open-plan living and dining area with polished concrete floor/ceiling and full-height windows, streamlined gourmet Bosch kitchen with extendable stainless steel bench, main bedroom with glazed-entry ensuite, laundry, built-in storage and reverse-cycle heating/cooling.

Description:
A luxury lifestyle opportunity
This exemplary two bedroom apartment encompasses all the benefits of resort style living in a luxury complex with resident only facilities such as a rooftop entertaining area, gym and pool as well as two riverside cafes. Nestled between family oriented Kew and vibrant Abbotsford, the abode features the finest virtues such as double glazed windows and an exceptionally large balcony with unbeatable river views. The open plan living and dining area is complemented by built in cabinetry, floor to ceiling glass doors and a contemporary kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Both bedrooms are spacious with built in robes, while the main has balcony access and an ensuite. Additional features include underground parking, a generous storage cage, laundry and security concierge. The residence is located by picturesque Yarra River surrounds, conveniently near Victoria Gardens shopping precinct, the 109 tram service and a number of schools such as Abbotsford Primary school, Xavier College, MLC and Trinity Grammar School.

Description:
Iconic Terrace in a Prime Position
City-edge living at its brilliant best, this gorgeous Victorian (one of six historic Winniefred Terraces circa 1888) sets itself apart with its free-flowing design, first-class features throughout and unrivalled urban convenience. Beyond the timeless facade with its distinctive polychromatic brickwork, discover an inspired interior showcasing three large bedrooms (master with WIR and stylish ensuite), main central bathroom and separate powder room. Add to this an elegant central lounge through to the light-filled open dining area and gourmet granite-bench kitchen complete with soft-close drawers, Falcon oven and integrated Miele dishwasher. Other highlights of the home include two gas fireplaces (lounge and dining), solid timber floors and high ceilings throughout, European laundry, plus a private rear courtyard and spacious rooftop terrace. Moments from the open spaces of Victoria Park, it's also walking distance to Dights Falls and endless Yarra River trails, close to Smith Street shops and eateries, Victoria Park Station and choice of bus routes. Currently leased for $775 per week. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
An effervescent inner-city lifestyle with exciting options
Highly coveted yet rarely found, this three-bedroom freestanding town residence takes pride of place under the tranquil canopy of a tree-lined street, occupying an exceptional 161m2 allotment (approx.) Offering a galaxy of possibilities, its city-fringe position delivers ultimate convenience, just a few paces from trendy cafes and decadent eateries, city-bound transport, and daily shopping.
Smothered in original c1970's styling, the home provides generous proportions for living and dining, spilling into a garden courtyard where alfresco entertainment is enjoyed under the shelter of a peppercorn tree. Upstairs, three bedrooms offer space for rest and retreat, sharing a retro family bathroom, while a second bathroom downstairs provides guest amenity.
A perfect introduction to inner-city living, the property's substantial dimensions invites prospects for a lavish renovation, or the possibility for a luxurious new home design (STCA). Located just 3kms from the CBD, enjoy an effervescent lifestyle, minutes from the MCG and sporting precinct, Yarra River parklands and recreation, and Victoria Gardens Shopping.

Description:
Alluring single level abode
Behind an elegant Victorian façade this completely renovated three bedroom home features spacious single level proportions and delivers immediate lifestyle appeal. Classic high ceilings and timber floors provide delightful period character while two bright bedrooms present fireplaces and built in robes. A third bedroom offers a walk in robe and direct access to the immaculately finished main bathroom. Families can relax and unwind in the inviting living zone fitted with extensive windows boasting a north facing aspect and views of a private courtyard with lush greenery. An open plan kitchen and dining area comprises stainless steel appliances, built in wine rack and glass doors opening to the rear garden equipped with a retractable awning perfect for year-round alfresco dining. Ideally situated moments from the Yarra River, bike trails and trams as well as a host of restaurants, this superb abode is completed by single carpark with rear lane access.

Description:
Expressions of Interest closing 5th June at 12 noon
Intelligent design, entertaining finesse
The quintessential inner-urban experience, this sensational home with bedroom suite downstairs, reveals an intelligent design of surprising space and functionality on a tree-lined street in the popular Convent precinct. Indulging the fastidious occupants with luxurious accommodation where all 3 bedrooms are accompanied by their own exclusive-use bathrooms, this stylish home is also a consummate indoor/outdoor entertainer with a generous expanse of living areas extending northwards through a bank of bi-folds to a deep al fresco deck amidst private easy-care garden landscape. A bonus study also doubles as a nursery or additional retreat whilst sleek stone-finished kitchen (WI pantry), timber floors, powder room, storeroom, R/C heater/coolers and OSP guarantee commitment to comfort. Brilliant contemporary living close to the Convent gallery, public transport, cafes, Yarra Bend parklands and restaurants catering to every conceivable cuisine.

Situated in an enviable Abbotsford locale with an ENORMOUS terrace perfect for entertaining, this apartment is sure to impress.
Suited to both savvy investors or a busy professional looking for convenience and lifestyle, amenities are state of the art ‘Green Square’ complex include rooftop barbecue area, lap pool, spa, sauna, gym and library retreat.

Benefit from the convenience of Victoria Street trams, Victoria Gardens shopping centre, the Yarra & surrounding parklands and the Bridge Road lifestyle precinct all within a stones throw from your door.

EXQUISITE TOWNHOUSE, SET QUIETLY IN A PRIME LOCATION
Be astonished by the overall size and quality of this marvellous home, drenched in sunlight and finished off with complete class.
- 2 large bedrooms, built in robes, electric heating, master with split system heating and cooling
- 2 bathrooms off both bedrooms, master with shower over bath
- Central living room, polished floors, split system heating and cooling, immense amount of sun
- Dining area off kitchen/living, with a gorgeous flow out to your private entertainers’ balcony with views!

- Garage car parking via remote control with direct internal access, study nook, security intercom and direct laneway access to entry
Located in a quiet neighbourly street, just a short walk to the delights of Victoria Street and Bridge Road, Victoria Gardens. Enjoy the outdoors on the Yarra River bike paths and walking trails. Easy access to transport options taking you to Melbourne's Sporting Precinct, the CBD and more!

Modern contemporary living with sun drenched private courtyard. Every convenience at your doorstep, the delights of Victoria Street eateries and tranquility of Yarra River walks only a short stroll away.

Description:
‘Lock and leave’ luxury, moments from the CBD
Superbly situated in Abbotsford’s sophisticated Eden development, this two bedroom two bathroom corner apartment will surely impress. Whether you are in search of a place to enjoy as a full time residence or a weekend oasis when travelling to the city, look no further that apartment 406.
This luxurious lifestyle opportunity starts with a full length swimming pool, two spas, two fitness centres, cinema room, rooftop kitchen and dining area and the added bonus of a concierge. Enjoy breakfast and coffee at your choice of Kitty Burns and Frankie Says, two of the suburbs favourite, right at your doorstep.
Featuring a light filled floorplan with two spacious bedrooms with built in robes, master with ensuite, and a generous open plan living and dining area link to a spacious and private corner terrace. A stylish kitchen includes Miele appliances, stone benchtop and a built in Miele fridge, central bathroom plus a separate euro laundry neatly tucked away. In addition, two secure, tandem car spaces along with ample extra storage space.
With a lifestyle location close to the Yarra, across the road from Victoria Gardens and public transport galore, this apartment is a must see. Attend the next open and enquire today to avoid missing out.

Description:
Large 55m2 Riverside living / blue-chip investing!
A brilliant opportunity for professionals and investors alike, this seventh floor apartment is set in the former "Yarra Falls Mills" and will impress with its light-filled design, quality inclusions and exclusive river precinct location. As-new interior comprises, one double bedroom (with robes), large study/ sitting area, stylish central bathroom, open-plan living area leading out to a large undercover balcony with City glimpses. Add to all of this a stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel appliances, split-system heating and cooling, euro style laundry, quality carpets and floors, plus lift access to a secured parking space, large storage cage and your own bike rack. Take a short stroll to Yarra trails, Dights Falls and Victoria Park, or have a bite to eat at Trenerry or Chomp Café just moments from your building. The vibrant Johnston Street shopping precinct and multiple public transport options are all close by. The vendor is motivated to see this asset sell and would consider offers before Auction.

Description:
Affordable, Chic apartment in convenient location
This two-bedroom apartment is the perfect example of convenient living at its very best. Located on Level two in a fully equipped apartment complex. The property itself has been immaculately maintained. It features an open-plan kitchen, dining and living area, which leads out to a balcony. Stainless-steel Miele appliances, a gas stovetop, stone benchtops add to the air of sophistication and combine effortlessly with a contemporary bathroom. The main bedroom comes with a built-in wardrobe, and there’s the option to transform the second bedroom into a study if so desired. It comes with air conditioning, a video intercom and a secure basement-level car park. The development boasts its own cafe, access to a beautiful, indoor heated pool and a fully-equipped state-of-the-art gymnasium. The property is vacant and ready to move in. Meanwhile, the Victoria Gardens shopping precinct is just moments away, stroll to IKEA, catch a movie at the cinema or grab a spot of lunch at one of the cafes. Victoria Street is also practically on your doorstep, positioning you within moments from the buzzing epicentre of some of Melbourne’s best Vietnamese eateries. Several public transport options are also a stone’s throw away and scenic Yarra Trail. This is one opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Alluring inner urban terrace with a contemporary heart
Heritage charm and contemporary class unite in a stylishly renovated three bedroom, two chic bathroom terrace located on the city's esteemed eastern fringe. Set behind a historic polychromatic brick exterior, premium interiors include open plan living and light filled dining zone unfolding onto an alfresco deck/courtyard where stacker doors invite the outside in. Stealing the limelight, a high end kitchen flaunts stone benches, smart cabinetry and fully integrated appliances, including refrigerator. Features open fireplaces, high ceilings, polished Baltic pine floorboards, BIR and heating/cooling. Walking distance to Abbotsford Convent, Yarra River parks, cafes, shops, transport and the CBD.

Description:
The finest inner city facilities, with great investment rewards
This dazzling modern apartment is the perfect first home, city base or investment property. Currently leased at $330 per week on a month to month basis, the investment return is to be desired. An apartment in which the bright, open plan living and dining area flows to an expansive undercover balcony with North Westernly views, while the kitchen features stone benches, Meile appliances and soft closing storage. The central bedroom's stylish proportions incorporate generous built in robes that enhance its comfort level and a separate bathroom with euro laundry incorporated adds the perfect touch. This lock up and leave style apartment is accompanied by a building that offers a range of enviable residents' facilities. 'Eden's' concierge service, cafe, meeting room, landscaped garden area and cinema are complemented by a comprehensive health retreat featuring a lap pool, spa and gym. In addition, the rooftop delivers barbeque entertaining, outdoor fireplaces and hot tubs - all enhanced by outlooks over the Yarra River and across the CBD. Additional basement storage cage and all just moments from trams, Victoria Gardens shopping and the Yarra bank bike paths.

Description:
An inspired warehouse of unique proportions
A former textile factory merges original features with fantastic inner city living. This ultra-cool two bedroom plus study/guest zone warehouse conversion is a must see for passionate entertainers/professionals. Unique and versatile with its own entry, street frontage, intriguing open plan and multi-level layout. It features a saw-tooth roof, polished concrete and merbau floors, exposed bricks/steel and checker-plate stairways. Vast glass aspects filter northerly light into a large living domain, balcony, loft retreat and spacious s/steel kitchen. Private patio, WIR/inbuilt storage, spa bathroom, heating/cooling and garage with direct entry. Exclusively placed near Abbotsford Convent, the Yarra, Victoria Street restaurant precinct and just 3kms from the CBD.

Description:
The best of the best
City sights, Yarra delights and a multi awarded lifestyle setting all contribute to this two bedroom apartment's best of the best status in luxurious "Eden", a resort style building positioned on the leafy banks of the Yarra River. Spacious, super smart and importantly lock up and leave, this beautifully bright inner city asset boasts a highly prized CBD skyline view as well as tranquil outlooks over the lush green expanses of the River and vineyard below. Miele appliances, stone benchtops and a double sink confirm the quality of an open plan kitchen that transitions to inviting living/dining zones and out to an undercover terrace that offers private entertaining amid the spectacular panorama. Two comfortably sized bedrooms with robes and a stylish bathroom feature a more generous main with study nook, dual BIRs and ensuite. A Euro laundry, zoned ducted heating/cooling, intercom security, basement parking and additional storage complete first class accommodation taken to the next level by its unique river land environment, easy access to city edge lifestyle drawcards and awarded resident only amenities. Features full concierge service, heated lap pool, spa, sauna, two gyms, rooftop deck and BBQ areas, meeting/function facilities, cinema and renowned Kitty Burns and Frankie Says cafes. Stroll to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Victoria Street trams, waterside bike and walking trails with only moments to Bridge Road, the MCG and Sports Precinct.
Insights: 1009/1 Acacia Place, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2018 and 94 other 2 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
City-edge living at PRECINCT
Moments from the buzz of Victoria Street, this highly maintained apartment on the second floor captures the essence of city living with its quality inclusions, private surrounds and fabulous residents’ facilities. Super-stylish interior comprises 2 double bedrooms (both with robes) and sleek central bathroom, open living/dining area. Add to is an undercover terrace that has a lovely south west orientation to Eureka Tower and a quiet central courtyard outside your front door, The apartment is complete with stone-bench kitchen with Miele cooking appliances and dishwasher, Daikin split-system heating and cooling, Euro laundry, plus video intercom, secure foyer, storage cage, secured parking and well equipped residents’ gymnasium and indoor pool. Included in the development is "Rons Hamburgers" which is perfect for that afternoon snack and an onsite childcare centre for busy working parents. Minutes away is the Yarra Trail bike bath, Abbotsford Convent, Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and trams to the CBD or Box Hill. Offers prior to Auction will be considered by the vendor.

Description:
CONTEMPORARY STYLE, UNBEATABLE LOCATION WITH OVER 5% RETURN!
Nestled at the rear of the block, this quiet, north facing apartment overlooks an internal garden area. Only a stone’s throw to the peace and tranquillity of the Yarra River bike/walking trail.
- 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes
- Light filled open plan living/dining area with reverse cycle heating/cooling
- Private, north facing balcony
- Sleek kitchen with Miele stainless appliances, gas stove top, dishwasher and stone benchtops
- Modern bathroom; European laundry
- Security intercom entry; Storage cage
- Access to the pool, gym and private gardens
Ideally located within walking distance to the delights of Victoria Street and Bridge Road cafes, restaurants and shops. Victoria Gardens cinema and transport are also at your door. Take a stroll alongside the Yarra River, ride the bike paths, or visit the golf course and parkland only minutes away. Only a short tram ride to the CBD, this is truly the best of inner city living!

Description:
Light-filled luxury with panoramic views
Prepare to be surprised! Just a short walk to Victoria Street cafes, peaceful Yarra walks and North Richmond Station, this stunning 2-level town residence at the prized northern end of The Hive offers private, secure living with panoramic views from all main rooms. From lift entry to a landscaped boardwalk, this light-filled home comprises an expansive living/dining room flowing to a vast entertaining balcony with views to Studley Park; designer kitchen (Smeg appliances, soft-close cabinetry, stone benchtops); three double bedrooms (BIRs; main with balcony and ensuite) plus study zone; second elegant bathroom, powder room and euro laundry. Including two secure car spaces, this impressive CBD-edge home features polished timber floors, video intercom, air conditioning and superior appointments.

Description:
The ideal inner city scenario
The timelessly, traditionally appealing image of this single fronted Victorian fits perfectly into the period streetscape of an Abbotsford address widely regarded as the area's finest, consistently sought after for its proximity to great cafes, Collingwood station, the Victoria Street precinct and access to Yarra Bend Park. Two double bedrooms, each including built in robes and an open fire-place beneath their classical high ceilings, line the elegant arched hall leading to living and dining areas that convey the enduring character and complete comfort of previous renovation. A galley style kitchen zone performs with the modern efficiency that also defines the sky-lit bathroom while a study featuring access to a generous brick paved courtyard further enhances a home offering instant inner city appeal. Options for updating and extending when the mood or the moment are right, STCA, ensure the future prospects are as attractive as the present day profile.

Description:
The Ultimate in Location and Lifestyle
This exceptional apartment is located in the heart of Abbotsford with the tram at your doorstop allowing for easy access to the city.
Positioned within walking distance to Victoria Street amenities, Victoria Gardens Shopping complex and just a stone's throw to the beautiful Yarra River walking trails.
This sensational two bedroom apartment offers all the convenience of inner city living with an inviting interior and clean crisp finishes. Complete with spacious living and meals area and featuring a modern kitchen with Miele appliances and stone bench tops, floor to ceiling windows with an undercover balcony boasting views of the Yarra gardens.
Both bedrooms feature mirrored built in robes,
luxurious central bathroom, split system heating and cooling, secure video/intercom entry, and secure basement car park.
The resort style complex offers you access to an indoor swimming pool, gymnasium, beautiful manicured gardens and outdoor areas which further add to this wonderful apartment.
Perfect for owner occupiers and investors alike.
This apartment offers the ultimate in location and lifestyle.

Description:
Re-defined by designer renovation
One of Abbotsford's rare cul-de-sac settings ensures exclusivity and complete convenience accompany this exceptional Victorian - a city edge home that has been comprehensively renovated with evident skill, style and success. Two downstairs bedrooms featuring open fireplaces beneath beautiful original pressed metal ceilings lead to a central bathroom that's fully tiled and fabulously appointed. To the rear, polished concrete floors define a living/dining area that includes the contemporary kitchen's stone benches and Miele appliances. The courtyard's elegant, low maintenance landscaping enhances enjoyment while upstairs, designer decking adds an engaging outdoor element to a main bedroom featuring walk in robes and a sophisticated ensuite. A bright nursery or home office offers fourth bedroom flexibility, in addition to a cleverly integrated separate study nook. Hydronic heating throughout completes the package. North Richmond station, Victoria Street and the CBD are all so easily reached from this refined, renovated address.

Recent sales in the Street have seen development applications approved so get in fast and secure this great portion of land before it goes.

Description:
Cre8. Negoti8. Celebr8!
Nestled in a quiet residential street within Abbotsford's prized river and parks precinct, this tightly held ground floor apartment is ideal for the first home buyer looking to save big on stamp duty charges, investors or those downsizing. In need of some tender love and care, it’s ripe for renovation and your personal stylish touch!
Located in a boutique block with low quarterly body corporate fees of approx. $474, this approx. 65sqm unit has a spacious living/dining area overlooking an open plan kitchen, two large bedrooms, a central bathroom and nearby laundry facilities. Packed full of potential, with some imagination and addition of style and flair, you will see it's value soar!
You have an allocated car space on the property as well as the advantage of obtaining highly sought after off street parking permit for two cars with the benefit of close access to Eastern Freeway. It's a location hard to beat, within walking distance to local cafes, bars, restaurants, farmers market, the Abbotsford Convent precinct, Collingwood Children's Farm, bike paths by the Yarra and Collingwood train station, all makes this city fringe lifestyle opportunity, one not to miss!
PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED ON ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
Enjoy every Abbotsford advantage
Brimming with natural light on the top floor of a boutique building of only eleven and enhanced by balcony outlooks to the north, the modern proportions of this inviting apartment provide all the reasons you need for enjoying the advantages of Abbotsford - from lifestyle or investment points of view. A location offering ideal proximity to the serene, green escape of Gahan Reserve, Collingwood station, Victoria Street and bike paths along the Yarra complements stylish contemporary spaces including the north-facing living/dining area, its substantial balcony and an open-plan kitchen featuring stone benches, Miele stainless steel appliances and ample integrated storage. A double bedroom with built-in robes accommodates in consummate comfort while a separate bathroom confirms the designer style of an apartment further enhanced by reverse cycle air conditioning and video intercom. Allocated garaging adds to the quality, convenience and credentials of an outstanding inner city opportunity that suggests reliable ongoing rewards and returns.

Description:
AN ABSOLUTE RIPPER…
Charming double fronted period home in prime location.
From the moment you enter this unique property you know it's something very special. Brilliant order throughout whilst offering scope to enhance.
- 2 good sized bedrooms with built in robes
- Large living with air conditioning, leading onto lush rear yard
- Timber kitchen with dishwasher leading to meals area
- Central bathroom with bath and separate shower
- Period detailing, separate laundry
- Attic storage, hydronic heating
- Beautiful paved entertaining area
- Land 12.5 x 17.25m approx
Moments from the Convent, Children’s Farm, Yarra bikepaths to the City, Yarra Boulevard and Studley Park walking tracks. Stroll to Gertrude, Smith and Johnston Streets. Walk to the MCG and the city or choose between trams, trains (2 minute walk) and abundant buses.
The owners, who are passionate about Abbotsford, have put together extensive owners’ notes full of photos about what they have loved about the house, public transport, local schools, and tucked away features of the local area. Just type 41-43RaphaelSt.com into your browser to see them.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.

Description:
Street frontage with its own entry!
With its own street frontage and sizeable courtyard, this larger-than-normal ground floor apartment makes an ideal first home, investment, or city pad. Offering dual entry, the apartment boasts top quality fixtures and fittings throughout, including a very well appointment kitchen with s/steel appliances, gas cook top, dishwasher and stone bench kitchen with island bench, large open plan living/dining room with access to the courtyard making it perfect for entertaining. Modern bathroom includes excellent storage with internal laundry facilities, plus separate bedroom with BIRs. Further includes heating/cooling, secure car space and storage cage. Walk to the Yarra River and bike trails, Victoria Street trams and train station, plus a plethora of cafes and shops just moments way including Victoria Gardens. This is city-edge living at its finest!

Description:
Luxurious warehouse living and a vibrant city-fringe lifestyle
Character-filled and entirely captivating, this three-bedroom loft warehouse conversion spectacularly balances its industrial origins with contemporary functionality and flair. Original brick and timber features converge with modern fittings, mirrored surfaces and lush greenery in a breathtaking medley, highlighting its remarkable dimensions throughout. A sun-filled open plan living and dining zone welcomes guests with astounding space in the comfort of split-system air-conditioning, incorporating a lush, private courtyard for alfresco enjoyment, and a stunning guest bathroom with retro claw-foot bath. The semi-industrial stainless-steel form of the breakfast bar befits the warehouse charm, while harmoniously juxtaposing the granite and gloss contemporary kitchen offering a double-oven Ilve cooker and Bosch dishwasher to easily entertain. Three loft-style bedrooms (two with walk-in robes) flank a second bathroom with double shower, providing two-way access to the master suite. Complete with an extensive European laundry, and single garage with exceptional storage and immediate internal access. Ideally positioned just 3kms from the CBD, this peaceful sanctuary incites a lifestyle of recreation with the Yarra River, Studley Park, Abbotsford Convent and Victoria Street’s eateries within walking distance. With transport surrounding, enjoy easy access to Victoria Gardens, MCG, and Brunswick & Johnston Street social scene.

Description:
Picture perfect views at 'The Precinct'
The light, warmth and energy efficiency of an entirely north facing two bedroom apartment is rarely on offer, seldom is this coupled with views to a horizon of parklands. This first impression is immediately attractive but only once you have strolled through the community atmosphere of 'The Precinct' can you fully appreciate the full benefit of premium apartment living. A short walk past the secure entry with camera and intercom through appealing outdoor communal areas provides easy access to the city via public transport and bike paths. Miele appliances and distinctive lighting are the hallmarks of a luxurious kitchen while a central bathroom features quality finishes, walk in shower and stylish charcoal tiles. Serviced by onsite security, building manager and childcare, clever storage, gym, indoor lap pool and secure lock up storage this is truly the ultimate lifestyle proposition adjacent to the Yarra River, Victoria Gardens shopping centre and the vibrancy that defines Victoria Street.

Description:
Spectacular River Views
This bright corner apartment on level 7 in the prestigious Haven building has commanding views to the north over the Yarra River.
A spacious living/dining/kitchen area with double sets of sliding doors opens to a sunny balcony to take in the views.
Timber floor boards feature in the living area and the kitchen boasts an island bench, stone bench tops and Meile appliances.
The two large bedrooms both enjoy natural light with the master including a luxurious en-suite and the second bedroom a sliding door to its own balcony.
Also including double roller blinds throughout, extensive storage, main bathroom including laundry facilities and a secure car space and storage cage.
Residents enjoy access to the 25 metre heated pool, spa, sauna, rooftop and two gyms. The main Yarra bike trail runs past the complex and provides bike and walking access to nearby parks and bushland.
Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre is across the road and popular Frankie Says and Kitty Burns cafes are on your doorstep. The 109 and 12 tram services are only a short walk away.

Description:
MODERN "EDEN ON THE RIVER" - CLOSE TO EVERYTHING!
Make the most of this one bedroom 'Eden on the River' apartment, ideal for smart investors (Current Lease expiry January 2018) or future owner occupiers seeking a relaxed and comfortable low maintenance apartment moments to Victoria Gardens and Victoria Street restaurants.
Fitted with stylish stone bench tops and floor-to-ceiling windows, this 7th floor retreat features a bright central living zone which opens out to a large balcony where you can take in the serene leafy views of the nearby Yarra River while enjoying an alfresco meal or Sunday morning coffee.
The kitchen has sleek cabinetry and stainless steel Miele appliances including an integrated dishwasher, while the bedroom enjoys mirrored built-in robes and timber shutter sliding doors for an open or private way of living. Other standout features include a stylish bathroom with laundry facilities, split-system heating and cooling, video intercom.
The resort-style facilities of Eden are simply stunning and include a lobby bar, lounge with fireplace and business centre on the ground floor, rooftop terrace with river and city views, BBQs, movie lounge with large screen TV, boardroom and the 'Health and Well-Being Retreat' featuring a heated lap pool, spa, sundeck, gym, sauna, and therapy room.
Trams at your doorstep make going into the city an absolute breeze, while you're only moments to Yarra River walking and bike paths, Yarra Bend Park, schools, local shops and cafes, buses and North Richmond Station.

SPACIOUS INNER-CITY LIVING, ONLY MOMENTS TO YARRA RIVER!
Contemporary designer living with sun drenched private courtyard. Every convenience at your doorstep, the delights of Victoria Street eateries and tranquillity of Yarra River walks only a short stroll away.

Description:
Distinguished by superb design
The innovative, imaginative approach for which Interlandi Mantesso Architects are so highly regarded is immediately evident throughout this sophisticated c2017 townhouse - a residence that's equally distinctive in terms of its external lines and its internal dimensions. Beyond unique aesthetic first impressions and an elevated entrance, a living/dining area framed by 4.2m ceilings and polished concrete floors is complemented by an open-plan kitchen where the beauty of black stone bench-tops enhances the visual impact of sparkling stainless steel appliances. A downstairs bedroom featuring heating/cooling, built-in robes and its own bathroom is matched upstairs by a similarly seductive second bedroom also accompanied by an exceptional ensuite and built-in robes. Secure parking for two cars ensures the style of the design is matched by total convenience in a location that puts great cafes, the Yarra Trail, the Victoria Street vibe, trams and trains to the CBD all within moments' walk.
