Description:
LUXURIOUS & MODERN, ENJOY THE BEST OF “GREEN SQUARE” LIVING
Making the most of its north facing position, this light filled apartment has been finished to the highest standard and boasts everything you could want for!
- 2 large bedrooms - Master with walk in robe and ensuite, second bedroom with built in robes
- Spacious, sun drenched living area with floorboards and reverse cycle heating/cooling
- Separate study nook
- Great sized terrace with decking tiles and capturing north light; overlooks the communal garden
- Open plan kitchen/dining with high end Smeg appliances, gas stove, dishwasher, stone bench top and integrated fridge included
- Main central bathroom with bath; European laundry
- 1 secure off street carpark plus storage cage
- Security video entry, security camera
- Access to heated pool, gym, communal gardens, BBQ, library, meeting rooms and private entertainment facilities
This is the best of inner city living! Luxury finishes with a modern colour palette, this is move and enjoy time! The delights of restaurants/cafes on Victoria Street and Victoria Gardens cinema are right on your doorstep. Take a stroll alongside the Yarra River, ride the bike paths, or visit the golf course and parkland only minutes away. Only a short tram ride to the CBD!

Description:
Home Size Riverfront Two Bedroom Plus Study
This large as new 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom plus study apartment in the prestigious Haven building features scenic views over the Capital City Trail, Yarra River and bushland. Enjoy total privacy on the 42 sqm balcony with access from the spacious living area and both bedrooms.
With space for a separate dining area and lounge the large open plan living area boasts a bespoke feature marble fire place with gas fire and AV joinery. The entertainer’s kitchen includes a large island bench, stone bench tops, mirrored splash back, 2pac joinery and an integrated fridge.
Other features include a separate study, luxury en-suite, timber floorboards to the living area, integrated reverse-cycle air conditioning throughout, abundant internal storage, euro-style laundry, separate storage cage and two secure car spaces.
Resort style on-site facilities include a heated 25 metre swimming pool, 2 gyms, sauna, spa and a roof top function space. Located opposite Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and with a tram stop at the front door.
Insights: 113/6 Acacia Place , Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2018 and 94 other 2 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Original Federation, Incredible Location
This two-storey Circa 1914 Federation home, poised on an extra-deep block; presents a once-in-a-lifetime chance to renovate it into the family home you've been dreaming of! (STCA.). It's space beyond belief and the location within walking distance to cafes, close to Abbotsford Primary School, Sophia Mundi Steiner School, Collingwood College, tram routes, North Richmond station, Collingwood station and Yarra Parkland is irresistible in terms of lifestyle appeal.
Step inside and view the exquisite pressed metal ceilings of 3.4 metres high (approx.) while the warm hues of Baltic timber floors and a graceful fretwork archway speaks of a rich era. Two of the four bedrooms reside upstairs and the large front master bedroom beautifully captivates with a bay window and a charming fireplace; all gifts of this era which keep on giving.
Further enhancing this home is a captivating lounge room with a skylight, a bathroom with a skylight which is ripe for renovation, a bright functional kitchen/casual meals area with all of the necessities for the 'Home Chef,' a north-facing courtyard, three split system units, a workshop and a rear lane. Travelling through time with such grace, this grand home is ready for an exciting future! (STCA).
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Stylish Inner City Living near Victoria Gardens SC
Stunningly placed in the wonderful Precinct' complex which is moments to vibrant Victoria Street cafes and restaurants plus the Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, this impressive two bedroom apartment is the perfect inner city pad for buyers of all kinds.
An open floorplan and relaxed natural light are just a couple of the excellent highlights you get to experience with this sleek retreat. The sizeable living and dining zone opens out to a generous courtyard which is a superb place to enjoy dinners and drinks with friends when the weather is warm.
The stylish kitchen is splashed with chic stone and features an island bench, elegantly tiled splashback, and stainless steel Miele appliances. Both bedrooms come with built-in robes and are separated by the trendy bathroom which also comes with Grohe tapware and a European laundry. Other property features include video intercom entry and access to an indoor pool, gym, child care centre, and on-site cafe.
Love this stellar location close to Yarra River parklands with bike and walking trails, Abbotsford Convent, Collingwood Children's Farm, North Richmond Station, and trams seconds away on Victoria Street

Description:
Eden awaits
With its thoughtful design, superb landscaping and peaceful position by the Yarra it's immediately obvious why Acacia Place is a multi award winning community. Moments to transport and Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and minutes to the CBD, this spacious and contemporary two bedroom, two bathroom apartment in the Eden building offers an impeccable environment. Presenting a chic kitchen/dining/living with appliances by Miele, stone surfaces and soft close cabinetry, the abode is graced with a tasteful terrace and two study areas. Access to outstanding communal facilities including a health retreat, lap pool, gym, spa, sauna and residents' rooftop with stellar views combines with heating/cooling, strong security, elevator access, parking and a storage cage in delivering amazing city living.

Description:
WHISHING FOR ABBOTSFORD
With vacant possession available now, this little beauty is ready for a loving new owner now! With views over the roof tops of the surrounding area, Iconic Abbottsford Convent, the night skyline will win you over.
Located moments from the tranquil banks of the Yarra River, this stylish and sophisticated 2 bedroom apartment has been architecturally designed with space and privacy in mind. Featuring entertainers style kitchen, enjoy a spacious light and bright living/dining area stepping out to the generous balcony. A luxury bathroom with chic fittings and laundry. Set back from the hustle and bustle of Trenerry Crescent, take advantage of river fitness trails, easy access to the CBD and walking distance to Melbourne's finest restaurants. This is superior inner-city living with all the lifestyle benefits!
Secure car park and storage cage included.
All offers prior to the Auction will be presented to the vendor.

Description:
60sqm outdoor entertaining, sensational river views - moments from the action!
Undoubtedly one of Abbotsford’s best addresses, the aptly named ‘Riviere’ Apartments boast idyllic positioning on the unspoilt banks of the Yarra; beautiful leafy and river views to perfectly complement the very essence of Abbotsford’s vibrant culture and rich history.
Moments from a host of eclectic bars, cafes and restaurants, shopping, trains and trams - and yet, surrounded by pristine bushland, miles of picturesque riverside walking/cycling trails, golfing greens and some of Melbourne’s most iconic attractions - Dights Falls, the old Abbotsford Convent, Children's Farm and Victoria Park within just five minutes walk. It’s hard to believe Melbourne CBD is just a few kilometres away!
Equally as impressive as its location, this superb, very spacious designer apartment is a rare commodity, with not only generous interiors but a HUGE amount of outdoor space - the biggest in the development, boasting over 60sqm of outdoor entertaining with lush river and tree views.
Warm, spacious, light-filled interiors showing thoughtful consideration for today’s busy lifestyle, with exceptional quality in both the construction, build design, finishes and well-designed layout.
Comprising two double bedrooms with mirrored robes, cleverly positioned with great separation and privacy between householders. The master with direct outdoor access and bedroom two also having its own private balcony - each serviced by a large bathroom and laundry combined.
A beautifully appointed kitchen with stone benchtops, abundant storage and quality Blanco cooking appliances and dishwasher, adjoining the open, air-conditioned dining and living with luxe oak floorboards underfoot and floor-to-ceiling windows/doors opening to the generous terrace/balconies on each side.
Intercom entry, lift access, secure basement parking, storage cage and access to the tranquil Yarra River and walking trails.
An enviable lifestyle, or blue-chip investment on the cusp of the city!

Description:
'An Abbotsford Landmark'
Primrose Lodge: This imposing double-fronted Landmark residence is one of Abbotsford's most renowned and finest holdings, offering over 400sqm of land and renovated for family living with the rare appeal of a large workshop/studio and 4-car garage accessed from Federation Lane. The once rear stables (now renovated) offer the possibility to explore further subdivision, addition of second story studio (STCA) or additional integration within the established gardens. Filled with light, this delightful home opens from a tessellated verandah and wide central hall to three double bedrooms (custom BIRs), a spacious sitting room linked by multifold doors to a sunny dining area and a well-equipped kitchen (granite benchtops, custom cabinetry and Miele appliances). Including a stylish bathroom, powder room and laundry, the home flows to a manicured and tranquil north-facing garden bordered by the workshop, garage and second bathroom. Close to Victoria Park and station, Yarra walking trails and the Convent precinct this stunning home features several ornate OFPs, intricately detailed pressed metal ceilings, hydronic heating and split-system air conditioning throughout. This is generational opportunity that offers the rare platform to secure your forever home.
Insights: 15 Abbott Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2017 and 27 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Historic 'Dorothy Terrace': period warmth with outstanding potential
This imposing balcony terrace, stylishly refurbished with outstanding scope for further enhancement and extension (STCA), represents a rare opportunity to enter this secluded heritage precinct, moments from Victoria Park and station, Yarra paths and the Convent Arts precinct. With a wealth of period detail, this comfortable light-filled home offers a versatile floor plan comprising a charming proportioned balcony bedroom, second bedroom and upper-level study, living/dining room open to a sunny kitchen with timber cabinetry, large timber-lined bathroom, laundry and 2nd WC. Including a brick-paved courtyard, this appealing city-edge residence features open fireplaces, deep cornices, polished Baltic floors, new carpets and gas heating.

Description:
Vacant land means pure potential
A vacant, level allotment, always a rarity in the inner city environs, conveys pure potential for creating a brand new residence tailored specifically to meet your own desires and demands. This block provides a perfect example of 'blank canvas' possibilities in a location offering immediate proximity to all the energy, cafes, retail and tram routes of Victoria Street. Such a setting, further enhanced by cul-de-sac exclusivity, ensures lifestyle enjoyment or investment success will accompany the property that's decided upon to grace these tempting dimensions. North Richmond station, the streetscape of East Melbourne and the freedom to walk to work through Fitzroy Gardens add to the attraction of this opportunity - where some 120m2 represents scope on a rewarding inner city scale. Capture the land, seize the moment, define the future - exactly as you envisage it.
Insights: 10A James Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Appreciate Abbotsford's best address
The beauty of this Hawthorn brick Victorian on blue stone foundations, which would be significant anywhere, is hugely enhanced by the unique lifestyle appeal of its setting on Abbotsford's most exclusive street overlooking the evocative environs of Victoria Park. Transformed from an iconic VFL venue to a fabulous community asset, the park complements a home accompanied by an allotment offering exceptional depth and second frontage to Trenerry Crescent. Two generous double bedrooms lead along a classical arched hall to central sitting and dining rooms where bright light from French doors to a north facing courtyard shines on freshly polished Baltic floorboards. A separate, stylishly updated kitchen defined by slate floors flows to a flexible additional living area and beyond to a lush, leafy rear courtyard. The modern bathroom completes a home last sold 30 years ago, poised to provide instant enjoyment, and further potential, close to the Convent precinct and the Capital City Trail.

Stunning family space & light opposite parkland
Directly opposite parkland is the 'Datum House'. From classic double-fronted façade and 4/5 bedroom interior to secluded landscaped garden and separate rear studio, architect Rob Kennon has excelled creating a cleverly-zoned family sanctuary just minutes to the city. This compelling home's brilliant space and light define an innovative design both inside and out combining family functionality with quality and style. Description:
CALLING ALL INVESTORS, RENOVATORS AND BUILDERS!
Enjoying a tremendous inner city location just moments to lively restaurants, cafes, and shops as well as the bustling CBD, this brilliant 2 bedroom original Edwardian home offers buyers an array of exciting possibilities!
With 148 sqm (approx.) of land to play with, the potential is through the roof when it comes to this period property. Buyers will have the option of renovating the home and bringing it into the modern world. Those with possible redevelopment dreams will also be enticed by this property, where the land can be used to build a brand new family home or a luxury townhouse (STCA).
You'll adore the location where you have trendy cafes nearby including Three Bags Full which is just across the road. You're also near picturesque Yarra River parklands including Yarra Bend Park and Studley Park, Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, The Hive Shopping Centre with Aldi and Woolworths supermarkets, Abbotsford Primary School, great private schools, Victoria Park, Collingwood Children's Farm, trams, and train stations.

Description:
North facing balcony with spectacular river views
Perfectly positioned overlooking the Yarra and Studley Park, this sun-filled two bedroom apartment offers a lifestyle second to none. In the heart of Abbotsford and within close proximity to the Yarra Trail, Dights Fall, Collingwood Children's Farm and the Abbotsford Convent with its Saturday Farmer's Market and cafe this apartment has all the sights, sounds and smells of country living just 3.5km from Melbourne's CBD.
This riverfront community offers outstanding accommodation:
- Open Living zone with designer kitchen
- Queen sized bedrooms with BIR's
- Sun filled balcony off the living room
- Sparkling fully tiled bathroom
- Reverse cycle air conditioning and heating
- Full security entry, car park, bike rack and storage cage
Positioned to enjoy easy access not only to the city but also the diversity of delights of greater Melbourne, you are sure to fall in love with the chance to escape home and wander the endless Yarra trails and parkland whenever you choose.

LAVISHLY STUNNING PENTHOUSE WITH SPRAWLING VICTORIA PARK & CITY VIEWS!!
Architecturally designed, underpinning the pinnacle of inner city living

2nd with ensuite and separate study alcove

Description:
Immaculate Apartment, Ultimate Locale
Sale by Closing Date, Monday 4th December (unless SOLD prior)
A rare combination of city fringe convenience and riverside tranquillity, this flawlessly presented one bedroom apartment delivers the best of both worlds and is suited to both owner occupiers and savvy investors alike.
The soothing sounds of the Yarra River assure an ambience along the extra-large north- east facing balcony, which is accessed from both the living zone and bedroom.
Sophisticated interior includes hardwood floors throughout, spacious galley style kitchen (stone benches, stainless steel appliances), and light filled living/dining zone.
Chic fit out in the bathroom (laundry facilities within), plus a thoughtful BIR layout ensure that this home provides the full package for any discerning buyer.
Other features include lift access, secure undercover carpark on title (visitor parking available), video intercom, large storage cage and split-system air conditioner.
Located on the edge of Victoria Park, an easy stroll to Collingwood Train Station and Johnston Street and the Abbotsford Convent, plus convenient access to Eastern Freeway.
Do not miss this opportunity to secure a stunning home in a unique location.
Sale by Closing Date, Monday 4th December (unless SOLD prior)

Description:
Inner Urban Townhouse Conversion (enter via Studley Street)...
One of 2 townhouses included in a corner allotment, industrial conversion. Exemplifying popular inner urban living at its best, it will entice city professionals, creatives, downsizers, investors and lovers of the local lifestyle.
A functional floorplan over 2 levels delivers accommodation at ground level and living space upstairs with an alfresco lifestyle catered for on each level. A spacious, undercover brick paved courtyard (and single auto carport, with possible space for a second vehicle) downstairs and upstairs, a cosmopolitan dining setting at rooftop level.
The open kitchen family meals space sits under original rustic roof trusses, with clerestory windows inviting in natural light. Features include granite bench/breakfast bar, gas cooktop, dishwasher and built-in bookcases plus adjacent powder room.
* Main bedroom with BIRs and double doors to courtyard
* Walk-through ensuite including bath
* Separate laundry
* Split system reverse cycle air-conditioners, panel heaters
* Possible off-street parking for 2 cars
* Eclectic shops and eateries nearby
* Train and tram, minutes to the CBD
* Eastern Freeway, Abbotsford Convent and Collingwood Children's Farm
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days
Also visit the stand alone website at: www.2-125parkstreetabbotsford.com

Description:
Live and Love the Sanctuary Lifestyle
A quintessential ultra-modern lifestyle experience is on offer at the luxury Sanctuary development, with this 1 bedroom ground level apartment enjoying the facilities of pool, spa, gym, sauna, health retreat and yoga studio plus rooftop cinema and entertaining spaces and riverside cafes.
The elegantly fitted apartment features an open plan living area with reverse cycle heating and air-conditioning, leading out to a generous alfresco balcony. The kitchen provides stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and gas cooktop and the bathroom includes a large shower and provision for laundry facilities. There is also a parking space and storage amenity, 24 hour CCTV security and building managers on duty.
The Main Yarra Trail runs along the river and the tram provides speedy access to the CBD on Victoria Street. Shops, supermarket, eateries and entertaining options are just minutes away at Victoria Gardens Shopping Complex.
This smart, low maintenance apartment will suit professional or downsizing singles or couples and investors. It is currently leased until July 2017.
* 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, 1 car space, ground floor apartment
* Luxury riverside location at the Sanctuary
* Open plan living area and alfresco balcony
* Stylish, elegantly-fitted kitchen and bathroom/laundry
* Access to pool, gym, sauna, health retreat and yoga studio
* Cafes, city tram, Victoria Gardens SC and Main Yarra Trail
Terms 10% deposit, balance 60 days
Also visit the stand alone website at: www.117-4acaciaplaceabbotsford.com

Description:
'Green Square': Riverside Urban Sophistication
An unrivalled inner-urban position just metres from Victoria Gardens and the Yarra River is the perfect setting for this sophisticated and state-of-the-art, one bedroom apartment. Finished with all the finest appointments in the highly-coveted 'Green Square' building, this as new apartment is a first class lifestyle option or an investment of enduring market appeal.
With SMEG kitchen appliances, Caesar Stone bench tops and mirrored splash backs, the open-plan kitchen / meals / living is a sleek expression of sophistication with a balcony that currently overlooks the Yarra River, whilst there are mirrored robes in the bedroom and a convenient bathroom / laundry. Fully secure with video entry, basement parking, elevator, this is the ultimate inner-city pad.
This luxury lifestyle is complimented by full use of the in-house library, resort style indoor/outdoor swimming pool, fully equipped gymnasium, rooftop BBQ and entertainment space and its conveniently located on the city fringe, with transport at your doorstep, Victoria Gardens shops and cinemas across the road and world class Vietnamese restaurants just down the street. This is a cosmopolitan location made all the richer by having the Yarra River, Dights Falls and Studley Park all just around the corner as well.

Description:
STUNNNING CITY AND SOUTH VIEWS - UNDER CONTRACT
LIVE IN OR INVEST
On the 7th floor in this brilliantly designed development right near the Yarra River and Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre this spacious 1 bedroom apartment provides everything you need and nothing you don't with the bonus of impressive views.
In a secure building with lift access, a residents pool and gym the well finished apartment features an open living/dining area with a split system air conditioner and a stylish kitchen with stone benches and Miele stainless appliances.
The single bedroom features a built in wardrobe and a great vista and the impressive bathroom features a Euro style laundry. There's also a covered and glass fronted balcony with CBD views as well as a car space and a storage cage in the secure parking garage.
For the astute investor: 4.83% Rental yield approx. Secured lease to fantastic tenants at $19,812.00 p.a. until 26/01/2018
STAMP DUTY FREE FOR 1ST. HOME BUYERS ; *The purchaser and the purchaser's partner must be first home buyers, consistent with the definition under the First Home Owner Grant Act 2000.

Successfully capturing the essence of inner city living - This brand new completed boutique residential building enjoys a superior corner location that enjoys wonderful natural light and terrific outlooks with a superb lifestyle position close to parklands, shops/cafes, public transport and many more highly sought inner-city attractions. This fantastic apartment features a spacious bedroom, central bathroom, separate dining area, light-filled large living zone, secure entrance, undercover parking and storage cage along with huge investment advantages (depreciation benefits & excellent rental potential). Walk to the Yarra bike trails, Collingwood Children's Farm, Smith Street, Johnston Street and many more lifestyle attractions. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd.

Description:
Victorian space and elegance, renovated with distinction
This gracious semi-detached residence, superbly extended and including a tranquil professionally landscaped courtyard garden, offers a versatile design for family living in a quiet street of renovated homes close to the Convent precinct, Victoria Park and public transport. With entry from a French-tiled verandah to a wide arched hallway, this light filled home incorporates an elegant bay-windowed sitting room; an expansive informal living/dining room flowing to north-facing wrap-around courtyard; well-equipped kitchen (granite benchtops, quality appliances); upper-level main bedroom and two further double bedrooms (BIRs); stylish bathroom/laundry (bath and shower) and large attic storeroom. Features of this immaculately renovated home include polished Baltic floors, open fireplaces, rich plaster detail and gas heating.

Description:
Secure investment on the banks of the Yarra
Situated within the trendy Acacia place development on the serene banks of the Yarra River is this exclusive one bedroom residence fully equipped for the avid investor.
Peaceful and private within the 'Eden' building, the functional light filled 1 bedroom apartment offers a bathroom of generous proportions upon entry, a convenient low maintenance kitchen space with stone bench tops and Miele appliances, as well as balcony space for light entertaining and relaxing views.
With a rental return of $370 p/w, this opportunity is sure to lend itself to avid investors with a new lease in place until October 2018.
The apartment complex itself is filled with high-end amenities and only moments to Victoria St restaurants, award winning cafes and shopping within Victoria Gardens (which includes speciality stores and cinemas), Yarra River walking path, Capital City bike track, buses all within walking distance and North Richmond Train Station only a short distance away, this is one not to be missed!
Inspection by appointment only.

Description:
An Elegant Hawthorn Brick Victorian
Travelling through time gracefully, this extended Hawthorn brick residence is destined to always be a family favourite. Such a beautiful home in such a pivotal setting, every conceivable need is flawlessly met in this two-storey residence which graces a period-rich streetscape.
- Be mesmerised by the high intricate ceilings and evocative period traits throughout including polished timber floors
- Three bright bedrooms with built-in robes (the master boasts an ensuite with a spa bath) and a study nook, all featuring brand new carpet
- Second bathroom with an integrated laundry
- Welcoming lounge room with enclosed wood fire
- A sun-filled kitchen/dining area with granite benches, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and gas cooktop
- Newly landscaped courtyard with a spotted gum deck
- Rear lane access (ROW) and substantial storage
- Electric heating and reverse cycle heating/air conditioning
- Huge attic storage
Set just moments from Collingwood train station, Victoria Park, the Abbotsford Convent, Gahan Reserve and trendy cafes along Johnston Street.

Description:
Perfect position - Ticks every box
"I'm looking for an apartment with a pool and gym...
It also needs to be close to the city...
Hopefully there is public transport nearby...
And if there are great running and cycling paths nearby that would be fantastic...
Oh and shopping, cafes, bars would be a bonus...
Maybe morning sunshine would be nice...
I think that is all...perhaps parks and a golf course"
Hard to find? Well we have just the place for you.
This very affordable modern 2 bedroom apartment has it all and you (or your tenants) will love it. Slip into the gym or pool before work and then tram it to the city or elsewhere.
There are no shortage of weekend activities with Victoria Gardens shopping centre, river trails, cafes and more all super close and handy.
The return kitchen with gas cook top, oven and dishwasher lends itself to entertaining around a kitchen or unpacking the days activities. The comfortable living area flows to the East facing balcony which welcomes the morning sun into your home. The master bedroom also enjoys morning sun and a full wall of built in wardrobes.
The central bathroom is clean and sleek with tiled, glass and chrome finishes.
The entire development has security and intercom access.

Description:
Boutique Allotment, Impeccable Inner-City Lifestyle
Rarely does a townhouse enjoy such an enviable inner-city position while being part of such a boutique allotment (1 of only 4), as is the case with this magnificent contemporary town residence. Bathing in natural light with its tall windows and north-facing orientation, the home's expansive open plan living and dining area with well-appointed kitchen (stone bench top, Miele/Westinghouse appliances) and polished timber floors opens onto the private balcony boasting an uninterrupted northerly aspect, 2 generously proportioned bedrooms with BIRs (main with ensuite), entrance foyer with storage closet, central bathroom with laundry, heating and air-conditioning, secure intercom entry and OSP. Just a short stroll from virtually all of the city's main attractions, the home is closely located to Victoria Street's renowned restaurant scene and trams, North Richmond train station, Studley Park walking and bicycle paths, many excellent schools (Abbotsford Primary) and all the artisanal cafes the inner-north is known for (including Three Bags Full directly across the street).

Description:
Expanded, extended, exceptional
The perennial appeal of this semi-detached, three bedroom Victorian has been impressively enhanced by the significant extension of its inviting spaces. The result creates an exceptional balance of period elegance and modern excellence close to great local cafes, the vibrancy of Victoria Street and trams to the city centre. A traditional arched hall and two front bedrooms, each featuring an open fireplace and original Baltic pine floorboards, lead to a fresh, effectively sky-lit bathroom. A third bedroom to the rear enjoys an attractive outdoor aspect and completes the accommodation of a home where generous living and dining areas are framed front and rear by French doors. Granite benches and great storage define an open plan kitchen complemented by a walk-in pantry while beyond the interior spaces a brick paved courtyard, with a decked entertaining space, offers attractive proportions and appealing privacy. A city edge address that will always be in demand.

Description:
Meticulously renovated: period grace meets contemporary flair
Here is a home to delight the most fastidious city-edge buyer. Extended in high-ceilinged style to combine Victorian charm with light-filled contemporary style, this free standing residence is superbly located in a quiet street within easy walking distance to Victoria Park Station, Johnston Street cafes, the Convent Arts precinct and Yarra walking trails. An arched hallway with skylights opens from the lace-trimmed verandah to two double bedrooms with custom built-in wardrobes, a smaller third bedroom/study, and an elegant fully-tiled bathroom with overbath shower and concealed laundry. Set to the rear, the state-of-the-art kitchen (Smeg/Asko appliances, stone benchtops) is open to a spacious living/dining room flowing to a sunny north-facing courtyard with ROW-access parking. Features of this captivating home include japanned floors, period detail, ducted heating/cooling and an alarm system. Don't miss it!

Description:
SUN CHASER
Watch the sun rise over the river from the balcony of this neatly appointed two bedroom residence. Nestled in the historic bones of one of Abbotsford's textile mills and boasting natural light to both bedrooms and living room this residence is ideal for those wanting access to the inner city lifestyle without the hustle and bustle of the CBD.
Features include:
- Stunning River views
- Open plan living dining space with Balcony access
- Modern kitchen finished in stone and glass and featuring gas cooking and stainless steel appliances
- Two Double bedrooms with river views, the master with ensuite
- Well-appointed guest bathroom
- Storage cage and car space on title
- Ducted Air conditioning
- Picturesque gardens and heritage features abound.
- Convenient access to the city, walking trials and local shops and restaurants

Description:
A world of your own in 'Precinct'
The complete convenience of a ground level position and the perfect privacy of contemporary spaces are complemented by this inviting apartment's exceptional outdoor dimensions - the combination creates ideal environs for lifestyle enjoyment - or for earning reliable investment returns. A central living/dining area that delivers generous proportions and reverse cycle heating/cooling is accompanied by a Caesarstone and Miele fitted kitchen that fits the space efficiently while sliding glass reveals paved, walled terrace areas of low maintenance elegance, including an undercover alfresco dining domain. Two double bedrooms, each with built in robes, both enjoy their own outlooks over the terrace and share a bathroom fitted and finished with designer style and pleasing attention to detail. Secure garaging completes an ideal Abbotsford address, featuring residents' gym and pool, adjacent to Victoria Street trams, Victoria Gardens and the recreation options offered by riverbank bike paths.

Description:
An Inner-City Haven
If lifestyle and location are important to you, then you’re going to love this brilliant inner-city apartment, enjoying a prized position with everything at your fingertips, just a stone’s throw from Victoria Park and trendy cafes on Johnston Street.
The floorplan showcases an open and airy living room and dining area, accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen equipped with stone benchtops, modern subway tiles, crisp high gloss cabinetry and quality appliances, extending onto a balcony providing a relaxing place to enjoy a glass of wine as you watch the sun go down or a lazy weekend BBQ with friends.
Accommodation comprises the master bedroom complemented by a private ensuite and built-in robes, with a second robed bedroom enjoying exclusive use of the centrally located main bathroom.
It is superbly appointed with split system air-conditioning, laminate flooring, carpeted bedrooms, Euro style laundry, a secure car space and a storage cage.

If lifestyle and location are important to you, then you’re going to love this brilliant inner-city apartment, enjoying a prized position with everything at your fingertips, just a stone’s throw from Victoria Park and trendy cafes on Johnston Street.
The floorplan showcases an open and airy living room and dining area, accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen equipped with stone benchtops, modern subway tiles, crisp high gloss cabinetry and quality appliances, extending onto a balcony providing a relaxing place to enjoy a glass of wine as you watch the sun go down or a lazy weekend BBQ with friends.
Accommodation comprises the master bedroom complemented by a private ensuite and built-in robes, with a second robed bedroom enjoying exclusive use of the centrally located main bathroom.
It is superbly appointed with split system air-conditioning, laminate flooring, carpeted bedrooms, Euro style laundry, a secure car space and a storage cage.

Description:
Rivers-edge retreat with a resort-style vibe
Going above and beyond in style, sunlight and scenery, this 1-bedroom apartment is a perfect match for the canny investor or home owner looking for an exciting inner-urban opportunity. Beautifully positioned on the 8th floor of "Eden" taking in bushland views towards Studley Park, this modern sanctuary comprises timber floors and plentiful natural light throughout an easy open design. Quality Miele appliances and stone finishes add luxury to the sleek kitchen, the living/dining area opens to a fabulous viewing terrace, the bedroom (BIRs) soaks up views to the distant treed horizon and the stylish bathroom incorporates Euro laundry. This is more than just a rivers-edge apartment, there's an entire lifestyle for you and your friends to enjoy here with communal rooftop spa-deck, cinema, lobby bar, function center, 2 gyms, 25 mt heated pool, spa, sauna and cafes downstairs. Secure with concierge, basement parking, storage cage and lift, this stylish home is surrounded by Victoria Gardens entertainment, Yarra bike and walking trails, restaurants, cafes and public transport.

Stunning north facing riverside apartment with views across the Yarra River and Dights Falls from your own private balcony and living zone. The spacious bedrooms have good built in robes and the master has the luxury of its own stylish ensuite and balcony access with views to the river, the second bedroom with easy access to a large main bathroom. Enter into an enormous open plan living/dining area with ample natural light, opening to a lovely balcony. The kitchen boasts new appliances with generous storage cupboards throughout - An entertainers dream! Downstairs comprises; A master bedroom with ensuite, a second bedroom with built in robe, a central bathroom and a European laundry. - 3 large bedrooms - Master with ensuite, second and third built in robes

- 2 elegant bathrooms - main with spa bath; Concealed laundry
- Stunning high ceilings, modern-industrial aesthetics, industrial style windows, satin polished concrete floors, CBUS home automation wiring system, alarm, ducted heating/cooling, custom cabinetry with plentiful storage
- 2 secure undercover car parks, secure entrance, separate wine store and storage cage, well equipped gym

- Truly rare proposition of sophisticated living at its best, reflecting an uncompromised commitment to quality throughout
Undeniable lifestyle position! Peacefully located nearby cafes, transport, Yarra river trails, Abbotsford Convent Arts Precinct, Collingwood Children’s Farm and Studley Park Boathouses.

Description:
'Trenerry' - a fresh, first class city address
Vibrant spaces and brilliant views form a combination that puts this two bedroom property in a beautiful class of its own. The independence of a top floor position complements spectacular sights of Victoria Park, inviting spaces and huge balcony of this exceptional apartment. An elegant hall leads to a living/dining area where the outlooks are memorable, the proportions are pleasing and the kitchen features stone benches, generous counter space and stainless steel appliances by Gaggenau. Morning light and sights of Victoria Park's green expanses enhance the two bedrooms, served by built-in robes and an ensuite that is fully tiled, impressively finished, main bathroom features a European laundry. Separate Daikin heating/cooling, complete security, allocated garaging and a storage cage seal a city edge deal - moments from Yarra River, transport and the best of Abbotsford.

Description:
Standout Investment Opportunity on the City Fringe
With a steady tenant currently in place, this modern two bedroom apartment will suit investors to a tee but will also appeal to first home buyers seeking an inner city oasis.
Part of the ‘Precinct’, the complex offers community based living in the heart of Abbotsford, and features facilities such as a 20 metre heated lap pool, a fully equipped gym, First Choice Liquor and a trendy café - Eden and Mila’s Gourmet Eatery.
Unmatched for convenience, this first-class location is near the Yarra River, walk/bike trails and Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, and only a short distance from central Richmond and Melbourne’s CBD.
Additional Features:
*Attractive 5% yield (approx.)
*Modern, dark colour scheme
*Large living area & balcony
*Miele kitchen appliances
*Premium Grohe tapware
*BIRs & windows to both beds

This brilliant solid period home combines grand scale, an abundance of natural light, period detail and the finest modern convenience. A tranquil garden oasis in one of Melbourne's hottest pockets.

Description:
'Eden on the Yarra' - luxurious living with resort style amenities and breathtaking river views
Experience the picturesque views of the Yarra River from your 10th floor balcony, whilst positioned only 3.5kms from the CBD.
This 1 bedroom apartment offers resort-style living in the beautiful architecturally designed “Eden on the River” complex. In an open plan layout providing ample space for living and dining, the stone-topped kitchen provides sleek styling with a full-appointment of Miele appliances including integrated fridge/freezer and dishwasher, timber-grain cabinetry contrasted by a smoked mirror splash back A most spectacular view of the Yarra River is enjoyed from the private terrace, which opens the home to a panorama of natural surrounds. Comprising a chic modern bathroom with Euro laundry, and a spacious bedroom enjoying the restful river views, complete with mirrored built-in robes, in the comforts of split-system A/C, secure basement parking, storage cage, swipe building entry, and video intercom access. Enjoy world-class residents' facilities including barbecue terrace, outdoor heated lap pool with spa, overlooking the Yarra surrounds, plus two gyms, sauna, and massage room.

Description:
An Amazing Opportunity to Rest Your Hat
From its 1880s origins the Denton Mills have been integral to Abbotsford's identity. This unique townhouse illustrates the success with which this former hat factory has adopted a residential role that complements a location of undeniable convenience close to Victoria Street shopping, tram routes, North Richmond station and the city. This brilliantly elegant and secure inner urban domain Townhouse suits investor's or a home buyer who's not ready to move in.
With an abundance of space and light, this is first-class for living and lifestyle with - 2 large bedrooms - built in robes, Juliet balcony off master- vast sun drenched open plan living and dining area - reverse cycle heating/cooling throughout - Private terrace off living, north facing front entry patio - Well-appointed kitchen with gas cook top- integrated dishwasher, large pantry- 2 sleek bathrooms - ensuite to master; Euro Laundry- freshly painted , new carpeted, Newly polished floorboards, Secure off street park; Secured storage, security entrance, intercom. Set in the historical 'Denton Mills Factory' this enormous Townhouse offers plenty for the discerning buyers. The delights of Victoria Street, renowned Three Bags Full Cafe set in the building for your morning coffee, and the accessible CBD and sporting precinct on your doorstep. The property is leased until Jan 2018 at $2737 per calendar month.
Inspection is a must.
Private inspections can be arranged

Description:
Sophisticated Living with Urban Tranquillity !
Exquisite inner-city living experience in a unique tranquil riverside setting on the cosmopolitan city fringe. This spacious and contemporary two-bedroom designer pad overlooks the Yarra River and beyond offering breathtaking views from its oversized balcony, living area through to bedrooms! This is the new exemplar of sophisticated tranquil living with 5 star surroundings.
This corner north-facing apartment offers abundance natural lighting through its floor to ceiling windows, open-planned living that flows to the stunning balcony and its views, kitchen lavished with SMEG appliances, beautiful stone benches, soft close drawers, European laundry, heating/cooling and video intercom. The master bedroom overlooking the amazing bushland horizon offers a private ensuite with generous built-in robes while further enjoy a second bedroom with stunning views of the skyline, large robes, easy access to the stylish common bathroom, private storage cage and a secured indoor car space.
Positioned to enjoy easy access not only to the city, but also the diversity of delights on Victoria St, you are sure to fall in love with the chance to escape home and wander the endless Yarra trails and parkland or relax and entertain in the beautiful private indoor lap pool, gymnasium, guest lounge and BBQ area, whenever you choose.

Description:
Authentic conversion style, space and stunning views
Formerly an electrical goods factory, this grandly proportioned residence offers superbly zoned living metres from the Convent Arts precinct and close to Studley Park and transport. With an expansive upper-level living/dining room with CBD and eastern views, flowing to a terrace with retractable awnings, this exceptional home offers a versatile floor plan comprising 4 double bedrooms, 2 further living areas, well-equipped timber kitchen and 2 bathrooms (one with laundry). Including an internal-entry garage and on-title parking space, this light-filled home features industrial detail, double glazing, polished concrete floors, ample storage, 1kw solar power, gas heating and split-system air-conditioning. Simply sensational!

Description:
No overlays or easements on almost 300m2 of land
Set on a large block approximately 30.1m x 9.93m (299m2 approx), this completely
freestanding period home provides a functional environment
along with outstanding potential for those looking to develop, rebuild or fully renovate (STCA). Current floorplan includes three bedrooms, central living area through to a dining and kitchen zone, basic bathroom/ laundry facilities round off this much loved old family home. Add to this a sizeable backyard highlighting the property's impressive dimensions and untapped future possibilities. No overlays or easements, this unique home opens up a world of potential in a superb location only 5 min walk to Abbotsford Convent /
Collingwood Childrens Farm and a 7 min walk to Victoria Park train station. Recent sales in the Street have seen development applications approved so get in fast and secure this great portion of land before it goes.

Description:
Timeless Victorian With Impressive Architectural Renovation
Behind its alluring street presence with all the hallmarks you expect from a classic tuck-pointed brick Victorian terrace, this immaculately presented home boasts a seamless blend of period lustre with an impressive architectural renovation. With neutral tones, high ceilings and stylish fixtures and fittings throughout, the captivating and light-filled interior comprises an expansive open plan family room with living and dining zones serviced by the well-appointed kitchen (stone bench tops, integrated Miele dishwaser, Miele/Smeg cooking and breakfast bar), 3 generously proportioned bedrooms with BIRs and original OFPs (main with private balcony), gleaming bathroom, separate laundry, sun-drenched courtyard with established trees (ROW) and side access with clever use of space featuring a double-level storage unit. Positioned in a highly regarded, family oriented location, the home enjoys easy access to Collingwood train station, Abbotsford Convent, Yarra Trail walking/bike path, artisanal boutiques and cafes the inner north is known for and many fine schools. Features also include heating and air-conditioning and original Baltic Pine floors.

Description:
Own the city fringe dream on the banks of the Yarra
Looking to invest in bricks and mortar or build up your property portfolio? Look no further.
Part of the Riviere development, this fantastic one bedroom apartment brings together the best of a truly historic location beside the iconic Yarra with the finest of modern features and finishes.
Encompassing a smart, contemporary design, this apartment features:
- Polished floorboards
- Carpeted bedroom
- Floor to ceiling windows
- Built in robes
- Intercom entrance lift access
- Undercover basement parking with remote access
- Storage cage
- Split-system heating and cooling
- Large, open living space
- Stainless steel Blanco appliances
- European style laundry
- Balcony
Ideally positioned in the heart of Abbotsford, this apartment is just a stroll away from the tranquillity of the Yarra trails and parklands, and a stone’s throw from the buzz and bustle of Victoria Street including Victoria Gardens shopping precinct and local cafes and restaurants. With Richmond just down the road, its location lends itself to a keen rental market boasting easy access to the Melbourne CBD as well as a convenient escape to the relaxing surrounds of the riverbank.
A fantastic opportunity for both owner-occupiers and investors alike, please call Denis Bailey on 1300 726 082 to discuss the benefits of owning in Abbotsford and to book an inspection to view.
Internal area
44.5m²

Description:
Inner City Living in Designer Style
Excitingly located in the heart of this cosmopolitan suburb within walking distance to the popular Victoria Gardens Shopping Precinct and Yarra Bend Park, this sophisticated two bedroom apartment offers the ultimate in low maintenance comfort and convenience. Quietly positioned at the rear of the favoured Precinct complex and entered via a side street, the bright northerly aspect and slick modern finishes supply ideal urban accommodation and is the perfect prospect for first home owners, investors, downsizers and professionals. The light-bathed open-plan living/dining zone connects to a sun-bathed balcony and the adjoining stone-benched kitchen is fitted with Miele stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher. Two bedrooms, one with built-in-robes, are serviced by a luxurious bathroom. Features include concealed laundry, split-system heating and cooling, video intercom, security entrance, security lift access, basement car space and storage cage.
Enjoy the recreational facilities provided to residents including gymnasium, indoor heated pool, complex café and several landscaped open areas and public transport close by including easy access to the CBD. Also well-situated to Abbotsford Primary School and Collingwood College.
Photo ID Required at all Open for Inspections

Description:
GIPPS ST - LIFESTYLE, LUXURY & ACHITECTURE
Sitting pretty in the centre of Melbourne's most fun-loving postcodes, Gipps St. you will get to enjoy the best of three worlds: Fitzroy, Collingwood and Abbotsford. Just a short walk from home, the rectangular strip that extends from Smith Street to Brunswick Street in one direction and from Gertrude to Johnston in the other.
This light filled 2 bedroom apartment has been designed with liveability in mind, offering 2 large bedrooms the master with WIR. Features include spacious bathroom including euro laundry, air conditioning, study nook and the luxury of a private balcony.
Close to an array of transport and only 3kms for the CBD this apartment presents a fantastic opportunity for owner occupiers and investors offering the best of Melbourne's inner city living!

Description:
Magnificent Family-Sized Living in Sensational Stafford Street
Extremely spacious inner city living on a double block with very rare off street parking (front and rear access) and within a short walk of trains and buses; this is perfect for families, professionals and investors alike.
Spread over 2 storeys; this substantial freestanding brick home offers:
- 3 double bedrooms all with built in robes
- Separate study area
- 2 living rooms
- Open plan family dining area
- Large, beautifully appointed entertainer's Kitchen
- 2 large bathrooms; one on each level
- Separate laundry
- Internal storeroom and abundant cupboards
- Land - 8.4m x 29m / 244m2 approx
Freshly painted and in superb condition, this open-plan home also features a beautiful and private north-facing, sun-filled, gardened courtyard viewed from the main living room, a cosy gas log fire, reverse-cycle air-conditioning upstairs, polished timber floors, a remote-controlled roller door from the rear lane accessing on-site accommodation for 3 cars. The kitchen has oodles of storage and a commercial-style, stainless steel ILVE gas range and matching extractor for the most serious of cooks.
All this within the most coveted of locations - just a couple of minutes walk to Victoria Park Station, local shops and the emerging Johnston Street cafe scene. Sensational Smith Street is also close by, the famed Retreat Hotel is at the end of the street and the Abbotsford Convent and Yarra River less than 10 minutes walk away. Everything you could desire from a cosmopolitan Abbotsford lifestyle is right at hand.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.

Luxury Living
Inner-city living meets contemporary style with this stunningly presented 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in the state-of-the-art Green Square complex. This apartments features include:
Well-appointed kitchen with Smeg gas stove and dishwasher, open plan living and dining, two double bedrooms with built in robes, two sparkling bathrooms, large undercover balcony, Euro laundry and secure parking on title. This luxury lifestyle is complimented by full use of the in-house library, resort style indoor/outdoor swimming pool, fully equipped gymnasium, rooftop BBQ and entertainment space and its conveniently located to Victoria Gardens shopping precinct, Yarra River bike trails, Parklands and only a 10 minute tram ride into the CBD. Description:
TOP FLOOR SUPERIOR APARTMENT - NOW UNDER CONTRACT
UNDER CONTRACT
Living the high life is easy on the 10th floor of this amazing development facing Victoria Street with amazing views of the south and of the CBD.
Simply take the lift up to the top floor and step into the ultimate low maintenance apartment that is what inner city living is all about.
The well finished apartment features an open living/dining area with a split system heater/air conditioner and a stylish kitchen with stone benches and Miele stainless appliances.
There are 2 bedrooms with built in wardrobes including the main bedroom with a wall to wall view as well as a beautiful bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles.
There's also a covered and glass fronted balcony to really soak in the view as well as a car space and a storage cage in the secure parking garage.
And you can access all the amenities here too including a gym, pool and central courtyard while Victoria Gardens and the Yarra River are both within walking distance.
For the astute investor, WOW! What an investment! 5.5% Rental yield approx. Secured lease to fantastic tenants at $25,740.00 p.a. until 09/01/2018)

Description:
'Green Square' - a great way forward
This stylish, sophisticated apartment enjoys all the advantages that define 'Green Square's' desirability as an inner city address. Entirely secure, set back from the street, these engaging spaces include exceptionally generous living and dining areas that flow to a balcony where equally impressive dimensions look towards the Yarra River. An open plan kitchen with stone benches, an integrated fridge and freezer and stainless steel appliances performs with designer distinction while a bathroom of outstanding style serves a double bedroom featuring built in robes and its own aspect over the substantial balcony. Green Square's pool, gym, sauna, library, meeting room and terrace areas reflect a forward looking approach to residential development that delivers significant success close to trams, the river's bike paths, Victoria Gardens shopping and all the cafes that bring Victoria Street to life. Allocated garage space and secure storage cage completes an ideal picture.

5% Rental Return
Luxurious appointments, exceptional location and second to none facilities make Green Squar an incredible investment and living opportunity. Residents enjoy access to the indoor pool, gym, library, conference facilities and roof top deck with proximity to the Yarra River and bike trails immediate. City access via Victoria St and trams are at your front door, while the Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre is barely a minutes walk away. Located on the sixth floor, this immaculate apartment features the best of modern design encompassing must have open plan living and dining with fully appointed kitchen with stone detail and Smeg appliances, full length balcony with expansive views, two double bedrooms with mirror robes, two designer bathrooms plus euro laundry. Lift access, heating / cooling, video entry and secure car space with storage cage are also features. Location bonuses of plentiful dining and entertainment possibilities, Abbotsford Convent and Saturday Farmers markets mean there is everything to love about this buying opportunity.
Rental Estimate $500 to $530 p/w.

Description:
Unique Riverside Home of Urban Sophistication
An unparalleled inner-city living experience in a tranquil riverside setting on the cosmopolitan city fringe, this as new, two bedroom designer apartment offers you the surreal sensation of listening to bellbirds in the bushland while you enjoy views to the city skyline. Showcasing a breath-taking seventh floor balcony that not only overlooks the Yarra River and its pristine parkland, but also delivers a panorama that extends to the CBD, this is a unique position of soothing urban sanctuary.
In the state-of-the-art and highly secure building with video entry, basement parking, a storage cage and elevator access, the apartment reveals a superb Blanco-equipped kitchen with beautiful stone benches and open-plan living that flows to the stunning balcony and its views. More than a visual showpiece, however, the home is also wonderfully livable with large robes in each bedroom and a generous bathroom / laundry.
Positioned to enjoy easy access not only to the city, but also the diversity of delights on Victoria and Smith St, you are sure to fall in love with the chance to escape home and wander the endless Yarra trails and parkland whenever you choose.

YARRA YARRA - the name says it all!
Contemporary style, an abundance of natural light and instant access to river trails - this impressive corner apartment delivers an environment of outstanding quality and convenience in the tightly-held Yarra Yarra complex. Impeccable interior comprises 2 double bedrooms (both with robes, master with balcony) and stylish central bathroom, open-plan lounge/dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows leading out to a wide undercover terrace. Description:
Vendor Says Sell
Enjoying prime positioning atop the 9th floor of Precinct is this two bedroom home presenting the perfect combination of sleek low maintenance living in a prime inner Melbourne location. Bathed in natural northern light with views across Yarra Bend parklands, you can be forgiven for feeling you are far from every convenience an Abbotsford address represents, including immediate CBD access via trams on Victoria Street, shopping, entertainment and seemingly endless dining options. Heating and cooling, secure car parking and storage cage are the must have extras that compliment the developments shared facilities of landscaped gardens, swimming pool, gymnasium, cafe and on site round the clock building manager. Would suit buyers of all persuasions being an exceptional investment opportunity.

Description:
Outstanding city-edge living at PRECINCT
Moments from the buzz of Victoria Street, this highly maintained owner occupied apartment on the third floor captures the essence of city living with its quality inclusions, private surrounds and world-class residents' facilities. Super-stylish interior comprises 2 double bedrooms (both with mirrored robes) and sleek central bathroom, open living/dining area. Add to is an undercover terrace that overlooks a quiet side street, offering an abundance of natural light and partial City views. The apartment is complete with stone-bench kitchen with Miele cooking appliances and dishwasher, Daikin split-system heating and cooling, Euro laundry, plus video intercom, secure foyer, storage cage, secured parking and well equipped residents' gymnasium and indoor pool. Included in the development is Eden & Mila's cafe for that morning coffee and an onsite childcare centre for busy working parents. Minutes away is the Yarra Trail bike bath, Abbotsford Convent, Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and trams to the CBD or Box Hill. Depreciation schedules available for huge depreciation benefits, excellent rental and opportunity to leaseback from owners. Offers prior to Auction will be considered.

Description:
Compact and Convenient
Cleverly compact, with low maintenance, this 2 bedroom, first floor, apartment is ideal for city living or as an investment. Situated on the street side of the building, with a private balcony opening from the living room and facing west, the apartment is light and airy. The sparkling white kitchen is well fitted out with Miele gas stove and dishwasher and an island bench which could also serve as a breakfast bar. Storage has been carefully designed with deep pantry and overhead cupboards. The bedrooms both have mirrored robes and are carpeted in a neutral colour. The tiled bathroom has a shower and mirrored cupboards and there is also a Euro laundry. The apartment has split system air conditioner/heater, elevator access, excellent intercom security and a basement car space. Located within walking distance of Victoria Gardens shopping, with the tram on your doorstep, the multicultural shops of Victoria St just down the road and entertainment close by, what more could you want?

UNBEATABLE INNER CITY, LIFESTYLE OPPORTUNITY
Fantastic opportunity to enjoy a central location whilst a stone's throw to the peace and tranquillity of the Yarra River bike/walking trails!
- Ground floor apartment; Dual access from courtyard and internal
- 2 spacious bedrooms; Master with built in robes
- Light filled open plan living/dining area with reverse cycle heating/cooling, opens to...
- Private courtyard perfect for entertaining
- Sleek kitchen with stainless appliances, gas stove top, dishwasher, stone bench tops
- Modern bathroom; European laundry
- Security intercom entry; Secure undercover car park
- Internal size 49sqm approx., External size 12sqm approx.

Ideally located within walking distance to the delights of Victoria Street and Bridge Road cafes, restaurants and shops. Victoria Gardens cinema and transport are also at your door. Take a stroll alongside the Yarra River, ride the bike paths, or visit the golf course and parkland only minutes away. Only a short tram ride to the CBD, this is truly the best of inner city living!

Description:
Fabulous City & River Views!
This newly completed apartment is flooded with natural light and is hugely appealing. Located on Level 7 and comprising 2 bedrooms with built in robes, large central modern bathroom, open kitchen with Miele S/S appliances, dishwasher and loads of cupboard space, carpeted open plan living/dining area leading to a generous size balcony with amazing city and river views, separate internal laundry with second toilet, reverse cycle heating/cooling, roller blinds fitted throughout, down lights throughout.
A secure basement car space and storage cage completes this fabulous apartment.
Other features include superb rooftop entertaining, barbeque facilities on spacious deck, spa baths, lap pool, gymnasium, health & wellbeing retreat ample outdoor seating with decking chairs to complete the picture.
A vast array of retail shops, restaurants, café’s, lobby bar, concierge are all conveniently located downstairs.
This fabulous location is just a stones’ throw from Victoria Gardens shopping and entertainment centre, easy access to Yarra Trail bike paths and public transport are all at your doorstep.
Only 3.5 km from Melbourne’s CBD, MCG, Rod Laver Arena any many of Melbourne's tourist destinations.
City Living At A Very Affordable Price!
Private Sale - $650,000
Inspections by appointment

Description:
UNDER OFFER
This radiant apartment offers instantly inviting interiors and immaculate finishes that deliver a refreshing vibrant air. The spacious living/meals area is introduced by a stylish kitchen with European appliances. Two bright bedrooms are complemented by the convenience of mirrored BIRs, a modern central bathroom, heating/cooling, video intercom entry and secure basement car space. Great for young professionals and investors alike, it's ideally positioned to enjoy all that Abbotsford has to offer, just a stone's throw to the famed Victoria St restaurant precinct, cafes, Victoria Gardens shopping, the 109 tram and some of Melbourne's most picturesque walking/cycling along the magnificent Yarra River. Securely leased until August 2017 it is an excellent investment opportunity.

Description:
Smart style in Yarra-side precinct
Smart and sophisticated in popular "Precinct", this two bedroom apartment's designer spaces are enhanced by the lifestyle rewards of a location that places the Yarra's bike and walking trails, Victoria Gardens shops and cinemas and the convenience of city bound trams all at the doorstep. A spacious open plan living domain with elevated rooftop views steps out to an undercover terrace, providing alfresco flexibility that's catered to by an integrated stone kitchen with Miele appliances and dishwasher. Two impressive bedrooms include built in robes with additional storage and share a central bathroom whose sleek sense of style adds a touch of luxury to its every day function. A hidden laundry, reverse cycle heating/cooling, intercom security, storage cage and secure basement carspace add further owner occupier or investment appeal in a building noted for its fabulous landscaped courtyards, residents' pool/gym and dynamic Yarra position.

Description:
The Precinct - Perfect Position, Premium Facilities
Starting out or simply seeking reliable investment returns, whatever the priority, this stylistically superior one bedroom apartment is brimming with lifestyle appeal and is perfectly positioned to take full advantage of nearby Victoria Gardens Shopping Complex and relaxing Yarra River bike and walking trails. A design-focused layout boasts a sleek stone-finished kitchen with quality Miele appliances, adjoining living spaces open to a westerly patio, robed bedroom, separate fully-tiled bathroom, Euro laundry, split system heating/cooling, plus there's a secure basement car-space and storage cage. Sought-after communal health and well-being zones include 3 outdoor living spaces, indoor lap pool, fully-equipped gymnasium and excellent cafe; while building security includes intercom, swipe card entry, and cameras. Wander with ease to the Terminus Hotel, IKEA, Victoria Gardens shops and cafes, Yarra Parkland, Studley Park, and city trams. Note: let until September, 2017 at $380 per week ($1,647pcm)
Josh Burne : 0430 338 202

Description:
Prime address: renovate, rebuild or redevelop!
Experience inner-city living at its finest, enviably located moments from both Collingwood and Victoria Park train stations, the trendy eateries of Victoria and Johnston Streets and the Abbotsford Convent arts precinct. This well maintained circa 1960's brick home sits on a generous parcel of land approx. 267 square meters and is being offered in immaculate original condition, very liveable as it stands and now ready for reinvention. Offering 3 well-proportioned bedrooms, separate living, practical kitchen with ample space for dining, original bathroom and separate laundry. Also including large North facing yard, ducted heating, rear studio/shed and potential off street parking via rear laneway. Renovate, rebuild or redevelop (STCA) the possibilities to add value are endless.

Description:
Pristine Precinct Pad is Pure Perfection
Exhibiting fantastic modern flair, terrific natural light, and a wonderful location moments to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and the vibrant Victoria Street with superb restaurants, this alluring two bedroom apartment in the Precinct complex is sure to have many keen admirers.
North-facing and sure to capture the imagination of anyone looking to live in a terrific Abbotsford pocket not far from the CBD, this 8th floor abode offers up a sizeable living and meals zone adjoined by an impressive stone kitchen with an island bench and Miele appliances, while the semi-enclosed balcony has glimpses of the Yarra River parklands and is perfect for alfresco meals.
Both bedrooms have great privacy away from each other and include mirrored built-in robes, while the well-appointed bathroom boasts Grohe tapware and sits right next to the European laundry. Other apartment features include reverse cycle heating and cooling, video intercom, storage cage, secure car space, and access to indoor lap pool, gym, child care centre, and on-site café.
With easy access to the CBD via trams and North Richmond Station, youre also moments to bike and walking tracks along the Yarra River and Coles supermarket and cinema within Victoria Gardens S.C.

Description:
A story of style, size and sights
An impressive combination of indoor desirability and outdoor dimensions, enhanced by security, sophistication and city sights, separates this fourth floor apartment. Every room, including the generous central living and dining area, opens to a full width terrace of spectacular size, with the CBD skyline as a backdrop. The open plan kitchen's distinctive dark stone benches and stainless steel Miele appliances add to the designer profile of proportions where split system heating/cooling guarantees constant comfort. In its own zone, a main bedroom with built in robes, an ensuite and terrace access is complemented by a second, equally spacious second bedroom also boasting sliding glass to the terrace, large built in robes and a second bathroom. The building's gym, pool, landscaped courtyard plus the provision of secure parking and a storage cage complement superb spaces close to trams and Victoria Gardens shopping on a street that concludes with the leafiness of the Yarra River's banks.
Insights: 411/8 Grosvenor Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2017 and 94 other 2 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovated Victorian With Impressive Architectural Addition
Situated in a quiet street, this renovated Victorian seamlessly blends elegant period detail with a superb, architecturally designed extension. Flooded with natural light and utilising neutral tones throughout, the home comprises 3 bedrooms (2 with BIRs), a formal sitting room and gleaming modern bathroom with quality fixtures/fittings and separate bathtub, as well as a separate laundry. There is also an impressive open plan extension boasting an eco-friendly design with a focus on maximising natural light, energy conservation (double glazed windows throughout) and the use of native and reclaimed materials, such as timber from the Pyrmont Pier and original light fittings from the iconic Kooyong Tennis Courts which illuminate the designer kitchen. Complete with DeLonghi and Asko appliances, stone bench tops and large island bench with breakfast bar, the kitchen opens onto the tremendous rear garden with low-maintenance garden beds, vegetable patch with sprinkler system, garden shed and majestic old Gumtree. Just a short stroll from the popular Abbotsford Convent, the home is conveniently located within close proximity to public transport options, Victoria Park, Yarra River and Yarra Trail bike path and several excellent schools. Features include: hydronic heating and air-conditioning, hardwood floors throughout, leadlight windows and period light fittings, ceiling fan, 2000l water tank and 2x OSP via ROW.
Insights: 25 Paterson Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2017 and 27 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
LIGHT-FILLED EXCELLENCE IN THE ARTS PRECINCT
With a stunning northerly exposure, this freestanding Victorian residence combines period grace with crisp contemporary style. Here is low maintenance CBD-edge living at its serene best, in a cul de sac just a short stroll to the Abbotsford Convent, Yarra trails and Studley Park, and close to transport, cafes and Victoria Gardens. Opening to a covered verandah and private lawned garden, this welcoming home offers 2 double bedrooms (BIRs) from an arched hallway, spacious living/dining room open to well-equipped kitchen with quality fittings, and stylish bathroom/laundry with overbath shower. Description:
The old meets the stunning new
Experience the best of both worlds with this versatile Victorian home in the circa 1888 'Winniefred Terrace', featuring a sleek modern renovation retaining period charm. Towering ceilings, brick interiors, dolly light switches and picture rails highlight the days of yesteryear, while the beautifully renovated kitchen with soft closing drawers, granite benchtops, and Falcon and Miele appliances is an example of the exquisite contemporary updates. An upstairs master bedroom enjoys a double vanity marble ensuite, walk in robe and access to a rooftop sundeck with bar fridge and BBQ, while the other bedroom opens out to the front balcony. Flexible zoned living downstairs features a third bedroom or additional living space/home office, central and rear living spaces, which open out to a peaceful courtyard. Also boasts an elegant bathroom with European laundry, powder room, two gas fireplaces, and alarm. Located in the prized Victoria Park precinct close to Johnston Street bars and eateries.

Description:
Sublimely updated brick Victorian
The perfect marriage of fashionable contemporary panache and enduring Victorian features makes this solid brick home an unmissable Abbotsford beauty. Extensive and considered renovation has gone into this property, from stunning new floors all the way to the completely fresh kitchen delivering stone benches, soft closing joinery, designer tiled splashback and stainless steel Smeg and Bosch appliances. This bright kitchen has ample space for casual meals and offers bi-fold doors opening out to the rear deck and courtyard which is peaceful and private. A separate lounge has easy access to the bathroom and laundry which has also had modern updates, while two bedrooms towards the front of the home includes the larger main bedroom promising built in robes and blue lead light window features. Further enjoy a study with timber desk, front patio deck, reverse cycle cooling, alarm and option for off street parking at rear. Near Victoria Street restaurants and Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre.

Description:
Hours of Abbotsford serenity
Delivering breathtaking views of the neighbouring Yarra River and surrounding parklands, this tranquil apartment boasts a flawless modern resume that truly impresses. This exclusive 'Eden on the River' listing defines quiet and secluded inner city living, where you can step outside onto the oversized balcony and partake in wonderful vistas of the opposing park and river. The open plan living hub consists of space to lounge and dine with this area also including a kitchen featuring soft close drawers and Miele appliances. The master bedroom offers a private ensuite and dual mirrored robes, while further enjoy a second bedroom with sliding plantation shutter doors, stylish bathroom, European laundry, heating/cooling, storage cage and car space. The complex has facilities including a pool, gym and rooftop entertaining area just to name a few, while you can easily access ground floors cafes in Kitty Burns and Frankie Says. Walk to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and Victoria Street restaurants.

Description:
ABSOLUTE RIVER FRONTAGE
Located in a unique location in a beautiful bushland setting on the banks of the Yarra River, this north facing two bedroom apartment offers generous proportions plus peace and privacy.
The generous open plan living, dining and kitchen area opens on to an entertainer’s terrace to enjoy the amazing views. The quality kitchen is finished in rich, dark tones and includes Miele appliances, loads of storage, generous island bench, mirror splash back and stone surfaces. The apartment also features timber flooring, ducted A/C, a separate study room and well equipped separate laundry.
Two queen sized bedrooms, two bathrooms (one en-suite), two secure car spaces and a storage cage complete the package.
All residents enjoy the function facilities on the level 11 rooftop and the pool, gyms, sauna and spa in the Health & Wellbeing Centre. With excellent transport and shopping facilities at your door step this is inner city riverside living at its best.
Recently awarded Victoria’s best development and master-planned community, Eden is in a class of its own.
Inspect as advertised or by appointment.

Description:
"St Joseph 6" Magnificent Residential Conversion. Construction commenced.
Only one residence remains - Apartment 3 - 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 car. Approximately 176sqm of floor space. Designed by renowned Interlandi Mantesso Architects, St Joseph 6 integrates classic nineteenth century aesthetics with cutting-edge style and sophistication delivering the ultimate inner-city executive lifestyle experience. Boasting an open-plan living/dining area out to courtyard or terrace, gourmet kitchen with integrated joinery, deluxe bathroom, separate powder room, first-class fittings and fixtures throughout, walk-in pantry, integrated fridge and dishwasher along with fitted laundry with Miele dryer and washing machine, steel window frames, exposed brick walls and soft timber veneer panelling, secure parking and storage. An exclusive opportunity in the very heart of Abbotsford with renowned cafes across the road, shops and restaurants at the end of the street, walking distance to Yarra parks and trails, trams and trains to the CBD. Buy before October 31st to maximise Stamp Duty savings. See Agent for detailed information pack that will impress!

Residence 3
Offering modern style in a superb location, with fantastic Victoria Street restaurants and bars just metres away, this easy-care lifestyle townhouse offers high angled ceilings, timber floors and abundant natural light throughout the living areas, and a clever floorplan that maximizes space and easy living for the complete package of location and lifestyle

Description:
Extremely Spacious With Amazing Views!
Perfecting the trio of space, views and a superb lifestyle setting, this sensationally appointed 132m2 spacious three-bedroom apartment is a dream come true for those seeking the dimensions of a house with the convenience of apartment living.
Positioned to appreciate lush treetop vistas over Studley Park and the Yarra River, this oversized apartment further benefits from its esteemed location directly opposite Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and beside the iconic Skipping Girl complex.
Bathed in natural light due in part to its north-easterly orientation and magnificent floor-to-ceiling windows, the apartment’s lavish open plan kitchen, dining and living zone showcases stone benches/splashbacks and Blanco appliances, spilling out onto a sunny balcony with Yarra River glimpses.
The three bedrooms are filled with natural light and accompanied by a family bathroom with toilet and Euro laundry, while the master bedroom additionally benefits from a walk-in-robe, huge ensuite and separate balcony.
Fully equipped with modern comforts and security features, such as; split system heating/air conditioning, high ceilings, video intercom entry, secure lift access, basement car space plus a storage cage.
With exclusive resident amenities including an outdoor swimming pool with sun lounges and secure Yarra River Trail access.
Exceptionally situated to deliver an incredible lifestyle on the cusp of the Yarra River where you can stroll along the breathtaking Yarra River nature trails, dine at local cafes and restaurants, enjoy the entertainment and shopping facilities on offer at Victoria Garden Shopping Centre or simply step aboard tram 109 to the Melbourne’s CBD stunning amenities.
Perfect as a full time residence, home away from home or smart investment with an estimated rental return of $700 to $750 per week.
Superb opportunity not to be missed.
Inspections as advertised
