Description:
A modern take on a Victorian classic
This stylishly appointed single fronted Victorian home blends period features with contemporary renovations to provide immediate appeal. Introduced by an attractive Victorian façade, the superb interior features an entrance hall leading to a large formal lounge/dining room with French doors opening to a private side courtyard, three bedrooms, a pristine family bathroom with separate bath, a powder room and functional European laundry. An expansive rear living and dining area incorporates a sleek gourmet kitchen with stone benches and Euro appliances overlooking a leafy rear courtyard garden. Other features include polished timber floors, ample storage, including attic storage, plantation shutters, ducted heating and cooling, easy care gardens and off street parking via Little Lithgow Street, a rarity in Abbotsford. Opposite Abbotsford Primary School, close to trams, cafes and eateries, Abbotsford convent, Yarra Trails, Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre and easy walking distance to the city.

Description:
Simply Stunning Inner City Living
Enjoy modern inner-city style and exceptional comfort in this beautifully renovated two-storey townhouse. Situated in one of Abbotsford's most sought-after streets, and nestled between Victoria Park and extensive Yarra parkland, this charming north-facing home comprises three spacious bedrooms with BIRs, the delightful master bedroom complete with ensuite, heating/cooling and overlooking nearby parks. Perfect for entertaining throughout the year with a stunning renovated kitchen and supremely modern dining/lounge with hardwood floors, opening to an impressive sun-splashed courtyard. The tranquil setting belies the home's close proximity to the vibrant local dining and entertainment precinct, offering the best of both worlds with trains and buses just a stone's throw away, and minutes to the CBD.

Description:
Versatile Style in a Perfect Location
A sublime city-edge neighbourhood with river trails and parkland at the end of the street, sets the scene for this outstanding 3BR home (no Owners Corp) defined by its spacious two-level design, stunning renovations and abundance of natural light throughout. Divine interior boasts two main upstairs bedrooms (both with mirrored robes) and deluxe two-way bathroom. Downstairs: third bedroom and equally-stylish second bathroom with European Laundry, central lounge through to the open living/meals area and granite-top kitchen with moveable island bench, dishwasher and Smeg cooking appliances. Second boutique outdoor eating / breakfast bar with bi fold kitchen window for enhanced indoor / outdoor living. Add to this spectacular city skyline views from the rear bedroom, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, large under stair walk in storage room, quality carpets and floors, plantation shutters, solar power, plus a "fully-decked entertainers' courtyard with shade sail, outdoor spa and high fences for added privacy. Complete with front off-street parking, it's also walking distance to Abbotsford Convent and Collingwood Children's Farm, Collingwood Station, Victoria Street shops, cafes and restaurants. Inner-city lifestyle perfection! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Light Filled Corner Apartment
This light and bright apartment in the award winning Eden development offers flexibility and style.
Perfect for the busy professional or as a comfortable inner-city residence, this apartment offers an open plan kitchen living area with direct access to the balcony and a good sized study area. The well equipped kitchen includes Miele appliances, pantry with loads of storage, stone benches and a mirror splash-back.
The master bedroom is generous in size with a full length mirrored BIR plus an equally generous ensuite with quality fixtures and good storage. The main bathroom offers the same quality with the addition of a euro style laundry and more storage. The light filled second bedroom also offers access to the balcony and mirrored BIR’s. A secure car space and storage cage are on title.
The Eden lifestyle offers residents a rooftop deck including spas, BBQ areas, meeting, function & cinema areas all with those amazing river and city aspects. Take full advantage of the Health & Wellbeing Centre inclusive of a 25 metre heated lap pool, spa, sauna and two gyms. Positioned on the river end of Acacia Place are Popular Kitty Burns and Frankie Says cafes leading onto the river walking and cycling trails.
All this just 3km from the Melbourne CBD with shopping at Victoria Gardens and transport on your doorstep. Why would you want to live anywhere else?

Description:
City edge perfection
Enviably positioned within moments of the Yarra River, with easy access to the CBD, this charming Hawthorn brick Victorian reveals generous dimensions, heritage originality and lovely renovated spaces providing immediate appeal. A picket fence and attractive façade deliver irresistible street presence, while interiors reveal a traditional arched hallway, two beautiful bedrooms, each with open fireplaces, skylit central living/dining spaces of pleasing proportions and a rear kitchen with freestanding Lofra oven. Tiled bathroom, attic store, Baltic pine floors, sun-blinds, Daikin heating/cooling and alarm are additional assets, while a private and sunny courtyard provides space for al fresco dining and entertaining. Walk to the local bars and restaurants; The Terminus, Holla and The National, the vibrant mix of Vietnamese eateries and coffee roasteries, tram to the CBD and explore Collingwood Children's farm, market and The Yarra River precinct.

Description:
APARTMENT PERFECTION IN PREMIER LIFESTYLE HUB
Majestically situated on the cusp of the Yarra River, in the iconic Skipping Girl precinct, this 2-bedroom apartment has its focus firmly on lifestyle, with its very own balcony and access to a sparkling indoor lap pool and gymnasium. Lavished with quality fittings and fixtures, from its stylish floorboards to its high ceilings, the home draws you inside where an open plan kitchen, living and dining zone showcases stone benches, Smeg appliances and a Smeg integrated dishwasher. Glass sliding doors illuminate the space with an abundance of natural light, opening onto a fabulous balcony. The master bedroom has been thoughtfully designed to include a study nook, built-in-robes and an ensuite, while the second bedroom with built-in-robes is serviced by a separate bathroom with toilet. Further supplemented and enhanced by a Euro laundry, split system heating/cooling, secure video intercom entry, double glazing and a basement car space with storage cage. With additional lifestyle benefits including an indoor lap pool with Yarra River aspect, gymnasium and BBQ area. All within strolling distance of Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, trams, restaurants and the delights of the Yarra River walking/cycling paths.
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.

Description:
Sunny Spaces, Leafy Outlooks and a Lifestyle Lover's Location.
So close to all the action yet peacefully fronting a tree-lined cul-de-sac, this sensational townhouse is a wonderful discovery of space, style and lovely leafy outlooks.
With Collingwood and North Richmond trains, trams, walking trails, Abbotsford Convent arts precinct, seemingly endless cafes, bars and restaurants only moments from your door as well as access to local private and public schools, this is easy-care living at its most exciting.
With a north-facing vantage point, every day is sun-drenched and entertaining is a breeze. The stylish tri-level layout boasts beautiful leafy outlooks and the smart Miele kitchen and spacious living/dining areas are bound on both ends by entertainment terraces.
Three double bedrooms (all with BIRs, main/large ensuite/petite balcony) and sleek family bathroom are further complemented by ground level home-office/4th bedroom and double car garage (internal access) secure beyond auto-gates.
Luxuriously fitted with stone finishes, heating/cooling, powder room, concealed laundry and video intercom, this city-edge sanctuary is a lifestyle winner.

Description:
FIRST HOME OWNERS: Secure your own little piece of Melbourne
Looking for your next investment or a brand new home? Look no further.
Riviere Apartments in Abbotsford offer all the benefits of inner urban living. Situated within the ‘Yarra’ building, this fantastic one bedroom apartment brings together the best of a truly historic location beside the Yarra with the finest of modern features and finishes.
Eligible first home buyers can take advantage of the State Government’s first home buyer stamp duty reduction incentive offered on properties under $600,000, giving them a head start on their property dreams – above and beyond the $10,000 first home owners grant.
Investors can make the most of Abbotsford’s appeal as a retail, restaurant and transport hot spot to attract tenants in Melbourne’s competitive rental market.
Encompassing a smart, contemporary design, this apartment features:
- Original hardwood floors
- Split-system heating and cooling
- Double glazed windows
- European laundry
- Warehouse style lighting
- Large, open living space
- Floor to ceiling windows
- Raw stone bench tops
- Stainless steel Blanco appliances
- Italian tiling and bathroom fittings
Ideally placed, this apartment is just a stroll away from the tranquillity of the Yarra trails and parkland, and the buzz and bustle of Victoria Street’s cafés and restaurant.
A fantastic opportunity for both owner-occupiers and investors alike, why not speak to a property investment adviser about the benefits of owning in Abbotsford?

Description:
North-facing riverfront residence of 339sqm with luxurious custom design
Internationally awarded design with exceptional amenity in a remarkable riverfront position distinguishes Acacia Place as one of Melbourne’s most privileged apartment addresses.
Only 3km from Melbourne’s CBD, this residence is blessed with the Yarra river bike and walking path at its doorstep, a less than 5 minute walk to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, public transport convenience via the tram superstop immediately out front (route 109) providing seamless access to the city and myriad exclusive private schools nearby including MLC, Trinity, Carey, Xavier and Ruyton.
Unique to the complex, this superb three/four bedroom residence offers sought after space in privacy and seclusion. Its high-end customised interiors create a sanctuary of sophisticated style complete with incredible outdoor entertaining, breathtaking Yarra views, intercom security, extensive garaging and house-like storage.
Behind a discreet door on the fourth level of “Eden”, a cleverly crafted north facing floorplan unfolds to reveal living and entertaining spaces of uncompromising size and scale, beautifully bookended by two bedroom wings and a separate media/rumpus or home office which could easily be adapted to a fourth bedroom.
The stunning designer kitchen flawlessly showcases solid Pietro Grigio marble benchtops and island, a full connoisseurs complement of Miele appliances, dual pantries and the inspired inclusion of a concealed cocktail bar. The adjoining open plan living space offers a 14 seat dining area and also casual fireside living that seems truly suited to a family home. A wall of bi-fold doors integrate the entire space with a lavish and expansive 154sqm of outdoor terrace featuring auto-irrigated landscaping, elevated decking and an alfresco dining pergola with built-in BBQ & storage.
Quietly occupying the north-west wing are two generous bedrooms with BIR’s and fitted storage sharing a marble appointed central bathroom with freestanding bath and separate shower. In its own wing, a sophisticated master bedroom retreat of lavish proportions boasts a wall of wardrobes complemented by an ensuite that boasts the finest of finishes with dual basins, double shower and a freestanding bath.
Custom designed specifically as a home for the developer’s family, an exhaustive list of carefully curated extras includes wide board timber floors, a dedicated laundry, separate powder room, pebble gas fire, extensive concealed storage, feature lighting, electronic blinds and curtains, 2-pack push open cabinetry, comprehensive NBN, HDMI and CAT 6 wiring, integrated surround sound, multi ducted heating and air conditioning, secure parking for 4 cars with a workshop and built-in storage.
Resort style facilities include 25m heated lap pool, spa, sundeck, sauna, 2 gymnasiums, rooftop function facilities, BBQ areas, meeting rooms, concierge and 2 cafes on the river’s edge.
(Note: There is also the opportunity to purchase the adjoining one bedroom apartment with an additional car space on a separate title).
Insights: 418/1 Acacia Place , Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2019 and 12 other 3 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Quite possibly a perfect conversion
The challenge of respecting Denton Mills huge role in Abbotsford's industrial era success while converting its evocative spaces to a residential identity was beautifully handled. This inviting dual level townhouse clearly proves the point throughout great spaces including a generous living/dining area complemented front and rear by terrace entertaining spaces and by an open plan kitchen featuring dark granite benches, stainless steel appliances and excellent storage. A balcony that captures the morning sun accompanies an upstairs main bedroom, with built in robes and a sky lit ensuite while two further bedrooms with built in robes include one with its own balcony. A central bathroom completes a design where each room has reverse cycle heating/cooling, video security preserves privacy and secure garaging for two cars is enhanced by two storage units. Character, creativity and quality, with a cafe on the corner, Victoria Street close by and city bound trains and trams easily accessed.

Cutting-edge style and uninterrupted river views!
Brand-new and brilliant, this fourth-floor Playhouse apartment has everything required for perfect inner-city living - spacious design, first-class features, elevated outlook and resort-style residents' facilities. With its enviable corner position and never-to-be-built-out panoramic views, the apartment's luxurious interior boasts 2 double bedrooms (both with robes), dedicated study alcove and deluxe central bathroom. Walking distance to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Yarra River trails and parkland, cafes and restaurants, trams to the CBD. Brilliant!

Description:
UNIQUE RIVERFRONT LIVING
Located in the multi-award winning Eden on the River complex only 3km from the city, this highly customised prestige apartment has much to offer.
The northern orientation floods the 236m2 landscaped terrace and open plan living area with light while offering absolute river frontage and amazing water and bushland views across to Kew. The terrace is finished with a balanced mix of synthetic grass, bluestone tiles, planter boxes and decking with an inbuilt BBQ and storage.
Two sides of the open plan living area open up to the the terrace through bi-fold doors that integrate the inside with the outside perfectly. The living area has been well thought out with remote controlled blinds and curtains and a wall of storage that houses your AV system and a gas pebble fireplace for ambience.
The kitchen adjoins the living area and again has been well appointed with 900m Miele appliances, integrated Liebherr fridge & freezer, stone and marble surfaces and loads of storage.
The master bedroom comfortably fits a king size bed and the en-suite is sizeable with a freestanding bath, shower, double basins and plentiful storage. The BIR’s have been customised with shoe racks, shelves, drawers plus high and low hanging and a study nook.
Two other queen bedrooms offer full length fitted BIR’s with mirrored doors plus a space for a study area. All bedrooms have remote blinds.
A concealed and zoned reverse cycle cooling & heating unit covers the entire apartment. Three car spaces and two storage cages are included on title.
You will be spoilt living in this enclosed sanctuary with a resident amenity akin to a five-star resort including a Health & Wellbeing Retreat, lap pool, two gyms, rooftop lounge & dining areas, hot tubs, sun deck and an on site concierge. Cafes Kitty Burns and Frankie Says are conveniently located downstairs on the river end of Acacia Place. Excellent transport links and shopping at Victoria Gardens are all at your door step.
Currently vacant and available for inspection as advertised or by private appointment.
Insights: 419/1 Acacia Place, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2017 and 12 other 3 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Abbotsford at its absolute best
Converted from the industrial era origins that defined the Yarra Falls precinct in a manner that acknowledges the past, the design flair of Carabott Holt Turcinov Architects has taken this evocative former textile mill building into the future beautifully. An impressive foyer and landscaped environs including the impressively preserved chimney stack complement this inviting fourth floor apartment's spaces - including a living/dining area featuring bamboo floors and a kitchen equipped with stone benches and Gaggenau appliances. The accompanying balcony brings in bright morning light, enhancing a floorplan offering a main bedroom with ensuite, a central second bedroom and a stylish main bathroom. A flexible study zone is an added element of these engaging proportions, complemented by security, an allocated car space and a dedicated cage in a secure store room. Directly opposite the vibrant community asset that Victoria Park has become, close to the river and trains to the city.

Description:
ULTRA-COOL WAREHOUSE
Brilliantly placed just metres from fabulous cafes, restaurants and bars, this uber chic warehouse style tri-level townhouse will impress you with abundant space and clever architectural design. Beginning on the ground floor, find a huge open plan living and dining space with a large ultramodern stone-topped kitchen with stainless appliances, opening out to a delightful courtyard garden. The single lock up garage is currently converted to a living space, with an adjacent bathroom. Move up one floor via the elegant hardwood stairs to three large bedrooms with built-in robes, and a luxury bathroom with freestanding tub, and powder room, plus a cleverly concealed laundry. The real treat is on the top floor - discover find a spacious and bright living area with a rooftop terrace balcony wrapping around the building for panoramic views, creating the perfect rooftop party zone! This stylish townhouse benefits from split-system heating and cooling, high ceilings throughout, and clean modern lines. Open plan warehouse-style living over three levels doesn't get better than this. Within the Abbotsford Primary School and Sophia Mundi Steiner schools zones and less than 20 minutes into the CBD.
Insights: 1/1 Mayfield Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2017 and 27 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Industrial Chic, Family Space and Fabulous Views
Perched on the penthouse level of the iconic Byfas Mills warehouse, this fabulous 2 storey apartment flaunts startling space, a choice of 4 al-fresco terraces and amazing views of both the city and the Yarra Bend bushlands. A modern industrial aesthetic, polished concrete floors, soaring ceilings and walls of glass frame the stylish 3 bedroom plus study, 3 bathroom layout where every family member is provided with plenty of light-filled spaces in which to gather as a group, retreat in peace or entertain in style.
Luxurious inner-urban living on the cusp of Studley Park, Yarra falls and the Merri Creek trail comprises superb north-facing living/dining areas open to sky-high terrace, stunning Miele kitchen (preparation areas, coffee machine and stone finishes), extensive storage in all bedrooms (all open to terraces, main/twin-shower ensuite), luxe spa-bathroom, upper city-view terrace, heating/cooling, 2-car basement parking (storage cage) and dynamic location near Victoria Street, Convent Arts precinct, transport and every conceivable gourmet delight.

Description:
Experience Paradise with Amazing City Views!
Superb Value With Loads Of Luxuries!
Heralding a new frontier in lavish lifestyle living, this near new two-bedroom apartment embraces cutting edge design with unmatched resort style facilities, all topped off by a thriving pedestrian promenade filled with quality eateries.
Awash with glorious natural light, the apartments free flowing layout makes for easy living, with a state-of-the-art kitchen boasting Miele stainless steel appliances, dishwasher plus excellent storage space. The adjoining living and dining zone is carpeted for added comfort and flows outside onto a superb balcony that captures enviable CBD and Yarra River vistas.
The two bedrooms both benefit from mirrored built-in-robes and are accompanied by a central modern bathroom and powder room/second toilet plus a separate internal laundry. Superbly complemented by reverse cycle heating/cooling, roller blinds throughout, downlights plus a secure basement car space and storage cage.
Adding to the apartments attraction, a superb rooftop entertaining area includes BBQ facilities on the spacious deck, spa baths, lap pool, gymnasium, health and wellbeing retreat, ample outdoor seating plus lobby bar and concierge ensure your every desire is met. All this and in a fabulous location just a stones’ throw from Victoria Gardens shopping and entertainment centre, easy access to Yarra Trail bike paths and public transport at your doorstep. Only 3.5km from Melbourne’s CBD, Melbourne Cricket Ground, Rod Laver Arena and many of Melbourne’s premier tourist destinations.
Currently leased and returning $2,302.00 per calendar month

Description:
Priced changed - Rural beauty yet with the inner city
You will love this apartment. In a secure building with lift access, this 1 bedroom plus study(could be converted to 2 bed rooms) apartment will impress you from the moment you walk in. The spacious and bright open plan living area features floorboards and includes a state of the art kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas cook top, oven, and dishwasher. Located right on Melbourne's iconic Yarra River, these near new luxury apartments have everything you have been searching for 1 Bedroom plus study, Car park, Storage Cage, Great Location, Featuring stylish hardwood timber flooring, spacious lounge with plenty of natural light, fully equipped modern kitchen with s/s appliances, large sparkling bathroom with laundry facility, bedroom with BIR, heating/cooling and great sized balcony.
Building facilities include security entrance, communal courtyard and secure car space with bike rack.
Ideally located, surrounded by rural beauty yet with the inner city also at your feet.

Description:
Riverside tranquillity on the city fringe
Enjoying a rare combination of city fringe convenience and riverside tranquillity, this single bedroom apartment delivers the best of both worlds. The soothing sounds of the Yarra River assure a relaxing ambience and sensational vista matched only by the sophisticated function of a spacious interior. The stone-topped kitchen with a full complement of appliances and a chic bathroom/laundry provide excellent service to the double bedroom with built-in-robe and open living domain with entertaining balcony. Completing a package sure to impress new buyers and investors is secure undercover and guest parking, video intercom, storage cage and split-system a/c, all within close proximity to Victoria Park Station, Main Yarra Trail, Smith St eateries and the CBD. Leased until April 2017 for $1,560 pcm.

Description:
Living life the 'Precinct' way
A one bedroom property that combines sophistication, northern sun and a great setting, this inviting 'Precinct' apartment guarantees a great start - in home ownership or if inner city investing is the aim. Entered from quiet, convenient Grosvenor Street, accessed by a swift lift, these light filled sixth floor spaces include a north facing living/dining area that opens to an elegant balcony. An open plan kitchen featuring stone benches and Miele appliances defines one wall of this exceptional design, further enhanced by reverse cycle heating/cooling. Northern light also fills the double bedroom that includes built in robes and is complemented by a separate bathroom finished and fitted with a focus on sleek style. A 20m swimming pool, impressive gym, several landscaped outdoor areas, early learning centre and secure garaging lead the list of assets that enhance enjoyment of 'Precinct', where trams, Victoria Gardens shopping and Yarra Bend Park provide superb surroundings.

Description:
Riverside living, so close to the city
Secure your own piece of inner urban Melbourne and invest in a near new one bedroom apartment in the exciting complex, Riviere.
Architecturally designed and beautifully finished, this luxury Abbotsford residence with modern interiors will impress from the moment you step inside. Set on the banks of the Yarra, Riviere is a modern classic featuring spacious interiors that complement convenient city-fringe living.
This brilliantly designed apartment boasts state of the art kitchen with Blanco stainless steel appliances including gas cook top, electric oven and dishwasher, large light and bright lounge overlooking private balcony, spacious bedroom with mirrored built in robes, luxurious main bathroom with chic fittings throughout, and European style laundry.
Other features include:
• stunning polished floorboards
• carpeted bedroom
• split system heating and cooling
• intercom entrance lift access
• undercover basement parking with remote access
• river views
• storage cage.
Ideally placed, this apartment is just a stroll away from the tranquillity of the Yarra trails and parkland, and the buzz and bustle of Victoria Street’s cafés and restaurant.
Investors can make the most of Abbotsford’s appeal as a retail, restaurant and transport hot spot to attract tenants in Melbourne’s competitive rental market.
A fantastic opportunity for both owner-occupiers and investors alike, why not speak to Dennis Bailey about the benefits of owning in Abbotsford?
Internal area
45.5m²

Description:
Style, substance, significance
This sensationally located first floor apartment offers all the convenience of inner city living with an inviting interior and clean crisp finishing. This two bedroom apartment offers the much sought after peaceful, corner location. With spacious living/ meals area, featuring a modern kitchen with Miele appliances and stone bench tops. Floor to ceiling windows with an undercover balcony with east facing views towards Kew's parklands. With both bedrooms featuring mirrored built in robes, one with ensuite, and a further luxurious central bathroom, split system heating/ cooling, secure video/intercom entry, and secure basement car park. Communal pool, gym and outdoor areas further add to this wonderful apartment. Perfect for owner occupiers and investors alike. Ideally located with easy access to Victoria Gardens shopping centre, Victoria Street restaurants, public transport at your doorstep, and a stone's throw to the beautiful Yarra River walking trails. This apartment is a must view.

Description:
Abbotsford Living At Its Best
This well presented apartment located in the heart of Abbotsford with the tram at your doorstop, allows for easy access to the city and is positioned within walking distance to Victoria Street amenities, Victoria Gardens shopping complex and the Yarra River. Immediately upon entering, this bright and inviting apartment impresses with its quality finishes and views over parkland reserves surrounding the Yarra River. The sleek, stylish kitchen complete with Miele appliances, abundant storage and bench space adjoins the living and meals area where sliding doors open onto the generously sized balcony. Two light filled bedrooms with BIRs share a modern bathroom as well as each enjoying balcony access. With the convenience of a gym, indoor lap pool, outdoor communal areas, secure entry with camera and intercom, car space, lock-up storage, this apartment offers the ultimate in location and lifestyle.

Description:
AS NEW-Fantastic Yarra River Precinct!
This 2 bedroom apartment combines brilliant northern light with first class communal facilities in an exciting location of cosmopolitan diversity. Open-plan living with a SMEG-equipped stone kitchen is enhanced by a cool mirrored splash back and opens out to an entertainers' balcony all with Northern private views. A designer ensuite and second bathroom, large mirrored robes in each bedroom are all touches of luxury and convenience. The outstanding communal facilities with a library, heated swimming pool, sauna, gymnasium and BBQ area, whilst secure video entry, basement parking and storage cage are important inclusions as well. This dynamic position is just a few minutes from the CBD and allows you to walk to Victoria Street's famous restaurant strip, plus the shops, cinemas and cafes of Victoria Gardens all while enjoying the Yarra River, its beautiful parkland and endless trails at your doorstep.

Description:
Vendor Says Sell
Be charmed by the location and facility of this well presented semi-detached home, bringing you the best of urban living in Abbotsford. On an extra generous allotment of 216sqm (approx.) and set amongst the delights of a well established tree lined street less than five kilometres to the CBD, you can be forgiven for thinking you are moments from a country retreat with the Yarra River and walking trails, Collingwood Childrens farm and Studley Park only moments away. Over two levels, the home presents two double bedrooms on the ground floor, well placed bathroom with bath, central lounge with patio gardens on either side, and open plan lounge and dining with central well appointed gourmet kitchen leading to a sunlit courtyard through French doors. A mezzanine bedroom or study with terrace permits a multitude of living possibilities to suit any household. Air-conditioning, heating, ornate fireplaces, laundry with additional shower and toilet plus off street parking via right of way are the cream on top. All only minutes to Victoria Street, Smith Street and Victoria Gardens, or trains and trams to take you all over Melbourne.

Description:
Denton Mills is style defined
The luxurious dual level proportions of this inviting townhouse illustrate the outstanding success with which Denton Mills was re-invented as one of Abbotsford's most appealing addresses. Front and rear terraces contribute significant outdoor allure to great living and dining spaces accompanied by an open plan kitchen featuring a contemporary combination of granite benches and ample cabinetry. Upstairs, a main bedroom appreciates a balcony retreat, a refined, renovated ensuite and built-in robes imported from Germany that deliver storage with style. Two additional bedrooms, one with its own balcony, each include built-in robes and share a sky lit central bathroom that completes accommodation of consummate comfort. Heating/cooling, total security, storage units and garaging for two cars complement a brilliant way to enjoy the best of inner city living - with a quality cafe in the building, the vibrancy of Victoria Street around the corner and North Richmond station easily reached.

Description:
Just Picture the Possibilities!
Tantalizingly close to the cool cafes of Victoria St, Collingwood Station and the Convent arts precinct, experience cosmopolitan inner-city living at its best with the Yarra River on your doorstep and the added appeal of a wide tree-lined street with the history of Abbotsford seemingly distilled into its DNA. Presenting a near perfect platform for the `hands-on' market inspired by The Block, this spacious and solidly built 4BR home on a bumper 256sqm (approx.) double block is positively plump with potential for buyers ready to roll up their sleeves.
Designed over two levels with obvious scope for self-contained in-law/teenage accommodation, the home is presented for sale in immaculate original condition, very livable as it stands and now ready for the next chapter in its story to unfold. The ground floor currently provides a versatile 4.2m x 6.5m (approx.) living area with separate basic kitchen and bathroom/laundry adjacent, while the entry foyer also provides convenient internal access to the garage. It's not hard to see the fabulous scope on this level to create a self-contained studio perfect for keeping loved ones close in their golden years or perhaps a fun kids' rumpus/games zone to call their own.
Upstairs, the large living and dining room opens to the front balcony, while a dramatic archway links the adjacent open-plan kitchen/meals zone. A model of efficiency that will respond beautifully to modern makeover, the existing kitchen has a wall oven and cook top and loads of cupboard storage. Accommodation is by way of up to four bedrooms (or three plus a study)
attended by the family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
In easy reach of the Collingwood Children's Farm, the farmer's market, Bridge Rd and Swan Street shopping, extras here include air conditioning, under stair storage area, low maintenance surrounds and a double garage.
Settlement: 30 days
Deposit: 10% payable
Anthony Cimino : 0400 500 903
Insights: 91-93 Charles Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2016 and 2 other 4 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Surprise me with space and style
A lifestyle winner in size, style and situation, this north sun-flooded house is an exceptional inner-urban choice on one of the area's premier tree-lined boulevards. Just around the corner from the Convent precinct and Children's Farm. Sleek from the outside and sensational on the inside, this 2 storey home offers impressively appointed accommodation with 3 double bedrooms all accessing their own luxurious bathrooms (main/fitted WIRs). Matching living and entertaining areas ooze with contemporary style. The spacious stone kitchen (WI pantry, Euro appliances) presides over spacious open-plan living areas extending northwards to deep garden deck amidst secluded leafy setting. Stunning timber floors, stone finishes, city skyline views, storage room, powder room, R/C heat/cool, separate laundry and OSP conclude an immaculate package on the doorstep of river trails, transport, restaurants and Yarra Bend parklands.

Description:
Life's Easy With The Abbotsford Advantage
Superbly located in a peaceful setting at the heart of Abbotsford, this attractive double-fronted Victorian offers every advantage for an easy lifestyle from superb features, two-level living and alfresco entertaining to walk-everywhere convenience. An exciting discovery on a 216.2sqm allotment (approx.) with rear ROW; there's character, charm and quality in abundance with this inviting timber home that's secluded and secure within a short stroll to Yarra River parkland and trails, Convent Arts Precinct, Victoria Street restaurants and train station. The generous layout features three sizable bedrooms (large upstairs main with views to the city), two big bathrooms (double-shower ensuite), open-plan living and dining room with fireplace and French doors to fabulous deck and garden, gourmet stone kitchen with Ilve and ASKO appliances, laundry, ducted heating, air-conditioning, vacuum, alarm, electric blinds and polished floorboards.

Description:
Inner city desirability defined
The attractions and activities we associate with the term 'inner city lifestyle' are made irresistibly available by this captivating Victorian where the Abbotsford Convent precinct, Collingwood Children's Farm, bike paths running by the river and Collingwood station are just some of the elements that complement the character and the comfort of its spaces. Two double bedrooms, each with its own reverse cycle heating/cooling, project an appeal that's immediately matched by the profile of a central living room defined by a welcoming mood and a period fireplace. A separate kitchen/dining area that offers ample space for a second living zone features polished floors, its own heating/cooling, a cellar and a welcoming link to a rear deck where bistro blinds and a courtyard with right-of-way add to the outdoor appeal. Excellent storage throughout. Capture a beautiful example of a quintessential Victorian design around the corner from Gahan Reserve - and enjoy all its inner city attributes.

Description:
City edge advantages
This sensational double storey terrace is enviably situated within moments of the Collingwood Children's Farm, Abbotsford Convent's Arts Park, Farmers Markets, Dights Falls and also Yarra Bend Park. This property boasts a well laid out floorplan that includes a separate living area, a kitchen and dining area that opens onto a private rear courtyard ideal for alfresco dining, a lock up garage and also a laundry with separate WC. The property also includes ducted heating, split air conditioning units, intercom and security system. Upstairs there are three good sized bedrooms all with built in robes, a second bathroom and the master bedroom includes a private ensuite and balcony with French doors. Close proximity to Collingwood Station, Gahan Reserve and nearby are Victoria, Smith, Gertrude and Brunswick Street's exceptional entertaining and dining precincts.

Capturing the essence of inner city cool on the cusp of Richmond, footsteps from Vibrant Victoria Street and the banks of the Yarra River, this stylish designer apartment has been crafted for effortless contemporary living. * Secure single car space, video intercom, lift access
* Indoor pool, fully equipped gym, onsite childcare centre and cafe

A versatile floor plan incorporates a vast living/dining room flowing though multifold doors a to decked courtyard with 2-car off-street parking, custom Smeg-equipped kitchen (stone benchtops and premium cabinetry), large 2nd living room/office, 3 double BRs (BIRs; balcony and ensuite to main), stylish family bathroom, laundry and separate WCs. Features of this inviting CBD-edge home include polished hardwood floors, storage, alarm and split-system a/c.

Description:
Idyllic City Edge Living
In a tranquil leafy pocket yet only moments from Victoria Street's restaurants, North Richmond station, the Yarra River and the CBD, the stylishly presented, superbly proportioned and sun-drenched dimensions of this solid brick Victorian residence create an inviting and private inner urban sanctuary.
The pristine interior spaces featuring high ceilings and polished timber floors exude period character through the arched hallway and two beautiful double bedrooms with open fireplaces. The bright bathroom and a study overlook an internal courtyard. Soaring cathedral ceilings with exposed beams accentuate the sense of space in the open plan living and dining room with a gas fireplace and gourmet Ilve kitchen boasting stone benches. A private northwest garden with covered deck and pedestrian right of way is an ideal space for al fresco dining.
Instantly appealing, it also includes alarm and plantation shutters.

Description:
Riverside Yarra Retreat
Sophisticated inner city living is best described by this over-sized contemporary two bedroom, two bathroom apartment with desirable north facing aspect.
Superbly located on the banks of the Yarra River and surrounded by walking trails, dog friendly Victoria Park situated directly opposite, parklands, shopping amenities and easy access to the CBD, this urban oasis offers two magnificent bedrooms with huge master incorporating galley style study area with adjoining private terrace and en suite.
A vast open design living and dining bathed in Northern natural light all year round flows out to a full width entertainer’s terrace with a Gaggenau equipped kitchen highlighted by a butler’s pantry and sleek stone bench tops.
Ideal for the investor or owner occupier, secure off street parking, storage cage, heating and cooling, security intercom with monitor screen and laundry completes this residences endless list of credentials.

Description:
Live Large in this Urban Heartland
Fully capitalise on true design edge and urban innovation with an apartment located at Precinct, a premier community based living complex. Establish city life, your way in this 3 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment that?s located close to the CBD, public transport, Yarra Bend parkland, Studley Park Golf Course as well as the vibrant Victoria Street restaurant district.
Flooded with natural light, this sophisticated home features a sleek kitchen with an island and Miele appliances, generous living and dining opening out to a north-facing entertaining terrace, main bedroom with BIRs, 2 further bedrooms (both with BIRs and one with a private courtyard), 2 modern main bathrooms, European laundry, split-system heating and cooling, secure basement car space and storage cage.
Enjoy an array of enviable resident facilities including an indoor 20 metre swimming pool, fully equipped gym, on-site child care centre, café and manicured gardens.
Size Internal - 90 sqm approx
Size External - 25 sqm approx
Size Total - 115 sqm approx

Description:
GREEN SQUARE - luxury, location and lovely views
This second-floor apartment delivers an environment of quality and security complemented by Green Square's unmatched array of five-star residents' facilities. Clever use of light and space, the apartment's vogue interior comprises one double bedroom (with robes) and stylish bathroom, stone-top kitchen with all-Smeg appliances, open living/dining area out to full-width terrace views of the Skipping Girl and in coming years into the garden courtyard of 'The Park House'. Other stand-out features include split-system heating and cooling, video intercom/secure entry, car space, plus residents' garden, lap pool, sauna, gymnasium and pet friendly body corporate. Trams virtually at your doorstep, Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, cafes and restaurants, Yarra trails and parkland are all close by. All of this is perfect for an owner occupier or astute investor.
Ben Chrimes : 0438 285 337

Description:
All the Abbotsford attractions
Far larger than first impressions might suggest, featuring a deep rear garden and the significant Abbotsford asset of a secure double garage, this engaging Victorian issues a guarantee of inner city greatness. Two double bedrooms deliver a warm welcome to impressively extended, stylishly updated spaces including a central living room framed by polished floors and high ceilings. To the rear, a dining area of appealing character that flows to a generous deck and the garden's sunny depth is complemented by a light filled kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, ample storage and captivating cafe windows opening to an inviting bar and the deck. A bright bathroom completes the spaces of this rewarding residence before paved and landscaped outdoor dimensions conclude with the double garage, accessed from second frontage to Little Lithgow Street. Victoria Street's vibrancy, tram routes and North Richmond station further enhance a fantastic city edge setting.

Description:
Renovated, huge land & 2 street frontages
This spacious and superbly situated Victorian blends period character with modern flair on a rare deep garden block with 2-car parking from Little Charles Street. Ingeniously extended in high-ceilinged style, this light-filled residence close to cool cafes, Collingwood Station and the Convent precinct includes 2 double bedrooms with custom BIRs, separate dining room adjoining side courtyard, designer kitchen (stone benchtops, Bosch appliances) open to stunning living room flowing to landscaped garden with northern light, an elegant bathroom featuring a walk-in shower and concealed laundry, plus large loft and garden storage, polished timber floors, ducted heating, split-system air conditioning and video intercom. Here is city-fringe living at its best, offering privacy and exceptional low-maintenance style and still with huge potential for 2nd level extension &/or garage/studio (STCA).

Description:
Excellence matches elegance
A streetscape that adds leafy appeal to a location of total convenience complements the flexible, light filled spaces of this inviting residence, a home that delivers exactly what we seek from an inner city address. The northern light and freshly polished floorboards of a fabulous living room lead to separate dimensions for dining accompanied by a well appointed kitchen and beyond to the low maintenance privacy of a rear courtyard. Upstairs, the sunny, spacious main bedroom featuring a charming balcony, built in robes and spa bath ensuite is matched by the modern proportions of two additional bedrooms, each with built in robes, that surround a central study zone and a sky lit, family sized bathroom. Heating, cooling, Foxtel connectivity and ample storage further enhance a home featuring a versatile office, retreat or play room, easily returned to original role as a secure garage, enjoying city access, North Richmond station and Victoria Street's trams, shopping and restaurants.

Description:
The stunning new height of inner-urban living
A brand new architect-designed residence in a cool River Precinct cul-de-sac, this brilliant loft terrace is a stroke of genius in the boutique St Joseph's complex showcasing cutting-edge style, stunning features and impressive 4.2m ceiling. Stroll to the Yarra, the Convent, Victoria Street restaurants, Three Bags Full cafe and train station from this outstanding townhouse with own street frontage featuring a flexible 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom floorplan, light and airy interior with natural ventilation, landscaped entertainment courtyard and basement car space and storage cage on title. This compelling new home is an easy-care, city-fringe haven boasting open-plan living and dining area with polished concrete floor/ceiling and full-height windows, streamlined gourmet Bosch kitchen with extendable stainless steel bench, main bedroom with glazed-entry ensuite, laundry, built-in storage and reverse-cycle heating/cooling.

Description:
Modern Inner City Delight Amongst Garden Settings
Located in the fabulous Green Square complex where you can enjoy beautiful views of the picturesque landscaped garden courtyard below, this elegant, ultra-contemporary, and peaceful two bedroom, two bathroom apartment is some of the finest Abbotsford living available.
Love the easy access to diverse Victoria Street restaurants and Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre just metres away. The apartment itself is a model of stylish living, with a spacious and bright lounge and dining zone handily serviced by an amazing kitchen boasting a stone benchtop, mirrored splashback, soft-closing drawers, fantastic storage including handy built-in shelves, and stainless steel Smeg appliances.
A private master bedroom features terrific natural light as well as ample mirrored BIR storage and a luxury ensuite, while the 2nd bedroom also with BIRs sits directly opposite the sleek main bathroom. A generous balcony terrace will be a treat for anyone who loves outdoor meals and entertaining, while a European laundry, study nook, reverse cycle heating and cooling, video intercom, storage cage, and secure car space are other apartment inclusions.
Residents have access to a swimming pool, gym, communal garden and courtyard, and a library, while you're also close to Yarra Bend Park, Yarra River walking & bike paths, Abbotsford Convent, buses, & North Richmond Station.
Anton Wongtrakun : 0419 352 888

Triumph In The Transformation

An emphasis on energy-efficiency with solar electricity and double-glazing enhances the superb appeal of this stunning two-level sanctuary highlighting a flexible upstairs retreat or fourth bedroom, three bathroom floorplan and beautiful entertainment oasis. A breathtaking kitchen with porcelain benchtops and Bosch appliances (induction cooktop) adds luxury to the lifestyle mix complementing park views, stylish living/dining area opening to alfresco deck, upstairs retreat or large 4th bedroom, ensuite to main downstairs bedroom, laundry, storeroom, zoned ducted heating/cooling, smart video security, Tasmanian Oak floors, TV/data cabling and solar hot water. Description:
Sophisticated Designer's own warehouse with rooftop entertaining
Customised as a Designer's own home, this superbly sophisticated New York style warehouse conversion combines its rich industrial form with stylish modern function and unforgettable rooftop entertaining against a breathtaking backdrop of uninterrupted 360 degree views. Maximising all the natural light advantages of a prized corner position, impressive over four levels, inspired design has delivered an impressively generous three bedroom lifestyle environment boasting not one but two separate living domains, a fitted study nook and the tremendous inner city appeal of extensive built in storage and remote garage/ storage. Dynamic dimensions include an entry level main bedroom with fitted BIRs and hotel style ensuite rising up to two first floor bedrooms of lavish proportions, both with sitting/ study and BIRs. Above, a large open plan living domain shares sweeping blue sky views with a granite topped kitchen featuring stainless steel gas appliances, a separate dining zone equally adaptable as a fourth bedroom with ensuite and two breakfast balconies. Further highlights include hidden laundry, polished timber floors, auto blinds, ducted heating, reverse cycle cooling and intercom entry. Just ten minutes from the CBD and only a short walk from local cafes, Victoria Street's restaurants, Abbotsford Convent, Studley Park and the Yarra.

Situated in the heart of Abbotsford on leafy tree lined Langridge Street, this incredibly proportioned town residence exudes every luxury and requirement of the inner city buyer. Description:
CITY-EDGE FAMILY PERFECTION
A rare find in Abbotsford, this extraordinary 4BR residence combines floorplan versatility and designer luxury to deliver the ultimate inner-urban family experience. Wonderfully private and filled with natural light, the home's vogue interior boasts three main bedrooms (extra-large upstairs master with spa ensuite and balcony), stylish main bathroom and separate powder room, elegant formal lounge and open-plan living/dining area complemented by a divine central courtyard ideal for entertaining. Add to this a granite-bench kitchen with quality appliances and ample cupboard space, heating and cooling throughout, high ceilings, plantation shutters, hardwood floors, excellent storage options and more. Bi-folds (from the living area) reveal a private backyard complete with double garage (to Federation Lane) and modern self-contained apartment with its own kitchen/meals, bathroom and enormous upstairs bedroom. Stroll to Yarra Bend Park, Dights Falls and riverside trails, Victorian Station, Hoddle Street buses, Johnston Street shops and cafes. One of a kind!

Description:
STYLISH LIVING ON THE YARRA RIVER
An opportunity to invest in a premiere location within a much loved security building.
- One bedroom; built in robes; full of natural light
- Bright open plan living and dining areas
- Spacious private courtyard (12sqm) with additional private entrance that opens into a serene residents garden
- Well-appointed kitchen - Miele oven and gas hot plates; Miele dishwasher
- Reverse cycle air conditioning unit
- European laundry
- Immaculate separate bathroom
- Basement storage unit
- Entrance hall - polished floors
- Approx 55sqm of lifestyle
- Rates approx. $952pa; Owners corp approx $448pq
Lifestyle facilities include; gym, sauna, entertainment area, Jacuzzis, spa and swimming pool, cinema room and boardroom. Full time concierge.
Set on tranquil bend in the Yarra River with direct access to Yarra River bike path/trail. River, kayaking, fishing, bushwalks, bike trails and parks one side. Victoria Gardens shopping and cinema, other side. CBD restaurants and cafes a tram stop away.

Description:
A spectacular design for urban living
This exceptional high-ceilinged apartment on the ground floor of '205 Gipps', designed by Kann Finch and winner of the 2013 Best Affordable Development award, is the ultimate CBD-edge retreat. With a tranquil ambience enhanced by superbly landscaped gardens opening from the heritage facade and security entry, the residence incorporates 1 large double bedroom with custom BIRs, a spacious living room flowing through double glazed doors to a private terrace overlooking the garden, stylish galley kitchen/dining zone with quality appliances, and a luxurious bathroom/concealed laundry with walk-in shower. Featuring keyless entry, bespoke cabinetry, air conditioning and premium fittings, this fine property close to stations, the Abbotsford arts precinct and leading cafes includes secure parking and storage cage.
Note: easy wheelchair access.

Two Bedroom Apartment In The Exciting "Riviere" Complex - Sale by close date 23/07/16
You will love this apartment.
In a secure building with lift access, this two bedroom apartment will impress you from the moment you walk in.
The spacious and bright open plan living area features floorboards and includes a state of the art kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas cook top, oven, and dishwasher.

Enjoy a quiet lifestyle, within walking distance to shopping and entertainment, Yarra River and walking trails, Studley Park, Dights Falls, and positioned just upstream from the Abbotsford Convent and the Collingwood Children's farm.

Description:
Superlative designer dimensions
All the very best elements of inner city life can be enjoyed from this exceptional townhouse, a home that surrounds itself with a tree lined streetscape, great cafes, the vibe of Victoria Street and the convenience of a quick CBD commute from Collingwood station. The flexibility of a generous ground floor study or home office, with its own bathroom, sets a stylish tone for upstairs living and dining areas of outstanding size, featuring polished floorboards, a balcony that appreciates outlooks over the leafy surroundings and an open plan kitchen zone defined by stainless steel bench-tops and appliances, a dual drawer dishwasher and bright light from an effective, attractive void. Upstairs, a main bedroom with walk-in robes and ensuite, a second double bedroom and a central third bathroom also benefit from the atrium's impact. Secure garage space accessed from Park Street adds an ideal conclusion to a residence that represents inner urban living at its most rewarding.

Description:
Classic Edwardian, dream location
This charming, solid brick Edwardian retains many of its period features in a prized pocket of Abbotsford. Beyond its elegant facade, discover two large bedrooms before the home opens up in superb modern fashion with a separate kitchen, breakfast bar and a spacious open-plan living and dining area. Head upstairs to the mezzanine level where a third bedroom is drenched in natural light from a row of windows that run the width of the property. Step outside to a north-facing, private paved courtyard built with entertaining in mind - or use as off-street parking with rear laneway access. Conveniently located moments from Abbotsford Convent, Yarra parklands and Collingwood train station, this is classic inner-city living with all the lifestyle benefits. Inspect with confidence today.
*3 large bedrooms, 2 with BIR, 1 on mezzanine floor
*Spacious open-plan living and dining
*Kitchen with electric oven, gas hotplates, breakfast bar and plenty of bench space
*Bathroom with spa bath and laundry capabilities
*Panel heating throughout
*Plush carpets

Description:
Prime Pad In Stellar Street With Courtyard
Situated in a handsome tree-lined street, this renovated one-bedroom apartment has everything you need to live in contemporary comfort or invest with ease.
Within a stroll of trains, parks, restaurants, shops and bars, and a conveniently quick commute to the CBD, the first-floor home is superbly easy to care for, leaving you free to make the most of the highlights of the locale any time you like.
The kitchen offers stainless steel appliances including a gas cooktop, fan-forced electric oven and rangehood, and is linked by a breakfast bar to the living zone.
A leafy outlook and built-in robe are bedroom highlights, and in the adjoining ensuite you'll find a shower, toilet, vanity, heat lamp and laundry facilities.
Reverse-cycle split-system heating and cooling, polished concrete flooring, good sized courtyard and a designated covered parking space are further advantages.
Yarra Bend Park and a riverside walking and cycling trail are also just a few hundred metres away, meaning the latte lifestyle, exotic culinary delights and invigorating open spaces are all waiting for you.
Currently Leased at $300.00 per week
Stephanie Lentini : 0437 565 273

Description:
An inner city escape
Designed so that contemporary refinement complements a river-side setting where bushland serenity provides a beautiful accompaniment to total convenience, this light filled Riviere apartment is a highly regarded address by renowned Bruch Henderson Architects. Light filled, north facing spaces include a living/dining area featuring elegantly low maintenance oak floors, reverse cycle heating/cooling and a Caesar-stone and stainless steel fitted kitchen. A substantial balcony provides a great context for undercover entertaining with the Yarra and the native bush of Yarra Bend Park as a brilliant backdrop. A main bedroom with its own view towards the trees is matched by an equally inviting second bedroom that opens to the balcony and a bathroom that confirms the quality of this apartment's fittings, finishes and clear sense of style. Garaging and a storage cage further enhance a fabulous c2014 scenario so close to parkland, cafes and public transport routes to the CBD.

Townhouse 1

Description:
STYLISH ONE BEDROOM PLUS STUDY NOOK AND A CAR PARK ON TITLE
Situated on the 2nd floor of the highly coveted 'Eden ' residential complex, this brilliant one bedroom apartment offers a modern, relaxed, and a convenient lifestyle moments to Victoria Gardens shopping and Victoria Street restaurants.
A perfect match for first home buyers, or investors on the hunt for a great property, this stylish
easy to maintain apartment is highlighted by the comfortable living zone, which opens out to an entertainer's size terrace, and a shared common garden area that is only accessible by a handful of surrounding apartments.
Back inside, the sleek kitchen has stone bench tops, soft-closing drawers, glass splash back, and stainless steel Miele appliances including a dishwasher, while the dedicated meals area has the flexibility to be used as a handy study area.
The bedroom is equipped with mirrored built-in robes and sliding doors which allows for both secluded and open sleeping quarters, while the tasteful bathroom is adorned with stylish wall tiles, mirrored wall storage, and laundry facilities. Other features of this apartment include Daikin reverse cycle cooling, video intercom entry, building concierge, and secure basement
car space
The resort-style facilities of Eden include a rooftop terrace with river and city views, BBQs, a movie lounge with large screen TV, 2 spas, sundeck, and the 'Health and the Well-Being Retreat' features a heated lap pool, spa, sundeck, gym, sauna, and therapy room.
Literally across the road from Victoria Gardens and with city-bound trams at your doorstep, this appealing abode is also within close proximity to Yarra River walking and bike paths, Yarra Bend Park, schools, local shops, buses, and North Richmond Station.
Robert Eggers : 0412 329 340

Contemporary apartment in a resort style complex
Occupying a first floor position, this contemporary apartment presents an exceptionally stylish open plan layout with high end finishes. It embraces a leisure driven resort style address within easy walking distance of Victoria Gardens and the Yarra River.
- Shared access to an indoor pool, sauna, gym and gardens
- Streamlined open living and dining area with natural light
- Broad covered balcony set against a leafy urban backdrop
- Flawless stone island kitchen features Miele gas appliances
- Double sized bedrooms with built-ins, ultra-chic bathroom
- Concealed laundry, ample storage space and neutral colours
- Readymade opportunity for both first homebuyers and investors
- Air conditioning, carpeted, secure entry with video intercom
- Secure car space, lock-up storage room, common garden grounds
- Walk to Victoria Street's amenities, reserves and city buses

URBAN SANCTUARY... RIVER PRECINCT...
Designer living drenched in natural light offering the perfect inner city oasis. Crisp lines and an abundance of space make this a home of unique appeal

Ideally located in Abbotsford's hottest pocket. Moments from Brunswick Street and Smith Street shops and cafes. Victoria Park, Yarra River, Abbotsford Convent and Parkland all at your door. 1 minute walk to Victoria Park rail station and minutes to the CBD.

Description:
UNDER OFFER
This 2 bedroom apartment combines brilliant city views with first class communal facilities in an exciting location of cosmopolitan diversity. Open-plan living with a SMEG-equipped stone kitchen is enhanced by a cool mirrored splash back and opens out to an entertainers' balcony all with breath-taking views of the city. A designer ensuite and second bathroom, large mirrored robes in each bedroom are all touches of luxury and convenience. The outstanding communal facilities with a library, heated swimming pool, sauna, gymnasium and BBQ area, whilst secure video entry, basement parking and storage cage are important inclusions as well. This dynamic position is just a few minutes from the CBD and allows you to walk to Victoria Street's famous restaurant strip, plus the shops, cinemas and cafes of Victoria Gardens all while enjoying the Yarra River, its beautiful parkland and endless trails at your doorstep.

Description:
TIGHTLY HELD RIVERSIDE POSITION
Elevated with awe inspiring views across the Yarra River and Dights Falls is this spacious apartment of some 120sqm approx (internally) offering a brilliant light and sensational space that raises the standard of warehouse apartment living.
- 2 large bedrooms with built in robes, master with large balcony overlooking the river
- Boasting an oversized entertainers living and dining area with a soaring high saw tooth ceiling and fabulous natural light
- Brilliant balcony space enjoying endless nature and Yarra River vistas
- Sleek kitchen - gas stovetop, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar
- Other features include: ducted cooling; plantation shutters; exposed beams
- 2 stylish bathrooms
- 2 undercover car parks + storage cage
An attractive, low maintenance lifestyle awaits with a premier position opposite the rejuvenated Victoria Park and moments from transport, the CBD, Smith St and Brunswick St's shops, cafes and restaurants as well as the Abbotsford Convent.

Description:
Modern living, iconic surrounds
With its light-filled interior, clever design and quality features throughout, this first-floor apartment provides an idyllic inner-city lifestyle opportunity or blue-chip investment in Abbotsford's historic Denton Mills precinct. Well-appointed interior comprises one double bedroom (with mirrored robes) and stylish bathroom, open lounge/dining area complete with elevated outlook to the city skyline. Add to this a stone-bench kitchen with glass splashbacks and integrated dishwasher, split-system heating and cooling, European laundry, plus video intercom, lift access to secure foyer and lower-level parking space. Stroll to Collingwood Station, Yarra trails, Victoria Street trams, shops and supermarkets, renowned cafes and fine restaurants. Brilliant!
Daniel Atsis : 0408 556 927

Description:
Pristine Precinct Living with Ground Floor Convenience
Brilliantly located just a stone's throw to the Yarra River and surrounding parklands, as well as all the amazing shopping of Victoria Gardens, this two bedroom ground floor apartment is the definition of modern and relaxed inner city living ready to be snapped up by a vast collection of eager buyers.
Surrounded by beautiful leafy outdoor spaces making even the walk to your apartment something to remember, this superb pad in special The Precinct' complex has a standout terrace which is a joy for outdoor entertaining particularly in the warmer months.
Inside, this marvellous apartment enjoys great natural light along with a comfortable lounge and meals zone, stone kitchen with island bench and Miele appliances, bedrooms with BIRs which surround the sleek bathroom, European laundry, reverse cycle heating and cooling, video intercom, secure car space, and access to facilities including indoor lap pool, gym, child care centre, and on-site caf.
Just seconds to trams and amazing restaurants on Victoria Street, cinema and speciality shops in Victoria Gardens, Yarra River bike trails, iconic Abbotsford Convent, and North Richmond Station making your journey into the city an absolute cinch.

Description:
Large, Light And Superbly Renovated
Super spacious and immaculately renovated one bedroom apartment in prime Abbotsford location, easy walking distance to cool cafes and bars, the Convent Precinct, Yarra River walking trails and transport. One of only eight, this first (top) floor apartment boasts a generous living room opening to an inviting balcony. A substantial, separately zoned kitchen/dining features stone benches, soft closing storage, stainless steel Miele appliances and a dishwasher. The bedroom's built in robes and attractive outlook enhance its consummate comfort while the bathroom's fittings reflect the finesse of the renovation. Heating/cooling. Off street parking.

Description:
Inner-city space & style with prized Northerly aspect
Intelligent design that maximises space and light defines this exceptional semi-detached residence that unfolds to reveal surprising proportions and refined style. Behind a secure, private garden lies a front bedroom with a raked ceiling and garden access, a separate lounge, bathroom with discreet Euro laundry and a stunning open-plan living zone. High ceilings, clean lines and top-quality fittings feature in this north-facing living space where huge glass sliders to a pergola-covered entertainment setting ensure an exceptional indoor-outdoor flow. With a built-in study space, gas log fire and a designer kitchen with stone benches and a suite of Smeg appliances, family life and entertaining are superbly catered for.
The two light-filled upstairs bedrooms share a large two-way ensuite. The master bedroom enjoys rooftop views, a window seat and study/WIR. Extras include bespoke cabinetry, double-glazed windows throughout, LED lighting, ducted heating, R/C air-con, extensive storage & a shed.
With a choice of public transport and shops nearby, and river trails, parklands and the Abbotsford convent at the end of the street, enjoy a lifestyle location without compromise.

Description:
Make this coveted address home!
This two-bedroom, elevated Victorian oozes charm in a quiet landscape of exceptional period houses. An arched hall introduces Baltic pine floors and high ceilings while the front main bedroom boasts an open fireplace, ornate ceiling rose, deep-moulded cornices, stained glass windows and BIRs. The rear open-plan living zone opens through french doors to a paved courtyard for alfresco entertaining amongst private, established gardens. Updated with Blanco stainless-steel appliances, Bosch dishwasher and air-conditioning, this residence combines contemporary convenience and low-maintenance liveability enhanced by a Euro laundry, ducted heating and storage cupboards. With trains, buses, the vibrant Victoria Street and the Yarra River on your doorstep, this is an enviable inner-city location with plenty of residential appeal.

Description:
Two Bedroom Apartment In The Exciting "Riviere" Complex
FOR SALE by Fixed Date Wed 11th May 5pm
Architecturally designed, this two bedroom apartment will impress from the moment you step inside.
There is a spacious and bright open plan living area, plus state of the art kitchen with Blanco stainless steel appliances, gas cook top, electric oven and dishwasher.
The private balcony overlooks Yarra River and surrounding bushland. Both bedrooms have built in robes and brand new carpet, the main bathroom with chic fittings throughout and European style laundry.
Other features include: polished floorboards, split system heating and cooling, intercom entrance lift access, undercover secure basement parking with remote access plus a storage cage.
Enjoy a quiet lifestyle, within walking distance to shopping and entertainment, Yarra River and walking trails, Studley Park, Dights Falls and positioned just upstream from the Abbotsford Convent and the Collingwood Children's farm.
Call to inspect now.

Description:
ABBOTSFORD AT ITS BEST - CHARACTER & CHARM
Boasting more than just a great suburb to reside in, this piece of
Melbourne's historic past is loaded with original features and
charm. It's like stepping back in time - a street lined with
single-fronted homes, blue-stone gutters, picket fences and scattered
parks make this a wonderful place to call home.
A three bedroom property with open fire places, polished floorboards,
high ceilings, exposed brick walls and a north facing back garden capture a century of historical architecture combined with renovated features.
From the front entrance a single hallway takes you on a journey past
two bedrooms (main with open fire place) through to a central
renovated bathroom, sunken lounge (with open fire place) opening out
to the kitchen and a second north facing living area which looks out
across the back garden. Sculptured recycled steel and timber finishes
enhance an already superbly restored family home.
A single timber stair case leads from the kitchen / dining area to a
second level which opens out into a third good size bedroom with
second bathroom and separate bath. Access to a roof top terrace is via the second level along a unique bridge style walkway. All
this can only be experienced through a private inspection.
Additional features include:
Hydronic heating
Newly renovated central bathroom
North facing roof top terrace
Attic storage area
Close to Abbotsford Convent, Victoria Park train station and Hoddle St buses
Garden shed with laundry, storage area and extra toilet
ROW pedestrian access
Secluded north facing garden with grass
3km walk or cycle to the CBD
Insights: Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2016 and 27 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
STAND-OUT RIVERSIDE TOWNHOUSE
Immaculate and low maintenance, with undeniable convenience
- 2 bedrooms with built in robes on the upper level; Central bathroom with master access
- Separate living/study plus bathroom on the lower level, with the potential to convert into a third bedroom
- Expansive open-plan lounge and dining area on the middle level, opening onto your own private courtyard - perfect for entertaining; Additional balc off the main living area
- Granite kitchen, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and Smeg oven/gas cook-top
- 2 stylish bathrooms - central bathroom with separate shower and bath
- 1 secure car park - internal access
Enjoy a relaxed lifestyle in this stylish contemporary town residence or take advantage of a fantastic investment opportunity (Approx. $520-$570 pw rental return). Minutes from the Convent Arts precinct, Dight's Falls, public transport and Victoria Gardens, this wonderful home and its enviable location will be difficult to beat.

Description:
MUST SELL SOON!! All you could want in Abbotsford
This extraordinary apartment is close to the CBD, with exclusive river front location, this is as close to prefect as you will get.
This luxurious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment features views across the trees with a tranquil view. Spread across a two floor layout, you will enjoy the open plan design, with plenty of room to entertain on the courtyard.
Including many sophisticated design details, such as high quality fixtures and designer fittings, this exceptional home invites you to relax in outstanding comfort and seclusion. A spacious gourmet kitchen features luxury appliances, stone bench-tops and large island bench.
Designed for the discerning owner occupier, this stunning residence also includes a car park, offering a unique opportunity to experience premium inner city apartment living in a sublime Riverland sanctuary.
Other notable features of this site included:
- Incredible rooftop entertainment facilities, a lobby bar, onsite yoga studio, cafés, and a state-of-the-art Health and Wellbeing Retreat with gym, lap pool, spa and sun deck.
- This stunning riverfront location is just 3.5km from the CBD and is ideal for first home buyers, owner occupiers and investors.
Please come view this magnificent property and see for yourself.

136m²

Description:
Premium Two Level Apartment in Premier Locale
A home with appeal for all, this luxuriously appointed two-level apartment resides in a secure complex in the heart of one of Melbourne's most renowned shopping and dining precincts.
Entry to the home reveals a spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining area adjoined by a powder room and European laundry. Wonderfully modern, you'll enjoy relaxing and cooking here as well as entertaining with bi-fold doors opening out to a sizeable patio at the rear.
On the upper floor, three bedrooms, two bathrooms and a study nook are comfortably housed, the beds styled with unique feature walls. The master benefits from its own twin vanity ensuite, built-in robe and balcony.
Premier positioning guarantees convenience here with trams and trains within easy reach not to mention a supermarket and an array of boutique shops located on the ground floor of the building. Collingwood Children's Farm, Victoria Street and the Melbourne CBD are also nearby.
Additional Features:
*Hardwood floors & ample storage space
*Stone benches, SS appls incl. dishwasher
*Reverse cycle heating & air conditioning
*2x parking spaces plus a security system
*Moments from Fitzroy Gardens, schools
*Easy access to Epworth & St Vincent's

Description:
The essence of inner city style
A contemporary vitality complements the classical appeal of this inner city Victorian, a home that epitomizes the attraction of living close to cafes, the Abbotsford Convent, Collingwood Children's Farm and trains to the CBD from Collingwood station. Period traditions, projected by the charming façade and an arched hall, introduce a light filled north facing front bedroom with an open fire place and a second, equally inviting double bedroom featuring built in robes. The renovated central bathroom's designer flair enhances the comfort of the accommodation in a distinctively desirably way. A living room rich in character, with reverse cycle heating/cooling, precedes a separate kitchen/dining space that's just completed, impressively appointed and yet to be used while beyond, the landscaped courtyard's leafy privacy, olive trees and seating with storage are accompanied by off street parking access via rear right-of-way - a significant advantage in such a great city edge setting.
Insights: 69 Studley Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2016 and 32 other 2 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
LIVE THE ENVIED WAREHOUSE LIFESTYLE
Occupying the front and original part of this character filled BYFAS silk mill, this has timeless appeal!
- 2 large bedrooms - built in robes, polished concrete floors
- Boasting a large light filled living and dining area with treed outlook - soaring ceiling , polished floorboards, modern-industrial aesthetics, over sized industrial style windows allowing north facing light to stream in
- Sleek kitchen - gas stove top, dishwasher
- Versatile mezzanine study area/2nd living/potential 3rd bedroom
- 2 modern bathrooms - main with ensuite with separate spa bath; Large separate laundry
- Other features include - exposed brick walls, large storage areas, ducted heating/cooling, projector and movie screen
- Secure undercover car park, secure entrance, storage cage, well equipped gym

Description:
Riverside life
Fronting the Yarra River and bathed in northern light this entirely adaptable warehouse shell space (540 sqm approx.) has unlimited scope to establish a professional premises of significant character or, equally, to create a residential domain of unique personality and unparalleled size, with further sub-division potential STCA. Appealing as an ideally situated workplace in a creative precinct, the lifestyle allure is also outstanding from the perspective of creating one or more sensational, state-of-the-art city edge homes (STCA). This brilliant example of 'blank canvas' potential is set back from the street in the well known, widely regarded Alma development. It has allocated parking for seven cars. Positioned to enjoy the best of Yarra parklands, with a river front position, it has a riverside bike trail and public transport outside the door, Victoria Gardens across the road and the CBD within 4km, enhancing a significantly rewarding, totally versatile space with the freedom to function as a business enterprise or to enjoy an unforgettable residential address.
Insights: 11/663 Victoria Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Stylish River-Side Townhouse in Popular Warehouse Development
Townhouse 21
Just a few km from the CBD and tucked behind the unique Heritage facade lies a lifestyle of low maintenance, space and undeniable convenience.
This split level townhouse in the highly sought after Trenerry Mews offers:
- 2 double bedrooms with built in robes on the upper level, plus a large bathroom and separate WC
- Separate living/study plus bathroom on the lower level, with the potential to convert into a 3rd bedroom
- Expansive open-plan lounge and dining area on the middle level, opening onto the private north-east facing courtyard - perfect for entertaining
- Granite kitchen fitted with ample cupboard storage and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and Smeg oven/gas cooktop
- Additional balcony off the main living area
- 2 stylish bathrooms - central bathroom with separate shower and bath
- Ample storage space
- 2 secure car spaces - internal access
Enjoy a relaxed lifestyle in this stylish contemporary town residence or take advantage of a fantastic investment opportunity ($500+ weekly rental return). Minutes from the Convent Arts precinct, Dight's Falls, public transport and Victoria Gardens, this wonderful home and its enviable location will be difficult to beat.
