Description:
Denton Mills at its most desirable
Acknowledged as one of William Pitt's distinguished designs, the c1880s Denton Mills were pivotal not only to the industrial growth of Abbotsford but also to the emergence of 'Marvellous Melbourne'. This landmark has, since 2008, gained equally significant status as an inner city residential address - and this stunning apartment shows why. Desirably positioned on the heritage frontage so that period character complements contemporary quality, these sensational spaces are preceded by a luxuriously large courtyard that's ideal for entertaining. The inside story is similarly stylish with refined living and dining spaces that enjoy the dappled light from the leafy streetscape, and appreciate sunsets and city views. An open plan kitchen featuring stone benches, an integrated wine rack and excellent storage adds to the allure of a large single level floorplan with two generous bedrooms and luxurious bathroom with walk in rainforest shower. Storage cage and secure parking for two cars. Superb.
Insights: 114/56 Nicholson Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2016 and 94 other 2 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
The essence of inner city style
A contemporary vitality complements the classical appeal of this inner city Victorian, a home that epitomizes the attraction of living close to cafes, the Abbotsford Convent, Collingwood Children's Farm and trains to the CBD from Collingwood station. Period traditions, projected by the charming façade and an arched hall, introduce a light filled north facing front bedroom with an open fire place and a second, equally inviting double bedroom featuring built in robes. The renovated central bathroom's designer flair enhances the comfort of the accommodation in a distinctively desirably way. A living room rich in character, with reverse cycle heating/cooling, precedes a separate kitchen/dining space that's just completed, impressively appointed and yet to be used while beyond, the landscaped courtyard's leafy privacy, olive trees and seating with storage are accompanied by off street parking access via rear right-of-way - a significant advantage in such a great city edge setting.
Insights: 69 Studley Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2016 and 32 other 2 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

- 3 generous bedrooms PLUS study
- Huge light filled living (OFP)

Description:
LIVE THE ENVIED WAREHOUSE LIFESTYLE
Occupying the front and original part of this character filled BYFAS silk mill, this has timeless appeal!
- 2 large bedrooms - built in robes, polished concrete floors
- Boasting a large light filled living and dining area with treed outlook - soaring ceiling , polished floorboards, modern-industrial aesthetics, over sized industrial style windows allowing north facing light to stream in
- Sleek kitchen - gas stove top, dishwasher
- Versatile mezzanine study area/2nd living/potential 3rd bedroom
- 2 modern bathrooms - main with ensuite with separate spa bath; Large separate laundry
- Other features include - exposed brick walls, large storage areas, ducted heating/cooling, projector and movie screen
- Secure undercover car park, secure entrance, storage cage, well equipped gym
Enjoying its own private entrance directly off Trenerry Crescent, this is a fabulous warehouse opportunity. Brilliant lifestyle position, close to transport, the Yarra River, schools, shops, restaurants and so much more!

Description:
Denton Mills at its most desirable
Acknowledged as one of William Pitt's distinguished designs, the c1880s Denton Mills were pivotal not only to the industrial growth of Abbotsford but also to the emergence of 'Marvellous Melbourne'. This landmark has, since 2008, gained equally significant status as an inner city residential address - and this stunning apartment shows why. Desirably positioned on the heritage frontage so that period character complements contemporary quality, these sensational spaces are preceded by a luxuriously large courtyard that's ideal for entertaining. The inside story is similarly stylish with refined living and dining spaces that enjoy the dappled light from the leafy streetscape, and appreciate sunsets and city views. An open plan kitchen featuring stone benches, an integrated wine rack and excellent storage adds to the allure of a large single level floorplan with two generous bedrooms and luxurious bathroom with walk in rainforest shower. Storage cage and secure parking for two cars. Superb.

Description:
PRECINCT - premium style and spectacular views!
Eight floors above the vibrant bustle of Victoria Street, this stunning corner apartment delivers a serene and secure executive lifestyle opportunity with its free-flowing design, luxury inclusions and panoramic outlook. Bathed in natural light, the apartments' chic interior boasts 2 bedrooms (large master with deluxe ensuite) and equally-stylish main bathroom, spacious open-plan living/dining area leading out to a wide terrace with breathtaking views encompassing Studley Park around to the city skyline. Add to this a superb stone-bench kitchen with Miele cooking appliances and integrated dishwasher, Daikin split-system heating and cooling, Grohe tapware, robes in both bedrooms, European laundry, plus lift access to secure foyer, undercover parking space and storage cage, exclusive access to residents' pool, gymnasium and outdoor garden. Walking distance to Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, Yarra River trails and parkland, trams to the CBD.
Peter Perrignon : 0418 566 846

Description:
New York Style Warehouse Conversion
In a quiet pocket of Abbotsford just two kilometres from the CBD, this unique New York Style three bedroom, two bathroom plus a study warehouse conversion combines voluminous open plan living with multiple low-maintenance alfresco spaces.
The property has been architecturally designed to combine original warehouse features including soaring herringbone ceilings and exposed Oregon pillars with wonderfully functional living and entertaining zones and views across Abbotsford to the city. Two living areas and an open-plan kitchen complement a superb north-facing entertaining terrace with cafe doors, two courtyards and a wrap-around balcony leading from the glassed main bedroom.
Exceptional appointments include a secure garage with height allowance for a car stacker, fob key entry with colour security intercom, hydronic heating, 11 Solar Panels, triple insulated brick walls, Blackbutt timber and bluestone flooring, data, internet and Foxtel points throughout and fabulous New York style windows.
Positioned on the city's fringe, this unique residence is only minutes' walk from the Yarra River, Studley Park, Abbotsford Convent, transport and Victoria Street's restaurant and shopping precinct.
Insights: 21A Mollison Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2012 and 27 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
EFFERVESCENT ABBOTSFORD LIVING
This radiant third-floor apartment offers instantly inviting interiors and immaculate finishes that deliver a refreshing vibrant air. Occupying a desirable quiet corner position, the spacious living/meals area is introduced by a stylish Miele kitchen with elegant stone benches, as enticing floor-to-ceiling windows unveil a superb undercover balcony that revels in leafy easterly views over Kew's lush parklands. Two bright bedrooms are complemented by the convenience of mirrored BIRs, a modern ensuite & luxe central bathroom, blockout blinds, split-system heating/cooling, video intercom entry and secure basement car space, as well as a communal pool, gym and splendid outdoor areas. Great for young professionals and investors alike, it's ideally positioned to enjoy all that Abbotsford has to offer, just a stone's throw to the famed Victoria St restaurant precinct, cafes, Victoria Gardens shopping, the 109 tram and some of Melbourne's most picturesque walking/cycling along the magnificent Yarra River.

Description:
RIVERSIDE PRESTIGE WITH SPECTACULAR VIEWS
(Substantial Stamp Duty Savings if Purchased prior to Christmas)
Inspections by Appointment
A superb modern complex with parkland serenity and elevated vantage finds this exceptional top-floor apartment providing a lifestyle of luxury and space complete with uninterrupted river views. Stunning interior boasts two double bedrooms (master with deluxe ensuite) and equally-stylish main bathroom, gourmet stone-bench kitchen with Blanco cooking appliances and dishwasher, light-filled open-plan living/dining area leading out to a wide terrace ideal for entertaining and enjoying the sights and sounds of the Yarra River. Add to this split-system heating and cooling, limestone-washed timber floors, double-glazed windows, Euro laundry, plus secure entry, lift access to lower-level parking space and storage cage. Stroll to Yarra trails and parkland, easy access to Victoria Street cafes and restaurants, vibrant shopping precincts and public transport options.

Description:
Modern Dual Level Apartment in the Heart of Abbotsford
Enjoying a street-facing position within a boutique block of only twelve, this smart dual level apartment blends inner city style and functionality. Designed to maximise space and light across the open plan layout, it boasts modern interiors dressed in quality fixtures that flow onto private alfresco entertaining. An outstanding opportunity for investors or professionals looking for a trendy abode, it occupies a sought-after address steps from buses, Victoria Park station and a host of cosmopolitan cafes and restaurants along Johnston Street. In addition, it is just a stone's throw from the city, vibrant Smith Street and the eastern Freeway.
* Spacious living area with double height ceilings and a CBD glimpse
* Elegant dining area, large entertaining terrace in private surrounds
* Stunning integrated kitchen with premium stainless steel gas fixtures
* King sized master bedroom with a walk-in robe, robed second bedroom
* Sunny second terrace accessed from both bedrooms, sleek bathroom
* European laundry, security car space, split system air-conditioning
* Polished floorboards, neutral interior tones, provisions for Foxtel
* Set within an impeccably maintained building with intercom security
Anthony Cimino : 0400 500 903

Description:
The allure of a great address
The reasons for this enticing, Victorian being held in the same hands for over 26 years are explained by its immense appeal of period charm and surprising space, also the attraction of an address that has long been one of Abbotsford's most highly regarded, tightly held locations. The particular allure of its prime position fronting Gahan Reserve's parkland gives "Coromandel" exceptional status, ensuring a charming outlook over green expanses greets the bay window of a romantic main bedroom, further enhanced by an open fireplace and built in robes. Leafy aspects through French doors accompany a generous second bedroom and superb living and dining areas that include an open plan kitchen concluding with a lush north facing rear courtyard of perfect privacy. A huge central spa bathroom serves a design easily expanded to three bedrooms if desired on a block offering exceptional width. Heating/cooling, Baltic floors, lead light windows, indoor bicycle storage add desirable detail to an irresistible inner city home.
